Update Dec 14, 2022 Received a new one at no charge from customer service because my last was lost due to faulty return to home. Highly recommend this seller.

title: Update.!!! Drone replaced instantly. Excellent Customer service
text:
Update! Promptly replaced after the first drone did not return back. Thanks to Mr. Frank for his excellent Customer Service. I got my replacement in 2 days.
Excellent drone. Good camera quality.
I am very impressed. My 2nd 120D & 720E (3rd) Holy Stone Drone.
I wish it had a landing pad or gear, Needs a little clearance from the ground. Should not launch it from the hand.

title: A great starts Drone!!
text: This is a great beginners drone.Very easy to fly. Just follow the easy instructions and you will be flying in no time. Just press one button on the remote and the drone flies right back to you . Takes great pictures also. A great drone for young beginners

title: Awesome!!
text: Very easy to set up and fly. Would definitely buy it again

title: Excellent customer service - easy to fly.
text: This drone is easy to fly and takes very good pictures/videos.  Flew it around the outside of the house within minutes of getting the system and charging the batteries.  Still not certain about the range of the drone, which is in question, but customer service is actively trying to help me understand the capability.  Excellent service and respond quickly to comments. Upgraded my comment and rating based on their great customer service.

title: This drone is a piece of crap.
text:
UPDATE: Since I posted this review they vendor has reached out to me offering me $150 to remove my review. They are literally bribing people to remove one star reviews. So this drone may have good reviews but that's because they pay people to remove the honest reviews. I don't need the money so I'm telling you do not buy this drone. With my problem, if it had hit a person, I could have been sued.

This is the second attempt with this drone.

The first one work okay for about 3 or 4 flights. Then suddenly one day a few minutes after take off the drone just turns off mid flight and comes crashing to the ground. Broke one of the prop arms. Holystone was nice off to send me a replacement.

2nd flight with the replacement after a few minutes the drone just starts going in circles, small at first. Then before I know it the drone is circling around my house. Then it's circling around the whole neighbor hood. Eventually the drone starts losing altitude and smashes into my neighbors tree.

Two drones, two catastrophic failures. Terrible quality for something that costs hundreds of dollars.

title: Awesome drone
text: Tried a few others. This one is by far the best. I'm new to drones and flying. Absolutely no complaints. Super easy to use.

title: Very nice drone. Easy to fly
text:
This is my second holy stone drone. My son has a HS110g and I wanted a drone for myself. After comparing different models, I decided on the hs270e. It is pretty stable and gives you decent pictures and video.

You are not going to be getting DJI quality out of this, but for a fraction of the cost, it is really good. The image stabilization gives you a pretty smooth video as long as it's not real windy or your not doing real abrupt movements.

The drone comes with a nice sturdy carry case that holds everything securely. The battery charger is a little awkward, but it gets the job done. It does not come with a power adapter, so make sure you have a 2A usb charger available.

There are a couple things I'd like to see improved. The lights are hard to see when you are flying during the daytime. Because the drone is so small, it makes it easy to lose track of it while flying. Also, when you are flying, the lights are red and green to indicate front and back. Having been around aviation all my life, I am used to red and green lights on aircraft to indicate left and right.

title: great drone for the price
text:
This drone is easy to set up and operate. I like the display on remote that shows you everything. Needs two AA batteries in remote and not rechargeable.
Cons=The charger is flimsy for drone batteries. They don't stay in well. No landing gear, have to land on body of drone. Pretty easy to fly. Would recommend

title: very good!
text: it's my first semi pro drone. i have few cheap ones but this is really good. flies well. the camera could be a little better and RAW support would be great. if you don't want to spend $500 on dji, then this is the drone for you

title: Easy to learn easy to fly.
text:
I’ve had my HS720ES for 6 months. I found it easy to learn how to fly. However I highly recommend using the slow speed setting until you get accustomed to the controls.

I’ve found it to be pretty rugged. I’ve hit a few things including my house, a chain link fence and some tree branches. The most severe damage I’ve had is that one prop flew off after impacting the chain link fence. All that happened there was the 2 screws that hold it onto the motor backed out and the prop flew off. I was able to reattach it with the provided screws. If you do crash and I’m sure you will. Before taking flight again double check the tightness of the screws that hold the props on.

title: great drone
text: For the price, this thing is awesome. You can operate with the remote control, or download the app and do from your phone. It's got some very cool options, like the drone can be set to just follow you once it's synched to your phone via the app. The remote control is very precise and not so touchy that it makes it too hard to steer. I bought one for my brother and one for my dad and they both love it.

title: Flys Away Uncontrollably, But HS Support Is Terrific
text:
This is not my first drone, but I thought it would be my best.

I received this drone as a Christmas present. I set it up and followed the instructions in the manual. I bonded the blue tooth controller to the drone and performed the calibrations as directed in the manual. Weather was perfect with no wind and the controller showed 16 GPS satellites. I unlocked the props and pressed the takeoff button. The drone rose about 5 or 6 feet in the air and hovered for a minute or two. It did not respond to any control inputs - I tried up down sideways and everything else I could but I got no response from the drone.

The drone began drifting to the right on its own and after 15 feet or so it crashed into a tree. I could not get the props to stop turning even holding the lock button down for several minutes. I finally had to reach in and press the power button on the drone itself to stop the blades. I received some lacerations on my hand as shown.

I've contacted Holy Stone and they will send me the parts to repair it (although they say it may take 4 to 6 weeks to get them as they come from China). Unfortunately, I don't think I feel comfortable trying to fly this one again as next time it may fly away and cause even more damage.

Holy Stone support subsequently sent me a new HS720E to replace the defective unit. The difference is amazing! The new drone obeys control input just as it should. What a change and I've upgraded my review to 4 stars. Holy Stone support is superb! Thank you.

title: Great Drone for a great price!
text: This drone is very easy to fly and it takes very good video. You could easily spend 5 or 6 times as much money on a drone but for me and I would guess most people, this drone works well. the drone came with a case, spare set of propellers, two batteries, battery charger and remote control unit. The drone is very stable in the air and will hover. As I said earlier it is very stable even with wind. I would have no second thoughts about recommending this to someone looking to get into flying drones.

title: Broken
text:
The drone I received was broken. The blades were almost gone and when I removed the drone from the box, the arm fell out.
I bought this a gift for my son and I was glad I opened the box to put the batteries to charge. If I hadn’t done that my son would have received a broken drone and been very upset.
I had to return the broken drone and repurchase the drone. There was an option for used or new drone I selected new so I do not under how I received a used one….smh
The drone is great my son loves it. He still needs practice.

title: For beginners who don't want much out of their drone.
text: I commented the drone and made sure everything was working but when I took it hiking the drone wouldn't connect at all. You must have a very very strong connection for the drone to function. I've used other drones that were way better and actually worked in similar conditions. Very dissatisfied.

title: Great great! No regrets. So happy
text: Very very good drone m. Get you one. You will not be disappointed.

title: Maybe I had a defective one.....(but) Holy Stone Customer Service came through!
text:
UPDATE 12/16/22:
This replacement of my original Drone having the issues in stability and loosing control even in hover, seems to be totally free of any of the issues previously noted in my initial review. My review is now 5 stars for what is a very enjoyable flying experience with this drone as well as for the wonderful and prompt replies and support from Holy Stone. Be it a drone, new car or truck, appliance, whatever, a big part of your purchase enjoyment is through excellent support by the manufacturer. I'm totally delighted in how Holy support (overseas) replied to many questions I had for my replacement drone. Well done!

In that my flight prep for each flight was identical as well as the location and excellent wifi and GPS signals, I'm very sure I had a bad drone (soft/firmware or mechanical/hardware issues).

My flights have been short for the time being and in some cases, in a slight breeze, and yet, I've not had any stability or control issues. I've done mostly short range fights initially (300 yards or so max), but, in these flights, my HS730E has performed very nicely. As long as this model remains available (not discontinued or
no longer available) I'll continue to update this review as time goes on. With the cold of winter biting here n the NE, my HS720E is temporarily "in the hanger" with more flights planned come Spring 2022!

This model is a winner as well as the manufacturer support. 5 stars for each!

(my initial review is still here near the bottom of my review in case other's have a drone with issues!)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

UPDATE: 8/29/21:
Holy Stone customer service was prompt, courteous and very supportive! They have shipped me a replacement drone which I just received, to hopefully fly without the the same issues of the Drone that this replaced. I will update this review asap after several test flights in early September. (5 stars for their customer service!).

UPDATE 8/27/2021:
On 8/26//2021 I sent Holy Stone an email (through Amazon) with my issues detailed, noting my defective HS720E. Holy Stone was quick to reply (1 day) and has offered me a replacement to try that should not have the same problems. I am awaiting a reply from them on how to proceed. I'll update this review accordingly
once I hear back from them and if I do receive a replacement to review, I'll update this review at that point.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have a full size DJI Phantom 3 so not a Drone newbie here. I picked up this smaller Drone for travel and/or quick flights with minimal setup time and procedure required.

I did 6 test flights within just 12 feet off the ground and right near me. Compass was recalibrated for each flight. GPS had 12 satellites with a very good signal. Batteries were all at peak output.

All systems were go per the App, Remote and blinking lights on the drone.

For all flights, I had a reasonably stable hover and flight direction up to about 90 seconds and then this Drone began to drift off in one direction at high speed as if a loss of GPS or my remote signal was lost. In each case I had to UNLOCK the rotors immediately or I'd have had collisions. (Return-to-Home failed to respond at all).

I was in a clear field, calm day, no wind and with absolutely nothing around to interfere with the Drone signal.

The Drone felt quite hot after these short test flights. I'm just thinking in that all pre-flight prep was done correctly, some component was over-heating and malfunctioning at about the same time-frame for each flight. This issue seemed more a function of flight time when the problem began in each flight, rather then a random problem occurring during flight at any point in time.

While I did not time each flight, the Drone became erratic in what I felt was a very similar timeframe from the prior flights (same issue began w/i a ~10 second window for each flight).

Rather than request an exchange, I counted my blessings and returned this Drone with plans to purchase a different make of Drone. (probably a Ruko)

title: Best drone for the price
text: THis was very impressive.  THe camera was pretty great for the price 4k picture...only I wish there was a rotating gimble.  Battery power was a little lacking but they do give you 2 batteries and a way to get a third for free but still wish it was longer.  Other wise follow me was awesome and really cool filming features.  Giving it five stars for what you get for the price.

title: Works good
text: Easy step by step instructions, clear images from cam. Im still learning

title: Great 1st Drone
text: So far so good will update later but very pleased with purchase so far.

title: Good choice for beginners
text:
HolyStone HS720 is a decent drone. It was easy to setup with its app and getting this live with your cell phone (note you do not need a phone to fly it , but you will lack POV).
The gimbal does not shake.
The camera / lens is pretty nice for both video and picture
The follow me mode is ok, but it lost sight and flew back home, but it was odd since there was not interference.
It is pretty loud but it stable. I thought it was decent, and glad I was able to review it.

title: Excellent value and great features
text: The Holy Stone HS720E drone has most of the bells and whistles of its larger and more expensive cousins.  Great for beginners with minimal drone flying experience.  Responds well to commands and very good GPS tracking.  Return to home saved me on several occasions!  The remote does need to interface with your smartphone with an app in order to see and use many of the features.  The HD video and pictures are very good as well.

title: Great beginner camera drone
text: This is very well made and stable flight. And clear video

title: Really easy to fly
text: [[VIDEOID:a865bc2c9a1181558cdf7c30d62cd074]] Really like this drone it's a good step up from the toy holy stone drones . Thanks

title: Holy Stone Controller
text:
I like the Holy Stone a lot. It is easy to use and holds steady in flight. The app is easy to follow. The only critique I have is to make the controller a little bigger for people with big hands and a strap around the neck to help support it in your hand becasue of the weight of my phone when secured to the controller. Or make it more ergonomic like a PS4 controller. And when I put my Gs20+ on the controller it gets in the way of the two buttons on top.
This is my second Holy Stone. The first one (HS700D) I handed down to my daughter.

title: Great drone
text: Easy to fly, great stability and excellent video and photos. The app is easy to navigate and love to use my phone for fpv flying.

title: Awesome Customer Service
text:
[[VIDEOID:93da964ea376a3eca742e6466fece2de]] I previously had a bad experience with the unit. I left a less than flattering review on here and Holy Stone reached out to me and sent me a replacement HS720E.

It's really easy to calibrate, it automatically synced to my controller with no calibration and GPS calibration is a breeze.

Camera and Vids are easy to take but I had issues saving to my Samsung Note 10 plus. Worked with their customer service and they were able to update the App and now it works. The quality of the camera is outstanding in my opinion. I took the attached picture and video during my first couple of test flights. You can see how stable the video is when it's just hovering. **quick update, I just saw the video I uploaded and the quality has been downgrade on here, the quality is much better that what is being shown on here**

The replacement unit came with a battery that would not charge and Holy Stone sent me a replacement after I informed them.

The HS720E is the first drone I have ever flown and it is easy, the GPS, auto return, take off and landing feature make it easy to fly. The auto return for low battery and lose of signal work great.

Their customer service has been very attentive and responsive. Based on this. I would consider purchasing other Holy Stone products.

title: Utter disappointment. Garbage App, support & controller
text:
Will only shoot in 360p, regardless of the settings in the trash App. Controller feels like something from a $5 RC toy. The phone holder is a joke. The drone itself seems decent enough, but the whole experience is just terrible. This is my first video drone, and I am seriously regretting this purchase. I have spent 2 full evenings trying to resolve this. I tried to call support but it just rings and then hangs up on you. The help files on the website are broken links. The whole experience is ruined by the app, lack of settings control, and of course the fact I can only shoot in 360p.

If you enjoy the video quality of the original iPhone, go for it. Otherwise don't waste your time and energy on this like I have.

title: Beginner friendly
text: I have never owned a drone before, this was my first. Something youll learn right away is to fly above the trees. Trying to fly at 6 or 7ft above the ground with obstacles around, you'll eventually crash into something. Blades are easy to replace, just pay attention to the letters and numbers on them. Takes some really great pictures with the optional SD card installed, and videos aren't that bad either. I've crashed twice since I've had it, last time was into the side of the garage. It can take a pretty good beating and keep on going. Make sure you download a UAV weather app. Certain times you won't want to fly due to windy conditions. Max altitude is 400ft, it will take you longer to come down than go up. Dense fog, you can fly above it and look around, but be warned, condensation builds up on the arms and near the motors because of the blades spinning.

title: definitely recommend it ! 😊
text: Our holly stone 720 E is awesome !  First time drone operator. It is everything was described  in Amazon information & description. User friendly & a blast to use. Customer support is amazing! So happy & glad we chose Holly Stone. Also the  Ophelia app in iPhone is a fabulous complement delight.

title: Amazing drone
text:
This drone is amazing easy to fly
The only con is take forever to charge

title: No Recommendeds
text:
We been having difficulties using this since the very first day. We already returned the 1st one because it was not reaching the maximum height.

The 2nd one, we only used 2 times, and the 1st time when we use, the signal dropped and we spend 17mins to find the drone. Last time when we use it, when we shut it down, it didn't stop the motors and started moving in uncontrolled directions and cut the operators hand many places. The joystick is still in working condition and batteries are new, but the drone is not fully functional.

We won't use this again and would not recommend it.

title: Design and quality of more expensive drones.
text: After reading several positive reviews I purchased this drone and I am very happy with my purchase.  A very full featured drone at the cost of a cheaper model.  Very user friendly and easy to use right from the beginning. Great video and picture quality. Even the storage case that's included is very high quality. I highly recommend this drone for beginners, novice and even experienced flyers.

title: Holy Stone drone
text: I have found this drone to be very easy to learn to use. I started with a more basic model and moved up to this model. The drone will hover in place and handles nicely. I am not a fan of how the docking clip for your phone is right on top of the buttons on the front of the remote control. Although I am not sure if it is me or the device, but when I connect my phone to the drone wi-fi, the distance the drone flies out is limited to about 20 meters. Without the wi-fi in use the drone will go about 100 meters off into the distance. Of course, without wi-fi there are no pictures stored on the SD card. Another issue is that it is more of a challenge to control when the wind gets up around 6 or 7 mph.
Good for beginners, would like to have longer flight time or shorter charging cycles.

title: awesome for beginners
text:
very easy to operate, controller is easy to use and learn, good quality.
super quiet, lots of youtube instruction available, awesome product, love it

title: Drone for beginners
text: Product arrived as advertised, quick delivery, did not disappoint. It comes with two batteries one in the carrier and the other is in the drone itself. The manual is helpful but falls apart easily. Check out the how to videos online and you’ll be flying your drone in no time. Also make sure you’re in a wide open area to avoid beginners mistakes i.e unwanted crashes.

title: one of the best drones out there for $300
text: 100% satisfied. Very solid drone. Easy to fly

title: Great for beginners.
text:
1. Great carrying case not hard for soft and fitted. not much room for much in the way extra stuff.
2. easy to set up. starts you off in beginner mode which was great for me. (new to this)
3. Pictures are good, video is good, battery life was very good. now it does take about 6 hours to charge them, but I had over 20 minutes of flight time and still had 2 bars left on the screen.
4. Flight controls are very responsive, back to home works great with in a few feet of where she started.
5. For the price and quality this works. This is not a high end drone but for the price not sure what can beat it.

title: Many good features but
text: Thi drone  has many good features but as some have mentioned the navigation levers and drone response is quirky.. It can take up to 4 or 5 seconds before it responds to navigation. I only flew/used it 3 times and out of those, the”return home “ button landed drone to original spot once.. The other times it landed 60 to 100 feet away. The last time being in heavy woods behind my house. Lost. But I like the brushless motor, very quiet and the hi-res camera is good, well constructed.Just wished it would have navigated back, it wasn’t more  than 150 feet away and went straight down.Hopefully I can find  contact info and get in touch with them. Delivery by Amazon was very fast, only one day.

title: Very nice drone
text: I'm really liking the HS720E drone. It is really easy to setup and also pretty intuitive. I'm still learning and getting comfortable with it but the return to home feature is awesome. If you feel like you are getting into trouble just touch that button and watch it come home. I really like the auto launch and land feature too especially on the landing it provides a nice clean landing. The FPV works great and helps aid in your flight confidence. The video footage is really good too. This drone may not be able to compete with other brands when it comes to range but honestly I just don't see myself going those distances especially with the "follow" feature. You just can't beat the quality and the features this thing has at this price point compared to many other drones.

title: Buy this. You WON'T be dissatisfied!!!
text:
This thing is the 1st drone that any reasonable, curious-minded drone owner should buy.

Full features, full, well-written instructions, dedicated flight app, controllable camera (focus, tilt), notification lights (for GPS connectivity), 2nd set of propeller blades, additional battery, and MANY more things.

"Beginner" is quite vague. I certainly wouldn't recommend this for kids under the age of ~16, but for a tech-savvy adult this thing will beat the pants off of other drones.

I've taken it out 4 times in my 1 week of ownership, and each time was a blast. 2 nights ago a pretty heavy storm/tornado cell system came through, and I was thrilled to capture all the lightning from 60' in the air. Since the drone was stagnant (not moving, only filming) the battery lasted LONGER than anticipated.

The videos and pictures I get from this drone are top notch for the price, and everyone I show them too is impressed.

title: Awesome drone at an Awesome price!
text:
I've been wanting a drone for years but just couldn't find the money to buy one because the price .... enter Holy Stone Model HS720E. With a discount and on par with many other drones costing much more, this was the perfect time for my to be able to buy one.

With the EIS (Electronic Image Stabilizer) the video and stills look superb. The "Follow-Me" feature is fun and what sold me more was not the 4K ability but the ability to film in 1080P/60 FPS!

A very well made drone and easy to use as well as many features only found in more expensive drones.

I can not be any more happier with this drone. I take it everywhere with me.

title: Good performance, slow and awkward charger
text: My first drone - turned out to be a perfect choice.  Auto hover (no skill required), fairly intuitive controls for a beginner.  Amazing GPS performance to return to launch site.  Handles gusts and wind up to 12-14 mph quite nicely but it CAN be blown off course and if you lose sight of it, you WILL have a period of panic while you figure out where it went.  It does seem to lose connection with transmitter much too often -- more cause for concern.  The single worst problem is the funky battery charger.  Batteries are very difficult to mate; there's no visual alignment cues and they don't stay securely attached as you set them back down on the table.  Charging time is MUCH longer than one would expect (in the range of 6-8 hours after even a partial discharge (not completely exhausted).  Having two batteries is a must especially if you're sharing the flight with a 2nd person.

title: Great drone for price
text: Personally this is my first drone this is so wonderful works great and runs well I would perfer this over the dji mavic mini recommend buying this drone if you are a beginner.

title: GREAT QUALITY VERY EASY TO USE AND UNDERSTAND  VERY HIGH QUALITY ON ALL PARTS
text: THIS IS NOT WAHT I EXPECTED  IT'S MUCH BETTER THAN I THOUGHT , THE FLYING , UNDERSTANDING , THE QUALITY OF ALL PARTS , BATTERIES , CHARGERS , THE PROTECTIVE GUARDS . THE ATTACHMENT OF STAND , WHERE IT KEEPS IT UP OFF THE GRASS. THE WELL WRITTEN MANUAL . EVEN THE WEIGHT OF THE DRONE WAS A SUPRISE ,  I LOVE THE WAY IT FLIES , THE PHOTOS AND THERE ISN'T A THING THAT HASN'T WOWED ME .  IT'S GREAT TO GET A PRODUCT THAT GOES WAY BEYOND . THANKS  JOHN

title: Warranty paperwork non-existent
text:
Issues getting unit to connect to wifi, various emails sent back to me with totally conflicting advice. Warranty documentation NOT available just a loose email advising "we give you 3 months"

UPDATE : Unit replaced very quickly- 3 days, customer service via email working with Fiona was excellent. Replaced product works exactly as expected, nice unit does exactly what they promise. Excellent customer service-they try really hard to please customers!

title: Awesome video quality for the price
text:

Several "Youtube" video's helped with questions I had about the feature so I had an idea of what to expect.
I purposely delayed writing a review so as to give more than a first impression. Without reservation I can say this was a good entry level purchase. Of course I'm sure many will say, there are drones with more features and better camera and they come at a higher cost.

title: Great drone
text: Great drone for beginners. Easy to learn, and well worth the money. Camera and video quality is fantastic.

title: Just what a beginner needs

title: Decent if you can keep it out of the trees!
text:
A great learning tool if you’re getting into droning. I wouldn’t spend the full price on one. Day after Thanksgiving they had a good price on them. Battery life pretty much sucks. If you can get more than 16 minutes of flying time, feel special! The ability to pull a GPS signal on this is nothing to brag about. If you can get it to hover in a 10’ circle, feel extra special.

Tips: WATCH the screen and keep an eye on the battery life. Or you might just run out of juice over some really high pine trees with branches say 30’ off the ground. You could possibly have to go to Home Depot and buy a 25’ extension pole AND have some type of step stool to barely reach the drone… all the while…..hopping on the step stool to knock said drone out of tree AND realize that one of it’s arms snapped in half. So, I’ve been told! 🤣😂🤣

title: It's a great gps drone
text: This drone flys so smooth I love it great pictures and videos holy stone knock it out of the park with this one

title: This is a great drone for techie beginner.
text: If you're a techie and want to start out with a quality drone without breaking the bank, this is the one. This is my first drone and it is awesome! Very easy to fly. Lots of features for your money. Ensure that you have a GPS signal. Everything will work but the drone will not move if you don't have GPS signal unless you turn off GPS (If you're a beginner don't turn off GPS).  If you are inside and too excited about using your new drone, resist the temptation to fly this thing in the living room and go outside. If you absolutely must fly it inside, turn off the GPS button on the right side of the controller. Be prepared, the drone will take off like a bandit and likely terrorize your kid, dog or that new flat screen TV. Image quality is good, not production quality but really good. Image stabilization is great. Take 15 minutes and read the instructions, maybe watch a youtube video. Charge the batteries before using.

title: Great customer service
text: Easy product for beginners, good customer service, good product, would recommend even for small business applications

title: Great drone for beginners  with easy controls and great video quality!
text: My two boys love it.

title: Drone flew on it's own on the 4th flight and crashed
text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my son, who wanted a good drone like his brother has. My son is an experienced drone pilot. Setting it up was a breeze and the features worked as advertised and the picture/video quality is excellent. On the fourth flight when the drone was turned it didn't hoover like it's suppose to. Instead it went straight up into the air and he had no control. The drone flew erratically by itself for about 15 sec before flying into the side of the house. We tried to fix it with the extra parts that were available to no avail. Now only 2 roters spin. It's a POS. I don't recommend this brand.

title: A nice drone that's pretty easy to use
text:
So once I realized that a gyro calibration was required before each use it worked as it was supposed to. It's pretty easy to get it started, easy to get it airborne, and it really handles well. Once I got a bit more comfortable using it, I was able to really get it moving.

Even in a moderate breeze, about 10-15 mph, the GPS stabilization worked well. The follow features works OK, but I only did it as a test, what's the point of flying a drone if you are just going to set it to automatically follow you around.

It comes with a nice carry case, an extra battery, extra propeller blades, a charger, and of course the remote control. The app works well and I am able to connect to the drones camera without issue. The interface is a bit odd, but it does seem to work well. Honestly I have not used the app or the camera a lot yet as I am still getting used to the flying the drone without crashing it.

I'm a beginner and I am really enjoying it so far.

title: Mechanical issue
text: It flew away out of range, lost. On day 1

title: Best Drone in this price range.
text:
Great drone for beginners, best bang for the buck, amazing camera quality.
It met all of my expectations and did everything the book said it would.

The left toggle on the remote sticks a little is my only complaint.

title: Great value for the money
text: Great features for this price range. Very easy to calibrate the GPS. I don't even need the instructions. Very good quality controller also. I would recommend this drone to anyone.

title: UPDATE: Had a problem, Holy Stone sent replacement drone. It failed on 4th flight
text:
I ordered and received a drone that apparently had a camera problem. I wasn't able to produce pics or video of 4K with it. After a review, they sent me a replacement drone without charge. It works as expected.

The drone flies great and the controls are easy to learn. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS CAREFULLY! The App (Ophelia Go) works were on Apple and Android phones.

If you have a problem, contact Holy Stone customer service.

UPDATE: On the 4th flight, the drone's battery failed (freshly fully charged) seconds after takeoff. The drone was only 10-15 feet in the air, so I stopped the controls and hit the "return to home" button. The drone went off on its own and crashed 300 yards away. One of the legs for the props broke and it not replaceable or repairable as is.

I recommend that you buy this drone from a retailer who offers Insurance and get it. I'm sure most of the drone produced are good, but I am O for 2. The first drone had a bad camera and the second had a battery failure on the 4th flight.

Also, the camera holder doesn't fit ANY protective case (Otterbox type) for the phones. They all slip out. I tried my Iphone 11 and also a Motorola phone.

title: Outstanding!!!!
text: I’ve only had the drone for a few days.  So far it is working perfectly. I’m a beginner , and would highly recommend this drone!

title: Amazing drone for the price! Well done Holy Stone
text:
I did a lot of research before purchasing this drone, and for the money I think it's a great drone. After reading instructions and watching a few Youtube videos I was able to get the drone up and running. This thing takes great pictures and smooth video. All the buttons on the controller are easy access even for my big hands. This thing has great range and is very stable, I love how you press a button and it hovers in front of you about 5 feet .
The Pros:

Very Smooth Video and Pics

The only thing that I think are the Cons would be :
5 hour battery charge time compared to other drones at 90 minutes but HS gives you extra battery.
Updates Ophelia app works great compares to the original one.

title: Pretty good drone for close range
text: I was pretty excited to try this drone out but was a little disappointed with the results. It maneuvers well enough when in range and the high speed is even faster than I expected, but the range was quite disappointing. This was admittedly in my neighborhood rather than a field so there were some trees, but the drone lost connection around 450 feet every single time, which is just over a quarter of the advertised distance (which I know is for ideal scenarios with no obstruction). Thankfully the return to home feature works surprisingly well, so I pressed that as soon as I lost video and my drone returned safely on its own, which is the only reason I still gave this product four stars.

title: Pretty good drone for close range

title: Don’t waste your time.
text: Annoyed with the whole drone. The quality of pics and videos are horrible. The drone does its OWN thing. The only reliable functions are up, down, and backwards. It chooses when it wasn’t to come forward, left, right, or turn around. I saw this complaint a few times and thought “maybe it was a glitch just for them”.. nope. It DOESNT LISTEN. Granted, the photos could’ve been dark because of the position of the sun BUT when the functions limits me on what I can do it’s but so much I can fix. I edited a photo and attached it, it looks brighter but we still look like blubs. But then again, I put the function on “follow me” and it went around and the quality is still horrible. While it was following me it randomly goes up and down for no real reason. I tried to attach a video but it didn’t Work it. Hopefully the pictures are enough.

title: Buyer beware.  Save money for dji 🙏
text:
[[VIDEOID:fd789f24f6cf121f322460700cd524a]] So I originally bought this back in late November.

After first few flights, first drone was not responding to controller and was flying off by itself. Luckily it landed on the roof and was recovered; then returned.

The next 3 drones I received had the same issues, but also the controller would not capture media. I noticed they had switched they handles of the carry bag to hard plastic. These seem to be the infected controllers

I requested a refund from Amazon. Then Hollystone reached out, and told me they would send me yet another drone, this time for free.

I was so happy, I couldn't believe a company would stand by their product so much. It all ended with the drone, yet again, not responding.

The video I uploaded is from the 5th and final drone. I will attempt to return the free drone as well. It's that bad

But for one of the positive reviews, they did send me their mini drone, and that is 100x more reliable

title: Holy Stone's Best Drone yet, Great for photography
text: [[VIDEOID:ca66f083ccd22e7bd26d2b723a6d5ed3]] This is one of the best Holy Stone products you can get. I have tried there smaller drones as well as the bigger GPS drones but this one has basically everything. There are various modes including the follow-me, tap fly, and one where it orbits in a circle. The camera quality is great too and in daylight it is as good as some of the GoPro cameras. When it gets dark though the quality decreases slightly as it does in all cameras, but it is still very good quality. In my video I have EIS off but all the other camera settings are set to default. It flies pretty fast as well in the fast mode and flies almost 25 minutes per battery which is great. Much better than DJI spark and the other small DJI drones. Also, on your phone when you are flying, you can zoom into any spot on the camera which is pretty cool as well although it doesn't show up on the recording. Its amazing how much you get for the price honestly, including the case and the extra battery as well.

title: Excellent value, smooth flyer
text:
Until I got this drone, I had been disappointed with all the other drones I bought. I have DJI'S, and a few others who claim so much, but deliver so little. The HolyStone 720e is a very smooth platform with excellent optics and it very easy to fly. Battery life is great, with a couple flights of well over 23 minutes. The videos are extremely clear and the quality is superb.

Tired of spending money on drones that either get downgraded everytime you update the software, or never deliver on the specs they advertise? Then try the HolyStone 720e! Excellent quality, excellent performance, at an excellent price!

title: The app won't pair with the camera. Doesn't work with FPV Goggles despite being told otherwise.

title: Great quadcopter, awesome customer service!
text:
This was my first quadcopter, and it's great! Build quality is awesome. Comes with a nice carrying case, 2 (!) batteries with charger, remote control, manual, and some replacement propellors (props).

Took a while reading the manual and watching videos to feel comfortable enough to actually fly this thing; when I finally got it up in the air, it seemed to be in some kind of "baby mode" - it wouldn't go very far. Took a while to figure out how to turn that off (you have to turn off Beginner Mode in the app - this does not seem to be in the manual)!

I then managed to damage one of the arms, but Holy Stone's customer service is awesome!!

At this price point, this is pretty much perfect - and you cannot beat this kind of customer service!

title: Drone

title: Horrible picture and video quality
text: Packaging, size,  designs are all great. However, i am very disappointed on 3 fronts. 1) video and pictures are blurry and poor taken from stationary hovering. Where's the 4K quality advertised? 2) battery life is 12 minutes per fully charged battery. At 50% remaining battery,  the drone automatically flies home.  I push it away,  it wants to come home.  3) I lose connection between drone and controller constantly even though it's 50 feet in front of me in an open field. After 6 seconds I runs home. What am I doing wrong? Settings are 4K. Video card is 128 GB. I'll have to return this if I can't improve the picture and video.

title: Outstanding Drone All Around
text: After reviewing multiple drones online, I finally decided on the Holy Stone HS720E. From the second I opened the box I was glad I did. The drone itself looks and feel like a very expensive drone.  The manual that came with it is very informative and easy to read and understand. The controller feels very natural in my hands and I love the foldout arms as they make me feel as if I have a solid grip on the controller even if my hands are a little sweaty.  After charging the batteries fully and reading all the instruction I took it out for its maiden flight.  The first battery lasted just over 20 minutes, but that was plenty of time to take a few pictures and a short video which both look amazing.  I don’t have a micro-SD card for it yet, but I’m interested to see how nice the pictures are in 4K.  There is only one thing it’s missing and one thing I wish it could do.  I wish it had a 2 or 3 axis gimbal and I wish both batteries could charge at the same time. All in all, I’m extremely happy with my purchase.

title: great beginner /intermediate drone
text: [[VIDEOID:b57891e6ec89bd5cb47e012a4aad0c4b]] very nice beginner to intermediate drone. takes wonderful pictures and video as you see in the uploaded pics. the pictures and videos saved to the SD card are truly 4k and very clear. drone flies nice and is so much fun. I can not say enough about the customer service provided by this company. quick replies to emails and 24 hour phone support. I had a couple issues that were quickly resolved and I really appreciate them!

title: AMAZING PRODUCT AND SUPPORT
text: This is an amazing little starter drone with lots of features found on high end drones like image electronic stabilization.  What I was most impressed with was their customer service.  I made a piloting mistake my 2nd week using it.  I inadvertently pressed the “land” button instead of the “fly home” button.  I lost it in a 50 ft tree and couldn’t retrieve it. I emailed the company asking if I could buy a replacement “drone only”.  They said they can’t but would send me a new complete set up no charge.  They sent it out overnight!  Fantastic support.  I highly recommend this product and I can’t say enough about the support from this company, Holy Stone.  Even If you go with a different drone - GO WITH THIS COMPANY

title: Misleading Information and Bad Quality
text:
I received the HS720 version through Amazon on 22 July 2020, the page for that one is no longer available to file a warranty claim or anything else.
The company apparently just added an "E" to the model number, raised the price a little bit by adding a second battery, but failed to hire someone who can add and subtract.
The HS720E is advertised to supply 46 mins flight time (not non-stop; you have to switch to the second battery). The HS720 was supposed to supply a flight time of 26 minutes and only came with one battery.
Does that mean that this company has actually reduced the flight time for each battery by 3 minutes each?
The app on my smartphone started rendering the drone useless by no longer allowing me to steer left or right while using the app (3 uses in 60 days). Everything seems to work when not using the app, but that puts this drone in the category of a toy that would be appropriate for a 10 year old.
If I can't see on the app what the camera is looking at, it's pretty much worthless to me.
The battery charger is not just the worst I've ever seen, but apparently is also dangerous according to the instructions. There is a very loose connection between the charger and the batteries, and there is a note in the instructions to keep the batteries in a "Fire Safe Container" while charging.
Here is one thing that I've learned out of this purchase. If there are grammar errors anywhere in the description of the product "DO NOT BUY".

title: An Excellent Drone for the Money and Fun

Thanks to Holy Drone for engineering a high quality drone with its 4K camera and nice features for a beginning to mid-user.  I appreciated the extra accessories, two batteries and a nice compact case for transporting.  Even the airport was impressed!

text:
I dont write reviews as a matter of habit, but felt compelled to write one for this product and company. This is the 3rd drone I have purchased from Holy Stone both for personal use and for gifts. The last drone had a problem that caused it to crash, and we talked to support. They immediately replaced due to faulty product. title: The HS720E is a Grand Slam Home Run!
text:
[[VIDEOID:37b32e4553bb0352c253c6145b631491]] Holy Stone has hit a home run with the HS720E. As a drone hobbyist and amateur filmmaker, I was excited to see the latest upgrade to Holy Stone’s product line is a 4k, foldable quad with EIS (Electronic Image Stabilization). It is especially impressive that this value-priced drone’s camera is equipped with a premium quality EIS image sensor from Sony. The high quality camera (with a tilt angle that is controllable during flight) produces excellent photos and image stabilized video that exceeds expectations (note that installing an SD card onboard produces optimal video quality, compared to the video saved on your smartphone through the drone’s WiFi). The camera produces smooth, stable video with amazing cinematic results, which is extraordinary for a drone in this price range. (See attached video and photos).
The flight operation of the HS720E is highly impressive and includes features that are comparable to drones costing much, much more. The HS720E, equipped with brushless motors and 6 axis gyro, is easy to fly and very responsive to the pilot’s commands. Easy flight features include one touch take-off and landing, reactive joystick controls and even, level hovering. Reaching heights of 400 feet (120 meters) while maintaining FPV (First Person View) contact is a breeze for this quad. The equipped GPS enables a number of fun and convenient functions such as RTH (return to home), in addition to functions available through the free Ophelia GO phone app which includes orbit (around a preset point), follow me and tap fly (along a programmed path).
The HS720E is shipped with two batteries for a total of over 45 minutes of flight time, a transmitter, a charger and extra propellers, all of which fit neatly into the included compact carrying case.
I absolutely love this drone and highly recommend the Holy Stone HS720E for the beginner and experienced pilot. It is a remarkable drone that is fun and easy to fly, takes excellent, stable videos and is backed by the responsive Holy Stone support team. Anyone considering the HS720E will be happy with this high quality, value priced drone that includes features found only in much more expensive drones.

title: Outstanding Drone for First Time User!
text:
What I mean by my title is: This drone was purchased for a 10-year old for Christmas. The only other drones my son has ever had were the $25-50 models you see in the malls. For the price tag, I am totally impressed...
First of all, my 10-year old can fly it as well as I can. It’s extremely accurate with GPS enabled. We flew it off of a small table in the backyard. Flew it up to 400 feet in the air, and out of our sight. The battery on my cell phone died so we lost the HD video feed. To be honest, we panicked a little bit. But we knew how to press the “Return to Home” feature. This baby, returned (from out of our sight—probably 1/4 to 1/2 mile away) and landed right back on the table it took off from! Before seeing this, I would have assumed only drones upwards of $1500 would do such a thing. Unbelievable...
I can’t find any flaws in this drone. The main thing higher cost drones have are object detection and avoidance. So you do have to be sure not to fly it into trees or other objects. Of course, in our flat lands there isn’t anything taller than 100 feet, so that’s not an issue. When we accidentally get too close to something we just hit the Return to Home function and the drone immediately flies upward and avoids the object. It’s an easy “bailout” tool. Then if you desire, you can a cancel the Return to Home and continue flying. If you hover it about 5 feet off the ground and try to move it with your hand (from underneath), it will speed up and try to correct itself back to its original hover point. The technology in this drone is amazing. We haven’t tried it in high winds. But moderate winds don’t affect it greatly. Of course, quick gusts of wind will briefly knock it off course a couple feet. But no big deal. 2 batteries is a huge benefit. Be sure to have both charged up because 25 minutes doesn’t last as long as you want it to! Solid construction. We have accidentally dropped it more than once from 5 feet to a hard surface—no damage at all. I was actually surprised at how much it weighs. The cheaper mall drones are light as a feather. This unit feels like it should be too heavy to fly. Don’t you believe it! This thing can take off vertically and fly to 100 feet—or more—ridiculously fast. Nighttime flying is fun also. The lights underneath and the “spot light” which shines down make it easy to see at 400 feet high at night. Biggest reason I think some people have had issues, is improper calibration. We do calibrate it before each flight. It only takes a minute and gives it great stability. If you’ve never owned a drone and don’t want to spend your whole paycheck on one. This one should make anyone happy at the lowest possible price point to get a drone that even experts would enjoy. I’ll probably get another so I have one to fly with my son!

title: Worth It
text:
I bought this for my son who is 14 years old. He figured out the controls pretty quickly but tested it indoors which cased a problem because the drone ascended very fast. Great news, it is pretty tough so after hitting the roof, going outside it flew like a charm. The phone holder could be better.

Good Buy

title: Drone does not respond to controller
text: I bought this drone for my son-in-law last Christmas. He and my daughter left to travel the US in a motor home and while traveling he tried the new drone while they were back east. He told me it wasn't functioning correctly so I told him we'll figure it out when they come back west. We recently tried it at my home and once airborne it began to act unusual by oscillating and not responding to the controller then crashed (I own a drone and have flown it for years, it is new to my son-in-law). We changed the setting out of beginner thinking that may have something to do with it, wrong. We got it in the air again and it momentarily responded to the controller- but- it developed a mind of it's own again flew into a tree- fell out of the tree and broke one of the arms. We looked for a new arm online to discover they are expensive and very difficult to replace. He left the drone with me because I wanted to epoxy the arm back together, which I did. Once airborne... again... I flew it around my home and it would respond intermittently to the controller. I wanted to take some aerial photos of my home when totally out of the blue it takes off flying away from me at a high pace and wouldn't respond whatsoever to the controller. It headed into the hills next to us and my wife and I took three hiking trips to find it but to no avail, total loss.  FORTUNATELY it didn't injure anyone or go through a neighbors window or damage someone's property. AVOID THIS DRONE!

title: The next step up in drone flying and picture taking.
text: The shipper was really hard on the package.  It was dented and broken open but the supplier did an amazing job packing the drone.  It was absolutely in perfect condition.  We charged the batteries and we were off taking photos.  I highly recommend this product.  Top Notch.

title: Malfunction and crash on first flight battery
text: [[VIDEOID:1aed1b8936b7ff17e37d79082319b7c7]] On the second flight, still same battery, the drone went straight down and crashed from 300’ high under more than full power. It went down faster than I could have with the controls. It was almost directly above me, so the signal wouldn’t have been an issue. It hit my roof, bounced off, and landed in mowed grass. On a good note, there was only a very small crack on the chassis. The battery was ejected and appeared undamaged. The arms and propellers stayed on. I didn’t fly it again so I don’t know if it suffered internal damage. I had a SD card in. The card saved the first flight, but not the second. My phone saved the second flight, but only right up until it went down. At the time of the crash, the automatic circling mode was activated and I only operated the camera. I attached the video. I read more of the reviews and this appears to be a relatively common issue. The drone’s other attributes don’t matter if it randomly turns into a succeed drone.

title: Easy to  Learn
text: Drone works well flys great easy to learn holds up well in the wind and holds a steady altitude. Was very pleased with the fun of flying the drone. Remote has pretty accurate read outs to altitude and distance as well as signal. Was happy with the purchase I get a lot of entertainment from the drone. Thanks Holy Stone for a good product.😊

title: Hours of fun and relaxation
text: Ease of operation and the detailed instructions. The remote control is unbelievable and a positive for this product.

title: This thing is awesome and has a great camera!
text: This is my first drone and it’s great and very user friendly with a great camera

title: Reasonable value, but has limitations
text:
I'm not the drone master. But I have owned more expensive drones as well as cheaper ones. And as expected this one falls in the middle.

It flies well and the camera and video functions work well.

LIMITATIONS

*ANY wind. For the size of the drone it should be better at cutting wind... but with a very light breeze, this will get along way off course.

*The phone "holder" attached to the remote control is really non functioning.

*It lands very poorly, both in manual mode as well as the return to home mode. There is no landing gear so the blades will come extremely close to the ground even if it is flat ground. And it tends to bounce quite a bit. Even if the commands are given for it to touch down, it bauchs at this move way too much. You can land perfectly on hard flat concrete and its still gonna want to bounce a few times. I highly doubt these blades last very long without some sort of landing gear to keep it more than a 1/2 inch off the ground.

*This is where everyone's gonna decide that I am an idiot... Do not try to stop this drone with your hands. I hit the return home key in which caused it to fly straight into a low tree. It would not stop trying to fly upward and was destroying itself.
"When the return to home button is pressed, the drone no longer has the ability to avoid obstacles." Even if you are low to the ground and near where you started, the drone is going to rise quickly to try to acquire better satellite reception before returning to the original GPS point. So the return to home button is really only a function to be used if you lose sight of the drone or are in a wide open space. That however, is similar to many other drones. It's not trying to find the quickest path home. It's trying to find the correct path and it doesn't initially know what that is... So it turns off one part of its brain in order for the other to function. This was a scenario in which that was a disaster.

All that being said the drone survived the crash and destruction of my hands perfectly fine. 32 bandaids later, everything's back in operation. *You should have seen the pictures before the bandaids. I assumed Amazon would not allow those to be posted. Like a horror movie!

title: Easy to fly
text: Great first drone and fun to fly for seasoned pilots very stable good battery life would definitely recommend this drone

title: Now I'm very Happy with this drone
text:
Update 2 . I previously had a bad experience with the unit. I left not a good review on Amazon.
Holy Stone reached out to me and sent me a replacement HS720E.
The stabilized video is far better than I expected for such a value priced drone, every function worked perfectly; take off is super simple and landing can be done manually or by allowing the drone to return home
The drone comes in a really good case, and has a set of propellers, miscellaneous parts, and a screwdriver.
To summarize this is a great drone at a great value point. The biggest issue is the slow charging
