title: Customer service is awsome and the drone is awsome to.
text: I really enjoyed the customer service they were quick to help solve any and all problems I had and with a quick walk through they had everything up and running  couldn't ask for a better experience thanks to all the team at Holy Stone!

title: Beginners Friendly with Attractive Features
text: I went into this drone after my dad purchased a cheaper option from Holystone. I have to say that after watching a ton of reviews, this drone doesn’t disappoint. The build feels premium, and the features are great! I crashed mine 3x so far and the drone still works perfectly; with no parts breaking or falling apart. The camera is very good, but not great. The battery life its just as advertised. I took the drone for a spin last weekend and my dad, son-in-law, and myself played with the drone and got some battery to spare. However, I would be reporting back because of all the features the drone has, I haven’t been able to get the “Follow me” mode to work. Overall, great drone to get a feeling for drone flying and very attractive price considering all that comes with it.

title: A Great Step Up from cheaper drones
text: This is a great drone that is worth its price. Build quality is really good for both the drone and the control. Getting the drone paired, calibrated, connected to the app, flying and filming took about 15 minutes. Set up was a breeze. The recording quality is better than I expected.  Drone came with two batteries and a nice case. Overall very happy that I got this drone.

title: Easy to fly, takes very good photos and smooth videos
text: I really like the quality of the drone, videos and photos. I'm a Graphic Designer and this is great for work and for play.

title: Company Stands Behind Its Product
text: I had a technical issue with my drone which led to them replacing the drone for free (including shipping). They stand behind their product and their customer service is impeccable. Cathy was very accommodating.

title: Flying high
text: I had a little problem with my first one. But.OMG most anyone can fly this puppy.

title: Best drone for $$$
text:
I love the low speed setting on this Drone.
Excellent video and handles well in med gusts wind.

title: Well built
text: Very easy to fly ! One of the best handling drones I've flown, very sturdy construction, for the price range you will not find a better quality drone !

title: GREAT Drone for beginners ...
text:
I wanted to get a "starter" drone for photography & was initially looking at the DJI Mavic.

After reading a ton of reviews & watching YouTube videos, I settled on the Holy Stone HS720E 4K EIS Drone with UHD Camera.

Boy am I glad it did!

Piloting a drone is not as simple as I though because ...
... my biggest concern was losing the drone if it travels too far.
However, this is a fantastic drone to learn with as it has the "RTH" [return to home] feature.

Oh, and did I mention the 4K video quality?
It's awesome.

PROS:
- easy to get started
- extra battery + hard case = FANTASTIC
- photo + video quality = EXCELLENT

CONS:
- the right throttle control was faulty on mine but submitted a replacement request from Amzaon & will be getting that tomorrow. I still give it 5-stars.

Overall, extremely satisfied & would recommend.

title: Highly recommend
text: We had issues with the first drone. I reached out to customer service and they resolved the issue. The new drone has no issues. Satisfied customer!

title: Great drone, great price!
text: [[VIDEOID:e02d5f8a942740843502521471a10039]] As my first drone, the HS720e has been excellent the past year I've owned it. Easy to use, has electronic stabilization, 4K video and hi-res pictures. Can't beat it for the price!

title: Solid Flyer
text: [[VIDEOID:9a83c4ee5ba4c46c726f8eca60c1cf94]] This is a good flyer, with responsive controls.  Its is solid construction, with good materials.  The app from Ophelia Go offers set up calibration videos which can also be found on youtube via search.  Set up and calibration is paramount, as this is a GPS drone.  That being said when completed per manufacturers instructions it flys very stable even in stronger wind but as with any flyer you are responsible to understand the gusts and use good judgement when completing preflight.  The camera with Image stabilization offers excellent shots,  and stable video and when paired with optional sd card the 4k is impressive.  You would be hard pressed to find features and quality like this in other drones.  Holystone did very well.  The customer support and service is very good and I see this a strong selling point as well.  It is a heavier drone which falls under FAA guidlines in the USA but with that comes orbit, follow me and way point options as well as a litany of features which make the HS720e a immense bang for you buck.  It is not necessarily a beginner drone as it is so well equipped with features and quality far greater than an entry level flyer.  It is however something with a little practice and careful attention to becoming versed with the manual while taking advantage of the videos placed on youtube I would be comfortable saying it is a good idea to start with it if you are willing to take the time to learn its features and controls before rushing head long into the skys.  Return to home,  one button take off and land, beginner mode ; its a very impressive drone and the best option if features matter and you dont want to drop huge money.  Holystone did a great job on this bird and Im excited to see whats next.  Happy flying, buy this flyer you wont be disappointed.

title: Great deal for a amazing drone!
text: [[VIDEOID:a8dbac9136276caa71fde3d6c084da79]] Very easy to use. The customer service is on point. When my drone wasn’t working they had no problem to send a replacement. The quality is amazing and the supplies with the drone is enough for a beginner. The quality is what I expected and I’m honestly glad I bought this specific drone!

title: Looks great.
text: Looks great. Haven’t had a chance to try it yet. Too windy here, 20 to 35 mph .

title: Defective Battery
text:
One of the two batteries included with my HS720E would not hold a charge. The green LED on the charger would still be flashing even after over 10 hours of charging (and yes, I know about the charger being able to only charge one battery at a time, even with two connected). The partially charged battery would only yield about a 5-minute flight time on the quad; the other, normal, battery gets a little over 20 minutes.

The entire package was returned to Amazon for an exchange, and I am still awaiting the arrival of the replacement.

title: I love this drone it’s everything as advertised
text: The first moment I turned my holy stone drone on I fell in love the HS 720 E and the HS 700 I purchased both the drone is nice and a good beginner drone for low cost

title: Can an eighty year old learn to pilot the HS 720 E?
text:
I panicked when I saw that the 720 E is 5G. An urgent call to Holly Stone before returning the drone.
I found that I had misinterpreted a learning video and after speaking with a REAL LIVE PERSON within seconds of phoning customer support - all is well.
The 720 E is far more sophisticated than I had realized. I’m going to spend time developing muscle memory before doing over much with this drone.
Having spent time at sea and in the air - I’ve learnt that the biggest mistake is to overreach before one has answers to problems that will occur.
Sooo - tomorrow - Colorado - a park and lakes and if the snow and rain allow - I start flying.
I’l use the beginners features and over the next few days gently develop my skills.
My age is 80 and I expect to have far more difficulties than most of you.
Slow reaction time - slow learning curve - pretty stupid for most of my life - but before long - I’ll be airborne and
commenting on the good - the bad and hopefully no ugly en route to being a Holly Stone pilot.
The star ratings will be adjusted as I learn

title: Great drone for the money!
text: Nice starter drone. Nice price! Camera with 3 axis gimbal would be the cherry on top.

title: Dronemazing
text: This is an awesome drone. The software needs some improvement, not sure how to get the gps so it works without shutting off. Need to calibrate it before every flight or it will take off on you... great Customer Service.  But I love flying it.. get one.

title: Seems cool for introduction
text: Its a pretty cool introductory drone however, I have several gripes about it so far. First and foremost, the tool, in which you can place your cellphone doesn’t fit a iphone 11 pro. Second, it takes more than several tries to do the geometrical calibration sensors to work before an actual flight can take place. Lastly, the batteries seem to drain rather quickly in both the remote and the drone itself.

title: Real bummer
text: Bought this after reading the reviews. The reviews have got to be fake. Drone randomly Flys off and won't return home. Photos are videos are far from clear or smooth. After reading some forums and doing a lot of troubleshooting  I get a lots of comments like (that what you get when you buy a 325$drone)  I just wanted something fun to flow and take some pictures but  I spend all my time chasing this down after it goes A_wall and the pictures are terrible.

title: Great product/cost
text: The product I give 4 out of 5 only because I wish it had some other features. And because it really can have a mind of its own sometimes.  I give the company a 5 out 5. The first one I got was malfunctioning in the air and just took off, couldn't find it I got with the company and they worked it out with me.

title: Severe Issues
text:
I went through two of these drones and unfortunately both were poor experiences. The first one I ordered would intermittently stop responding to the controller and be stuck hovering in place for several minutes at a time. The second one developed a mind of its own almost immediately after taking flight and began to veer around dangerously, eventually landing in a tree nearly 200' away.

I never contacted Holy Stone support because frankly having issues like this on two individual devices on their first flights left me uncomfortable enough that I wouldn't put one in the air again and risk either property damage or harm to a person if the unit were to experience issues again.

title: Definitely a jump, from the 120. But a good jump
text: This is my second, holy stone drone. 720e is definitely more advanced. Great drone! I love it.

title: Does not record to SD card properly
text:
Easy to fly. Very controllable and records fine to your smart phone . on 3 attempts on recording to SD card, it failed 3 times. 1st time - completed corrupted the SD card . Could not even read it. 2nd and 3 rd time it recorded the mp4 files.....but they were not playable at all.
DO NOT USE if you intend for recording to SD card purposes. It records fine to the smartphone, but they may as well take out the SD card slot. seems to have no purpose.
Still drone is fun and easy to fly and takes good quality video via smartphone.

title: Great customer service
text: Like the whole experience of the Drone 720e is an excellent drone from Cold Stone

title: Best Drone for the Money
text:
Holy Stone HS720e
I ordered the HS720e off of Amazon after reading all the reviews and watching all the YouTube videos. It looked to be the best drone in my price range. I received it in two days. Taking it to the small field behind my subdivision, I tested all the things it was able to do. I was very pleased and it responded well to all. A few days later my son who had just purchased a DJI Mini2 and I went to fly our drones together. My first flight was going well when the Wifi to the drone went out about 20 feet from me. The drone went to the side and landed on some grass by itself. Upon inspection I found that the Wifi would no longer connect at all. I tried to connect several times and the same the next day. Nothing. I called Amazon and they said to send it back and reorder another one. I had it the next day. A couple of days later my son and I went to a park to fly. All I can say is, this Drone is amazing. It is all that the internet said it was. It flies well in light wind, takes amazing photos and videos. My son was a little set back when we tested our return to homes. After several minutes of flying mine landed in the center of the landing pad twice out of three times and about half off the mat the third time. His DJI was about 3 feet away each time. I have three other drones and after many hours of research, I don't think there is a better drone on the market at his price range. I would recommend it and I would buy a Holy Stone drone again. I have been looking at the HS510 if it had EIS it would be perfect.

title: Easy to set up and fly for beginners
text: Having never flown any drone before I was a bit nervous.  The instructions were well written.  Step by step setup instructions.  Easy to fly,  I recommend this drone

title: Great drone!!!!
text: Awesome drone!! Great for beginners like myself. 👍👍

title: Incredibly easy to fly and manuver
text: I love it! My 13yo daughter was flying it with her iPhone within 4 min. Auto trims and hovers with ease. Auto take-off and landing. Auto return when battery is low or out of range. Follow-me option. Really easy to fly right out of the box and comes with 2 batteries that last 20 minutes ish. Memory card not included. I would by again in a heartbeat.

title: Ease of use.
text: This is my first Drone. It was very easy to set up all the programs needed to fly legally. Drone basically flew its self right out of the box. I flew RC planes before but this is much easier to learn. Batteries take long time to recharge, guess it can't be helped.

title: Granddaughters Christmas gift
text: I don't like that I can't put my 6" screen phone in the holder, but it was a blast to play with before giving to my granddaughter. The neighbor thought I was trimming the trees. It was well worth the money.

title: Top Quality and Features
text:
If you are looking for a drone at a great price point by features, the Holy Stone HS720E is for you.

The HS720E is well made and has features comparable to far more expensive drones. The features I like the most include: ability to hover in place without drifting, return-to-home (GPS built in), and the high quality anti-shake camera. I appreciate these features because they were all missing from my first low cost/trainer drone.

I received an email from Holy Stone the day after purchase, thanking me and letting me know how to contact them in the event of a problem with the drone. Now that’s customer service!

I researched many drone manufacturers and found Holy Stone to be the best value for features and quality, backed by terrific customer service.

At one point I did have an opportunity to contact Holy Stone on a service issue and found them to be very helpful and responsive. Holy Stone’s customer support is among the best I’ve experienced.

title: Worst drone product ever
text: This done never worked. I tried multiple times to get it to work but was unsuccessful. I even contacted the seeker for any tips or response but he never returned my message.

title: Great drone and so easy to learn and fly!!
text: Have had a blast with mine since I got it. It was so easy to learn and get flying. The battery life is excellent and give beginners plenty of flight time to learn all of the ins and outs. I  highly recommend this one! Have done many flights since I purchased it and not one single issue. The camera quality is superior. Did my first night flight on New Years Eve and it was amazing! I  am loving making videos and sharing them online.

title: Only good for 5 feet away,! You get what you pay for. Would i buy this again no way
text: Junk

title: Great drone!!!
text: Great drone,as everything worked perfect!! Drone was Easy to Learn,and performed flawlessly. Will buy from Holy Stone again!!

title: Fun times to be had by all! Once you get the hang of things.
text:
I am a total beginner to the drone world. I knew what I wanted was a mid-level drone with solid video capability and ease of use. This has it all... once you get the hang of it.

Unpacking was like (pick you present getting occasion) and fortunately it comes with a slight charge on the batteries so you can take it out for a test drive (yes I know it is a flight).

The included case is well made and holds everything needed for a fun flight time. I even was able to get my additional blades and screwdriver in there. I do wish there was room for more batteries, but that is a wish, and this is good for what you need.

The drone is well made, sturdy, looks bad-ass, and can fly like Eliud Kipchoge. the included instructions and safety measures installed in the control make safe flight somewhat simple.

Make sure to read the instructions. This is coming from a guy who would rather rebuild something usually than read instructions ... but these are helpful and somewhat necessary if you are new to the game.

I have flown it 5 times so far. I have had 2 successful landings, two wrecks, and one questionable event (took off, could not get it to fly where I wanted it to because it was not properly set up and it landed dramatically). I am confident with time I will be a better pilot and am enjoying the challenge.

title: Holy Stone really earns their top product and support status.
text: This is an awesome drone backed by equally awesome support/customer service. I don't believe there is a better drone or product support out there. Holy Stone has earned my loyalty.

title: The specific unit I owned had poor camera range.
text: I returned this drone for a refund.  I gave this drone 4 stars instead of 5 because I was very disappointed with the camera range. It was much shorter than anticipated... getting views of my street were nearly impossible because the signal kept dropping.  Otherwise, I thought it was a great drone to fly around.  Easy to learn.

title: Very bad design and manual
text:
This is one of the most confusing manual that I ever read.

Let's go through it in details.
Page 18, 9.2. It asks me to connect my phone to the drone through wifi. But I have not turned on the drone yet, which happens in 9.3.
There is no reset button. So if you make a mistake, the drone becomes completely useless.
Lots of grammarly mistakes on manual. for example "long press the remote to unlock button" should be "long press unlock button in the remote" based on my guesses?

title: Very stable flight and stable camera
text: Holy Stone has been one of the main brands that I have considered more than the rest. This is mainly I guess due to Holy Stone having so many to offer and the customer reviews.  The drones that I was considering was the mavic mini 2 and the HS720E.  The drone I purchased of course is the HS720E and I am very happy with it. The HS720E arrived after dark and after a quick read through the manual I headed out. With a overcast ski and no ambient light the camera wasn't able to show much.  The HS720E popped of the ground and held in place perfectly.  After a calming breath I tested forward, back and side to side and the went straight up to about 50 feet. The fun was soon over because the battery had not been charged so quickly everything was beeping and landing.  I was able to leave work early so hurried home to try the HS720E during day light and a fresh battery.  I was still careful not to rush but this drone is very stable in 6 to 10 mph wind and camera is very steady. I traveled 300 feet plus away and 250 feet high and tested some of the features to find everything worked great and didn't cost 600 bucks.

title: Great for beginners
text: Awesome and easy to understand. So much fun for my first purchased drone.

title: Disappointment
text: I experienced multiple disconnects between the app and drone. Even at short range with no obstructions between antenna and drone. I had high hopes.

title: Very nice drone
text: Easy to learn.

title: An Excellent Drone!
text: For a beginner or experienced user, this drone is absolutely fantastic. The response is good and the ability to control the drone is very easy. The GPS is fantastic, even on cloudy days. Would recommend to anyone wanting to step up or even purchase their first drone. Today we had wind gusts that were around 20mph and the drone even at max altitude stayed in position. Flew it with another user who had a DJI and even they were impressed. This is my third drone and HolyStone is the best I've experienced.

title: best drone for beginners
text: the best drone for beginners, easy to use, and the camera system is awesome.  Good extra accessories such as extra battery and blades.  Drone motors are pretty powerful, it takes off real easy without any issues.  I would definitely recommend this to someone trying to learn to fly or want to upgrade from those under $100 drones.

title: GreatCustomer service
text: We had a problem with our drone not sure what happened but it went out of control and hit a garage and broke 2 of the arms on the drone. Called holystone and told them what happened and within a week they sent a new one. Thank you for the great customer support

title: Good solid drone, Holystone good company backs their product
text: Like the drone, packaged really nice, everything pretty solid.  The video and photo option not perfect but very functional considering the price.  Had an issue with my drone and holystone customer service was perfect.

title: I'll have to do it my way....
text: Lots of research. HS720E won out over the other simply because the HS was 1/3rd the price. Does one third means I get two thirds more headaches or two thirds less service? Both? Seems so. Contacting them thru the website, social media fetches null results. I REALLY LIKE THE DRONE! It is more than capable, but thd controller is iffy and the drone to phone link is hard to establish and maintain. Changing batteries means doing it all over agsin with fingers crossed. I may try a secondary battery hookup so reprogramming isn't needed. The proprietary battery connection has its faults and the charging system is just plain stupidly designed. I got an aftermarket REAL charger and building my own charging dock, which is far faster and safer. HS has a fairly good reputation, so I am puzzled by their complacency.  Under the same circumstances I would buy again, now I would likely hold out for the far more expensive one with a stellar reputation.  ALTHOUGH, I  do like a challenge  and employing my own ideas. I will fix and document those online.

title: Getting the best out of my drone
text: I'm new to operating a drone.  I've had a very small, unsophisticated drone a few years ago but moving up to the HS-720e was a major step in performance and cost but after reading and watching various videos, I decided to take the plunge and purchase it.  However, I did reach out to Holy Stone and was introduced to Zoey.  She was so helpful that once I communicated through a few emails, I was committed and purchased the unit that night.  The experience with Amazon was also great and the product arrived one or two days ahead of schedule.  This was fantastic and I was able to finally put my hands on the unit.  It was bigger than I anticipated but more importantly, it was a 'solidly' built drone.  Due to rainy weather for several days, I was unable to get out to fly the drone.  The other evening, I finally flew it.  It did exactly what the videos said it would do.  I synced my phone to the controller using the app.  Once that happened and I connected the drone to the GPS system, I turned on the rotors and pushed the 'up' toggle.  The drone rose to about 6 feet and stayed there just like the instructions state.  I was able to walk over to the drone and walk around it while it held its position.  This was an amazing feeling not having to keep pushing buttons to hold the location.  I got bold and pushed the up toggle.  It went up, up, up and up but it held the same GPS position.  On the way up, I took several pictures and I've shared two of them with this post.  I did not fear the drone flying off into the horizon to be gone forever.  In that it was night, I turned on the landing lights to see where it was in the night sky.  I was able to move it in different directions while holding a certain altitude.  After about 10 minutes, I decided it was getting too dark to continue flying so I pushed the 'home' button and guess what, the drone returned home landing within a few feet of its takeoff point.  What a great experience and I'm looking forward to spending more time with the drone to become a better pilot.  If what I've shared was helpful, I hope you get your HS720e and join the drone world.  If you do, make sure you register your drone and you get registered so you will be a safe drone operator.

title: Great for Biginners and intermidiate pilots
text: I bought this drone from a 3rd party at a huge discount. The first 2 hours I had it I snapped the right rear arm.  The replacement was not available on amazon so I reached out via twitter and got a response within a few hours. They sent me a replacement arm which only took 5 days from china to get to me. Replacing the arm is not a project for someone who has never soldering before but with a bit a soldering practice and some out of the box thinking replacing the arm is simple. The drone is amazing and the Return Home feature has saved my drone a few times already. Overall super satisfied. The controller is kind of flimsy and will not hold your iPhone 11 as its too large. But other that the controller feeling cheap it works great.

title: EIS is a game changer
text: This was easy to fly with no prior experience. It’s very stable when hovering, and the EIS makes this drone a winner. I like Holy Stone products enough that I also bought a nano stone (HS170) to fly in the house. This was a great purchase. Highly recommended.

title: Price
text: Price

title: Awesome
text:
Still learning to fly it but it is a good size, powerful, and I have hit everything from trees to powerlines and it never broke.
Took a little propeller damage today navigating a trail in the woods so it seems to curve a little now but it came with a extra set of propellers just for that issue.
Awesome drone for the price and easy to land in your hand with a single button.
You can record on your phone so no need for the extra memory card and while I have not taken it out of range I have taken it up high enough to see the whole neighborhood.
I plan to master it on trails and then look for the goggles to fly it by the camera alone.
Hover is good even in some wind and camera is clear.
I will update when I master it and also after seeing if it works off grid as it connects to your phones wifi not Bluetooth so hopefully it will have no issues camping as I want to see if there are lakes and parking around from a sky view because my camping area has 36 lakes and I have only been to 2 and there is no service to look it up once there.
If your on the fence about buying this do it as I was surprised by this little thing and the amount of power it has, my only complaint is the charger does not lock the batteries to it well but it also don't take up any space so it's a ok trade off as it fits in the little lunch box sized case without taking any space up.
Everyone at the park asking where I got it and what brand, so it definitely don't get confused for the cheap kids toys. For the price it's a good deal.
If you are new I suggest buying extra propellers and learning it in "slow mode" in a open park area as the steering takes a little getting used too

title: HS720 review

title: Good compact unit. Works very  well and picture quality is very good. Great value and fun to fly.

title: Best drone for the price.
text: Holy stone has the best customer service and their products are awesome. I highly recommend the HS720E!! You won't be disappointed

title: Great beginners drone and tougher than it looks!
text:
Though the age recommendation is 16+ I bought this drone for my 11 1/2 year old son who, like many children his age these days, is very advanced in the use of everything electronic.

We kept the controls limited for beginner's use as is the default setting (can be modified through the app) and his first three or four full flights were flawless. He tried the follow me and point of interest features and landed with auto home and manually with no more than a slight bounce. He loved the handling immediately.

It was not until it got a bit dusk and he wanted to try out the led landing lights that things went awry.

Since he was just going to rise it upwards to see the landing lights, then land. He used the controller without the cell phone/app. As he lifted off and the drone was just a foot or so off the ground, he tried to turn on the landing lights. A push-button actually SHARED with the high speed button. Well. The drone took off like a bat outta hell!

My son had trouble seeing the controls as they are neither illuminated, nor otherwise made to be visible in low light conditions but despite his panic he swears that he immediately started "spamming" the return home button... to no avail. We watched in horror as the drone skimmed the road, bouncing at least twice, then slammed into a sand dune less than a foot off the ground. When we got to it, three motors had completely stopped as one continued to furiously spin kicking up sand everywhere. It would not shut off, stop or even slow down and I couldn't get the battery out because of the sand wedged in every crack and crevice. After what seemed like an eternity, my son's persistent spamming of the emergency off button on the controls and my pushing the off button on the drone finally worked and the drone shut down.

Surprisingly, upon my initial inspection I found only a few minor scratches and that one of the rubber landing feet was half pulled out... that's it. I mean this thing seriously hit the road at full speed, though thankfully at a good skid angle, and then bounced up into that dune hitting it hard. No broken arms or even props. But, I was sure that the three dead motors got fried. Despite my assurances, my son was heartbroken.

I took the entire drone apart and while manually turning each of the motors back and forth to loosen any sand I used an entire can of compressed air and then a fine brush to clean out a LOT of beach sand from within the entire unit. I then popped in a fresh battery and lo and behold... it started right up! Good as new!

While taking it apart I watched a few YouTube videos to see if something similar happened to anyone else with regard to the sand filled, stopped motors. Closest thing I found was a guy that crashed landed in a lake, retrieved it two weeks later, let it dry out thoroughly, popped in a new battery... and it too was as good as new! Clearly, the electronics of this drone are VERY well made.

Anyway. Though I think illuminated or at least more highly visible remote controls would be a plus, and that the landing lights/speed button should be separate... hmm... and despite the fact that we still don't really know WHY the drone took off and wouldn't stop... this is truly a well made drone perfect for a beginner or pro alike.

title: Holy Stone does it again!
text: I've had the HS720E for a couple of weeks now and feel confident to say.... IT'S GREAT!  This is my 3rd HS Drone.  I use the HS170 for indoor/cold weather practice and the HS700 for general purpose outdoor practice/flying BUT the HS720E exceeds my needs in both flying time and photography.  The Drone itself is a solid unit that handles moderate wind very well but the camera is a great step up in quality coupled with the "Jello" mounting along with the ESI allows nice video and still shots,  A decent price tag for a higher quality AND very good customer service is a win/win.  Remember, always follow the FAA rules and be careful.

title: Excellent quality drone!
text: This was my first drone purchase. It's high quality and easy to learn to fly. My buddy is a licensed private pilot (PPL) and has an expensive drone. I had him show me how to fly my HS720E and he was surprised by the price after flying it. He guessed it was an $800 drone!

title: Not recommended for beginners but great drone at this price point
text: Like most other reviewers I find this a quality product for the price. Only downside is I don’t recommend it as your first drone. It is too fragile and can suffer major breaks in a crash with hard objects.  Camera is nice and the remote comfortable to operate.

title: Good value + Great customer service!
text:
Good value for a beginner drone.
Grate pictures and video.
Nice case for storage. App has a offer for a free battery. I did the required steps and I actually received the battery. I was very surprised!

title: Awsome
text: This is a great product if you want to get into the hobby and not break the bank. Easy to fly,durable. Great quality

title: Awesome Drone!!!
text: This is my first drone. The HS720E is a great value, easy to use, and is packed with lots of features more expensive drones offer.

title: Did an auto take-off in gps mode...it took off! Out of control.
text: FINALLY had a chance to take this out on a clear day for the first time ever.  Set up was easy and checked out.  Powered up, did an automatic take off and was just letting it hover, while I rotated to set the camera.  In GPS mode, it kept drifting.  I nudged back into place 6 times.  Then, it started drifting further and faster (no wind at all).  I hit auto return.  It kept going - and crashed.  FIRST TIME GETTING TO USE and where's the customer service for Holy Stone?

title: The Holy Stone HS720E,  a quality  product that works very well!
text: I want to add an addendum to my initial review.  I would be seriously remiss if I did not mention the fit, finish and the quality of all of the items included in the HS720E box.  Inside the box is a high quality carrying case with handle for the drone, its controller, its batteries for the drone itself and also the charger and cables. The molding of the HS720E ABS body is smooth leaving no gaps for dust or excessive moisture to enter into the electronics.  It is water resistant, not waterproof! The controller (transmitter) design is ergonomically correct and the display is easy to read.  The brushless motors on the drone are lightweight yet powerful and because of the brushless design, they generate less heat and draw less current than do a brushed motors design.  The owners manual has easily readable text and is well laid out.  A product is absolutely no better than their customer support, and Holy Stone is a standard bearer in this regard. I had an issue with my HS720E and the company sent me out a replacement drone immediately.  I had dealt primarily with Dennis of Holy Stone and he was knowledgeable and very insightful regarding the anomaly I had experienced with my original HS720E.  You can certainly pay far more for a quality drone than what Holy Stone asks for their HS720E, but all things considered, the advanced fundamental features of their drone works very well indeed. A tip, for what it's worth, read the owner's manual throughly and make sure that you understand the sequencing of your preflight checks and setup.

title: LOVED IT!!!
text: Ordered this product as a christmas gift and they loved it!!! Would definitely reccomend this drone to a friend! The drone is good quality.

title: Good flier, but not impressed with camera.
text: I bought this drone for my son for Christmas and was initially impressed with its build quality and flight characteristics. Then we started to evaluate the video and pictures that we took during the flights and were disappointed. It seems that a large portion of the footage was out of focus. This seemed odd as objects at a similar distance, but on the opposite side were in focus. I contacted Holy Stone and was impressed that they responded very quickly, even on the weekend. They gave a variety of solutions to include changing the sd card, as well as uninstalling and reinstalling the phone app. None of these options were helpful in clearing up the images. After going back and forth with multiple emails, staff, and suggestions, Holy Stone informed me their camera does not have autofocus and there was nothing else that could be done. They reported the images were satisfactory. To me, there seems to be a defect in the lens or something else in the mechanism. I could understand if objects in the foreground were out of focus while distant objects were clear or vice versa, but not from side to side at the same distance. This is just my experience and I have seen other individual's footage that seemed at least in focus. I like the drone otherwise, but this was definitely a disappointment and has not been my experience with other brands.

title: Customer Service
text: After the first drone took off (into never never land) I contacted Holy Stone, and they are sending me a new one.

title: BEST CUSTOMER SUPPORT IN THE BUSINESS
text:
The HS720E has most of the features of a Mavic Mini at half the price! Wonderful 4K video without a three axis gimbal. But the Customer support is beyond belief. Phone calls answered immediately by knowledgeable English speakers without heavy accents. I've called several times and always had my questions answered immediately. They even sent me a part at no cost, plus a third battery free!

Thee photo I attached does not do the Sony Camera justice because I wanted to show how it performs in poor light and high wind while in a steep bank.

The HS720E is full featured, high quality, very stable, and easy to fly with GPS! I can't imagine that the higher cost of a Mavic Mini is justified for the marginal increase in capability and features, not to mention that Holy stone customer support is exceptional!! I own four Holy Stone drones and doubt I will ever buy from another vendor. I can give an unqualified recommendation to Holy Stone products and customer support.

title: Great buy
text: [[VIDEOID:1cd8ef104814c5091668426386821c03]] So easy to use, stays steady even when breezy and has great resolution.  Lots of fun! Very affordable, and a great value. I highly recommend this drone.

title: Great customer service
text: Had a problem with a battery. They took care of it immediately

title: Great Value and Easy to Fly - GREAT for learners!
text: This drone is my first, and I'm really loving how easy it is to learn the ropes. I have faith in the fact that it will return to the exact spot of takeoff when I ask it to return, and it will do this automatically on low battery. I did register this drone, as you're supposed to, and I've taken it out on a few test flights in decent weather. It holds up GREAT in the wind, and the image stabilization is excellent. I watched as the drone was jostled a bit by wind, but the video being recorded was not affected by this at all. I would reccomend this drone to anyone looking for a decent-priced piece of excellence!

title: Unbeatable feature/price ratio
text:
As a first time drone purchaser and user, I found this drone to be easy to get started with. With GPS and stabilization, the drone is very stable, even in reasonably windy conditions. While I understand it will take a lot of practice to become a competent pilot, the HS720e seems very responsive and easy to control. There IS a huge learning curve to get good, I'd assume, with anything you need to control in the air through 4 axes (pitch, yaw, roll, forward/backward).
The thing is, its FUN, even if difficult, to get good at it.
So far, I only have 2 relaively minor criticisms of this drone. The batteries take forever to charge (at least 5 hours each), and even though the charger holds/connects 2 batteries, it only charges 1 at a time. And, for reasons I could not figure out, I could not get it to fly past some apparent restrictions in distance and height for the first several flights. I tried all settings possible and couldn't figure it out. Then, all of a sudden, those restrictions wre gone. Frustrating at first cause there was no way to find out why or how to fix. Reminded me of when I first got a Segway Mini-Pro as it's app, software purposely limited speed with beginners as an obvious safety feature. Except in Segway's case, the instructions tell you up front. If, in the case of this Holy Stone product, the glitch was programmed by the developers, it should have been disclosed.
Overall, though, for the money, this must be one of the best, especially for beginners. Has many of the features of much pricier drones including Return to home, 1 key take off/landing, orbiting, point of interest, tripod mode, etc. Don't think I could have made a better 1st time purchase. I do plan to get real good at flying and then will look a higher end models.

title: Great flyer
text: This model has all the features that are a real plus like follow me, point of interest, etc. But to me, and most importantly, it is not only easy to fly, but it is incredibly stable in the air. It's extremely responsive to the control sticks. It's steady as a rock in flight even with a good breeze and the video is pretty amazing.

title: Exceptional Customer Service!!
text: In January 2021 I purchased my 1st drone so I'm a novice.  I was over confident in my skills and crashed during first session, breaking an arm off.  I contacted Holy Stone to inquire about purchasing a replacement arm and was shocked when they said they'd ship a replacement arm at no charge!  Service rep was very pleasant and professional as well.  A couple of weeks later the arm arrived and I installed after reviewing the You Tube video that Holy Stone directed me to during our initial conversations  (great insight Holy Stone for visual instructional tool!)  Repair with video reference is pretty straight forward and all was well for a few days, but then encountered an issue with the drone connecting to WiFi.  I contacted Holy Stone via email and they offered several trouble shooting tips, but at the end of the day we could not sort the issue out.  Customer service at this point has been really great but here's where Holy Stone tipped over to World Class - because we could not overcome the WiFi issue, Holy Stone replaced the drone!!  I certainly will remember this exceptional customer service experience and recommend this company to anyone looking for a recreational drone.  Thanks Holy Stone!

title: Build Well
text: Solid drone. Easy to fly and takes great pictures.

title: Great first drone!
text: I based this purchase off other reviews on good video/pics and great for beginners. I am glad to experience that this Holy Stone HS720E drone is a good starting point for my first. I was able to get up and flying in no time at all. The one touch take off and landing is awesome. Having the option between low and high speed makes it very easy to get the hang of the controls. Drone hovered in place when I let go of the controls so I could gather my bearings before practicing another loop around. Videos and pictures look great and smooth. Battery lasts about 23 minutes like advertised. It does take a few hours to charge. Only complaint I have is that the controller barely fits my phone (samsung Note10+) and I need to take the case off as well. I have to be very careful that the controller actually has ahold of my phone. The app to use with this holy stone drone has worked flawless so far as well. Overall I am quite happy with my purchase and do recommend this for a beginner like myself. Very easy and enjoyable to fly. And do make sure you register with the FAA since it is over 250grams.

title: Great drone for the value
text: Perfect drone for adult that's just learning how to use. This drone used used for our farm.

title: Price vs value
text: Great drone for the price with lots of features. There is a need to calibrate gps/compass following battery change. Easy to fly with two speed options. Did have a trouble with Ophelia Go app using iPhone, called tech support and HS is working to resolve issue. Their support personnel were helpful and apologetic.  New app version is yet to be tested. Still flyable using control but without camera and some other features. Still a thumbs up so far.

title: Had an issue with first one, crashed and broke. They sent one the next day at no cost

title: Don't buy this drone
text:
[[VIDEOID:3f26de60e986dfc82f30180901732106]] I got this for Christmas. This is my first time spending a lot of money on a drone. It was over $300.00. The first time I flew the drone I had no issues. I live next to a lake I posted video and pictures. The drone did everything it said it could do. Two days later I attempt to fly it again. When you hit the take off button it suppose go up 5 feet and hover. This time I hit the take off button it raised up and took off like a bat out of hell it went left straight out in the middle of the lake and dove right in the water. I had not control of it. It would not respond to the remote control. Less than 5 seconds over $300 vanish. I don't have money like that to throw away. I suggest you do not buy this drone. I am screwed.

Update: I call Amazon and they wasn't going to help me. Because the drone went into the lake and I couldn't return it they said they couldn't do anything. So I called Holy Stone and told them what happen. They going to send my another. So i will ley you know how the new one do.

title: Highly Recommend to ALL!!
text:
Absolutely impressed!! After about a year contemplating, researching and comparing, I decided on the Holy Stone HS720E. So far only had a couple flights, but I am beyond satisfied!!

For a beginner looking for top quality and features...THIS IS THE ONE!! Instructions were clear and easy to follow to get you off the ground and know what to expect.

I will highly recommend this to everyone!! Thank you Holy Stone!!

title: Awesome value
text: I recieved the HS510 for my B-day last month, 2021, but i had been extremely interested in the capabilities of this model, the HS720E.  So after a couple of weeks, the $40 off coupon drew me over the edge, and i ordered it.  This model does require FAA Registration, but i was pleasently surprised how easy that was to obtain.  Then the 1st flight.  Lets back up a bit, based on my experience with the 510. I expected to crash at least a couple times, but no.  5 flights in, and not a single white cane flight.  When hovering, Holy Stone describes it as TriPod mode, and on low wind days. That it most surely is.  I am an experienced ROV pilot, and operating this drone is so intuative.  Great job by the engineeeing/software team.  Still photographs are good, video and color are fantastic in the video.  Only thing i would like to know how to do, is capture the elevation and heading data in the video.  Not something I want to see in every video.  But I would love the option.  Great product at a fair price!  1 year of experience for this review.  7/5/2022.

title: Holy Stone HS720E
text:
This a very nice quality drone.. very easy to use very, powerful, quiet, 4K Video worth every penny
This is a great drone with fantastic features. Holy stone was the first indoor drone I bought and I have bought several other
This is my favorite drone so far HS720E

title: Terrible experience may have been an app issue
text: This was the 2nd drone of this model I tried. This drone has all the bells and whistles that I wanted. The camera was outstanding.  The problem may have been the app Ophelia Go, I am not sure. I would sometimes have to calibrate the drone 2 or 3 times before takeoff. Other times the drone was calibrated, all indications were good but as soon as I lifted off it would start doing the toilet bowl thing or fly sideways uncontrollably.  While flying in an open area I would get error messages on the app that GPS was lost, wifi was lost, low battery, etc. But the controller would show everything normal. Each one of the drones  had slightly different issues and some similar ones. Each one though had an issue of becoming uncontrollable and loss of GPS positioning. Each one had at least one time that pressing the RTH button cause the drone to fly off at a high rate of speed even though the controller was set on low. One time the drone finally recovered itself and another it flew into tree branches. One time I took the drone up to 52 feet indicated on the controller but the app showed 120+ feet. The app seemed to be more accurate that time. Another time the app was flashing low battery but the controller showed 2/3 battery level and I think the controller was more accurate. Holy Stone tech support was very good to a point until they started asking for edited videos and various different flying locations and other things that I had already done. I never got a response when I asked about the app or the availability of a different compatible app. On Google Play Store the app does not rate very high but it is the one you are instructed to use. So since there is something wrong with one or both I returned the item and will not buy Holy Stone again. In my opinion this drone is dangerous.

title: Holy Stone HS720e drone
text: This is a very nice drone. It’s easy to operate, good quality, camera is good. Good for the money.

title: Great drone
text: Amazing drone. Great quality and easy to fly

title: Enjoyable drone. Follow the user manual and you will be fine, this is a must.
text: It’s a good drone due to its stability. It is aggressive in high speed mode which is cool but I prefer to be higher than the trees so I don’t hit anymore at a high speed. I took it for initial flight at the park in an open space, it was great. Took it to my backyard once I was comfortable and to my now ease of mind I was able to control this and didn’t hit anything. My backyard isn’t exactly open but there is space to fly so I will say it’s easy to navigate once you get the hang of it. DO NOT FLY IF YOU HAVE UNDER SIX SATELLITES! Can’t stress that enough, the GPS is a hypothetical leash for the drone. Without GPS it’s comparable to a dog that frequently to runs away without a leash, if you take that risk you’re bound lose it. Aside from that the only negative is the charge time it takes for a full charge is 5 hours but for the amount of money I paid for it, I can easily make room for something else in my life to complain about. GREAT BEGINNERS DRONE!

title: Satellite reception
