So if your looking for a good quality Drone, but don't want to invest a good chunk of change. This is the Drone for you.

title: Super Cool Drone! (with some hilarious moments...)
text: [[VIDEOID:3fdfc8e8b20de32ac88c580e54321416]] This drone is amazing!  One of the best drones we ever bought, and it has a funny backstory.  We bought a sister drone in November 2021, but we didn't use it until November 2022.  It flew great!  But then I tried to fly it fast; it would not stop, and we lost it.  So, we bought this drone to replace it.  It flew amazing, as you can see in the photos and the video.  The follow-me and return home features were very helpful, and so was the GPS.  That has saved us many times, which is why I recommend this drone to anyone who wants a high-quality drone with amazing features.  My friend was very impressed when I showed him what it can do.  Come find out for yourself.  You won't be disappointed!

title: So far so good!
text:
This is my first drone. As a kid, I had remote control cars and helicopters, but this is a different beast. Seems to be constructed nicely, comes with a very nice semi-rigid case, app is easy to use and seems to fly fairly stable. I live on an island and we always have around 15+ knot winds, and it seems to handle it pretty well. Since it does not have a mutli-axis camera, the image is a bit tilted when the wind is high since the drone is leaning into the wind. The follow-me and orbit modes work great. I haven't tried the waypoint mode and have been advised to avoid the "headless mode".

Pros:
Seems well built
Nice carrying case with room for 3 batteries, my dedicated drone phone, extra batteries for controller, spare parts and the manual.
Batteries last 23-25 minutes as advertised -- get multiple though!
Large iPhone with case fits in remote control holder
User friendly app
Lots of fail safe options, great as I get used to flying it
4K at 30fps
Can review photo/video that is stored on SD card right in the phone app

Cons:
No multi-axis camera. Makes the video a bit shaky and the image is tilted in high wind. The electronic stabilization works, but not perfect,
Remote is fine, basic but fine, except the phone holder. It has a piece you slide up and the it locks in place and a small stand flips out for your phone to rest in. When done, you pull the phone out, flip the stand in and push it back into the remote. This part seems like the only one I worry about with the number of times drone pilots will be removing their phone from the remote. It is just plastic that has a spring clasp, but the plastic feels easy to break if you're not careful.
Batteries take FOREVER to charge. From what I read, it charges it at 0.5amps when the 2 cell battery can handle up to 2 amps. This is done to prevent it from charging too fast and deteriorating your battery over time, but at 0.5 amps, it takes over 6 hours to charge just the one battery. It has 2 slots on the charger, but only one battery charges one at a time. This is why you should get those extra batteries!

For my first drone, I am very happy. There are better ones, of course, but not at this price point for the features you get. I look forward to flying it and learning more. There is also a great group on FB for HS720E pilots that has been helpful.

Happy flying!

title: Easy for beginners
text: I absolutely love the drone. One of the cheapest drones around for the way it runs. Recommend to anyone.

title: Excellent Service
text: Recirved drone in less than 24 hours. Very happy with product and service! Thanks.

title: Best value drone for the money!!! Hands down the best.
text: Great drone, plenty of advanced features,  stable flight, and very forgiving for beginners.  Item as described, and more value than expected.

title: Awesome High Quality Drone with 4K Camera!
text:
This is my 6th different model of Holy Stone drone that I have owned…and by far, THE BEST! Holy Stone makes a drone for each level of drone pilot out there! The HS720E drone is their current top of the line drone and is an absolute blast to fly! My favorite Holy Stone drone prior to this model was the original HS720. My only "complaint" with the original HS720 was the lower resolution camera and "wobble" from not having a 3-axis stabilized gimbal. The 4K camera and EIS (Electronic Image Stabilization) of the HS720E have solved both of these issues!

It comes in a very nice compact case which is perfect for storage and portability! Setup of the drone is extremely simple…pop in 2 AA batteries (not included) into the remote and slide one of the 2 included modular drone batteries into the drone, and within a few short minutes, you are ready to fly! The flight time per battery lasts just around 22 minutes. With the drone being sold with 2 batteries doubles your fun at 44 minutes! The batteries come with a dual charger and take approximately 5-7 hours to fully charge via the included a USB-C cable and a standard USB charging block (not included). Batteries are very easy to swap out by simply pressing on a release button and sliding rearward out of the drone. The new battery slides easily into the battery compartment and clicks firmly into place.

To view the FPV camera, you connect to the drone’s 5G WiFi network with your phone or tablet. Using the Ophelia GO 4K app, you can see the FPV view and access additional features such as:
• Access the configuration settings of the drone
• Digitally zoom the camera
• View the distance & height of the drone
• See a map where the drone is in reference to your location through Google Maps
• Take pictures/video
• Activate Return to Home feature
• Activate Follow Me mode
• Activate Orbit Flight
• Activate Headless Mode

The controllability of this drone is phenomenal, making it a blast to fly! It has 2 speed modes making it easily controllable for a beginner and the more advanced drone pilot alike. The GPS hold functionality keeps it steady despite considerable winds. It also has a super bright LED light that can be activated with the right shoulder button on the controller. This is great if you take your eyes off the drone for a moment and need help locating again it in the sky.

In summary, I highly recommend this drone for those who are looking for a great drone without paying the high prices of other brands! The great price along with the great quality, fun features make this drone a great choice! The ABSOLUTELY UNBEATABLE customer service of Holy Stone continues to make me a repeat customer!

title: Decent drone
text:
Solid drone, there is a learning curve to getting started, once you do it. No problem.
The battery charger is the worst part. Really unstable.

title: So much drone for the money.
text: This is my first drone, never even flown one before owning the HS720E, it’s very easy to learn and control. The manual is very through and detailed, the drone itself very much more expensive than it is. Don’t hesitate to buy this drone, you will not regret it.

title: Best Drone for both New and Experienced Fliers! This is a MUST HAVE
text:
The Holy Stone HS720E 4K EIS is AMAZING and I highly recommend it to ANYONE looking for a EASY to fly drone that does not feel like a TOY. Comes with MANY professional features for under $350. VERY sturdy and super easy to fly (pretty much flies its self if you want). I bought my son a DJI drone (+$2500) and was terrified to fly it because to what it cost. The Holy Stone made if very easy for me to learn how to fly and the few times I put it into a tree, it was super resilient and just kept on Goin!. If I compare the Stone to the DJI I would say that the build quality and the finish and feel are equal if not better. You can really notice the build quality when to fold or unfold it. We have purchased other low cost drone and the are missing many of the features and fell like fragile toys!
Another HUGE benefit of the Stone is for about $350 you not only get a feature packed, well built drone, your get TWO batteries, a GREAT controller, spare parts and a VERY NICELY built case to carry it in. With the DJI, I had to buy the extra batteries and the case extra and they were NOT cheap.
The one and ONLY critique I have for the Holy Stone is that it takes FOREVER for the batteries to charge (5hrs +) and there does not seem to be a fast charger option out right now. So when you buy yours, you will get 2 batteries with it, I would recommend getting two more... On the flip side of that, this drone CONSISTANLY get 25 - 29 minutes of fantastic flight time, with the camera and landing lights on It so nice to have the long flight time, especially when you are just learning how to fly.
The video quality is absolutely amazing. the EIS really works and produces very stable shots, even when in wind and especially for the price point. We watch these video on our 75" 4K TV and they are so nice!
Now, to be completely fair to DJI, the video shout we get from that are stellar and it can definitely producing higher quality shots in tougher flying conditions, but remember you will drop well over 2K for a DJI and you will get much shorter flight times and many models lack the features you get standard on the Holy Stone like "Orbit" and "Follow me" If you want to become a professional drone photographer, buy your self a Holy Stone to learn so you can comfortably learn how without risking a pricy fragile drone like the DJI!
Whither it is for your kids, or yourself, I can't recommend the Holy Stone HS720E 4K EIS enough! BUY IT!!!

title: USB cable is too short, Charging takes a long time.
text:
The package arrived a day early and contains a very nice travel case, the drone, batteries, power charger, and USB cable.

Batteries and charging.
* The batteries take a long time to charge, on the order of 5 hours each and they are charged in sequence.
* The USB cable (Type A -> Type C) is too short for me to plug it into a wall charger and have it reach the table next to the wall outlet to attach to the charging adapter.
* The batteries fall out of the charging connectors way to easily. The batteries and adaptor need to be on a flat surface to stay together.

Prep:
* The compass calibration procedure could be made to be more clear. The first step of placing the drone on the ground and rotating it 3 times makes sense. The 2nd step to pick up the drone so that it is nose pointing up and rotating 3 times doesn't state to rotate the drone around it's front to back access. After figuring that out, compass calibration was easy. Note : It's easier to do the compass calibration with the arms folded in.
* Setting up an Android phone and pairing it with the drone was easy.
Physical attachment of a phone to the controller:
* Using 2 different phones, I have an issue where the spring loaded clip doesn't wrap around the edges of the phone far enough (Case is on the phone, and no, I will not remove the case). Just touching the phone is enough for it to pop out of its clamp.
* I'm still learning the app and controller interface. I was a bit confused by icons shown in the app startup screen not appearing on the main screen (Unlock comes to mind). If this is to be done only from the controller, this needs to be more clearly documented.

I was able to start the drone and get it to hover. (First flight?). This is all new to me so I can't compare operation to other drone models. I'm still in the learning stage and don't have any further comments at this time.

title: Needs a better charger
text:
I have not flown it yet, but I do not like the funky charger design and I hear it's pretty slow.

Can you design a better charger with a fast charge?

title: This drone has exceeded my expectations
text: Stop looking, you will not find anything better then this out there for this price, this drone has exceeded my expectations, very well done

title: Holy Stone 720E
text: Super easy to set up and fly. Good directions,  great photos and video is steady. Follow me feature works and easy to turn on. Generally all around great fun.

title: Replacement drone from HOLYSTONE
text: I had issues with the first drone taking off on me so holy stone sent a replacement. Very nice customer service. The second drone did not hover and ran into a tree. Breaking the arm of it. Pissed off doesn’t cover the anger I feel.

title: Photo video quality concern
text: I did not like the quality. I feel it could be better and I will be returning this.

title: Great Next Level Drone
text: I decided to get and upgrade from the “Toy” drones with a better camera and GPS. I was really impressed with the performance and views from the HS 720e. It was priced just right and customer support was awesome

title: Drone suicide via drowning! 😭😱🤬
text:
TL:DR - good for beginners when it works correctly but malfunctioned more times than worked right, drone death via drowning.

The good: easy drone to use for beginners, not a lot of calibrating or technical options that would confuse a novice. The return home and auto land/take off functions are nice. Camera quality is good.

The bad: as another review pointed out, the drone would have lose connection many times during flight. Bought this around Black Friday, took it out for test flights at the park and at the beach, always gave multiple errors during flight but fixed itself in a couple seconds. Product info says it has max altitude of over 394 feet, but it gave error message saying max height reached at 15 meters and would never go higher. Wouldn’t go more than 100 yards away from me.

I use a splash drone 3+ for drone fishing, have lots of experience with drones. Used this holy stone drone with iPhone 13 max pro maybe 10x, all testing how well the drone works. Intended to use this drone to scout fishing areas, so was testing how it does in the wind and such.

The UGLY: first time flying over the water, used a new fully charged battery, the drone went 15 feet away from me, 10 feet up in the air, then warning messages indicating no battery popped up and the drone slowly descended into the water. I was unable to go into the water to catch the drone before it hit the water since I was on the side of a cliff. Horrible to see that slow motion descent into the water!

Will stick to swellpro or DJI. Really wanted this to work.

title: Terrible range
text: Does not function as advertised at all. The range is really poor. Loses Wi-Fi contact within less than 100 feet. Also the propellers don’t shut off like they’re supposed to when you press the button to shut them off. My drone was hovering 12 feet in the air and I couldn’t shut off the propellers to at least make it drop. Could not get it connected to Wi-Fi either.  Eventually reconnected with it by standing right under it. Wish I had bought a different drone, but the reviews were so good. Don’t believe it.

title: This Drone is AMAZING! You will not regret it. Smooth, stabilized videos and easy control
text:
[[VIDEOID:6ae7266823a85cda955470ccf1f598f4]] Wow, I am so glad I bought this drone. I am excited to bring it with me and it is easy to carry with the included case. The extra battery really extends the fun too. I am proud to show off my videos now because of the stabilization. I tried a drone without video stabilization and while it is fun to fly, the video can be a little shaky. This would make a great first drone as the controls are so responsive and you can start in the slower speed to get used to the controls without it getting too far away from you. The optical flow sensors on the bottom were a feature I wanted too as it hovers so good without even touching the controls. The lights on the bottom of the drone are cool too, makes it easier to see in the sky, you can turn those on or off from the easy to hold remote too. With the 4k 30fps sony camera it makes some outstanding videos too! Search you tube for the model HS720E to find some full resolution videos people have posted as the amazon video doesn't let you do the full resolution.

The setup and calibration is super quick and your phone guides you through it after you connect to the drone by wifi and use the app from the manual, ophelia 4k. Auto take off and gps return home make you feel confident to take the drone out a little further and get an eye in the sky! I really like the two speeds too, you can use sport to get you to where you want to shoot and ultra stable tripod mode when you get there all from the remote. The tripod mode will move and rotate the drone to make smooth transitions even when you push the control stick all the way in a direction. I was not expecting that would work so well on a drone at this price, so pleased. The camera can be moved up and down from the remote as well giving you more creative angles. The follow me and orbit modes work well too.

The drone also has 60 fps mode where you can capture fast action easier in a little lower resolution or edit it to a slo mo effect video with basic video editing programs. I have only needed the 30fps as everything looks smooth in that mode to me so far, cars driving by or people running look natural and smooth. The E model of this drone adds the extra battery and electronic image stabilization. I am so happy with this drone!

UPDATE 11/28/22: Still loving this drone! So easy to switch between the smooth tripod mode and the faster modes. The altitude and distance limits are easy to set too to keep the drone closer to you when you want.

title: Amazing customer service
text: The customer service is impeccable! These guys really stand behind their products! That alone is priceless.

title: Easy to learn controls manual self explanatory
text: My drone would sometimes be unresponsive. Watched YouTube videos on the drone. Familiarized my self with controls read the manual and practiced in doors. Worked well first 3 flights. 4th flight drone working normally then just began to hover. Would not respond to controls would not return home. This lasted for about 2 minutes then flew off. I was fortunate to find it after it struck a tree and fell to the ground. Battery case cracked drone case cracked. Drone still works just a little apprehensive about flying it. That takes some of the joy out of flying.

title: Easy to use, affordable, good quality
text: I like the fact it is easy to use.  Go on line and look at some utube videos on the HS720E.  This drone has features found in more expensive drones.  It is also quiet.  I have had 2 friends buy them since I bought mine.

title: Very nice for the money
text: [[VIDEOID:f39a978d102cf2c9f53da3204fb4b64c]] I was pleased with the stability of this drone. And very happy to have got this one.

title: First rate product and company
text: This is a phenomenal product that superseded my expectations. Easy to control fun to fly and effective in video making and photographing. I give this five stars.

title: not the best
text: the drone hard to use the camera was nice and worked as intended however i broke mine first test flight

title: Holy Stone no more...fly away

title: Very cool machine
text: Fun beginner drone with great quality picture and smaller design very strong machine would highly recommend

title: Great product and customer service
text: Love our new drone! Holy stone is a great company, they make a well put together product and they have great customer service as well !!

title: Fantastic beginning drone with ultimate features.
text: I lucked out with this model, which has similar features as what the really expensive drones have.  This meets all my needs in a drone without the extreme expense of the high end models.

title: Amazing drone for amazing price!
text: This drone is way more than I hoped! For the price I was spending I was happy to get something mediocre but this blew my socks off!!!  Incredible stability when the drone is in the air and you don't touch anything.  Pictures and videos come out fantastic..  took it to the beach on a windy day and the drone is so good you wouldn't notice it was windy!

title: Easy to handle
text: Real simple and good for the money

title: 720e WTG Holystone
text:
This drone is one if not the best drone by Holystone thus far.
The image stabilization done with the new Sony Chipset is unbelievable. Very stable even with winds.
Super flight time with two batteries and a super case that came with it make this The Total Package.
It will hold a 128 gig card for many hours of recorded flight
By far one of the best drones for the money

title: Budget drone.
text: This drone went rogue on me after 20 minutes of flying it. After taking off and then circling around me in the sky for a few minutes it depleted its battery life and then tried to come back to me but ended up crashing into the side of my neighbors house. I lost complete control of the drone once it got about a hundred feet or so in the air. Very poor experience and I’m not the only one who has had this happen to me. Others have had similar situations. Save yourself the time and money and go with a better drone.

title: Was great until it wasn’t
text:
Was good fun, flew well. The gimble for the camera is clunky and if you care at all about your picture quality go with a 3 axis, but the drone is fun to fly. Just practice for me, lots of low level flying and obstacle avoidance so I did not us the pre flight programs much but found them lacking. The charger is horrible.
I was ready to give it 4 stars, knocking a star for the charger and the gimble, but I was out flying, hovering and slowly yawing at about 40-50’ to line up some costal views and the drone suddenly lost all power and dropped like a stone onto solid lava rock.
Yea, she done.

title: Extremely happy with the HS720E!
text: Absolutely amazing, no regrets, performs as advertised and as others have reviewed.  This is my first “real” drone.  Because it is so stable, it is super easy to control the drone even as a beginner.  Especially for the price, the EIS 8MB photos and 4K video are excellent.  Battery life for sure exceeds 20 minutes per battery.  The WIFi takes a little long to connect to my iPhone XS, but it always does connect.  Compass Calibration is easy and Auto Takeoff/Landing makes those critical moves a breeze!  The instruction manual is completely thorough.  I’m so excited to take it to more places and use the Orbit and TapFly features.  Completely satisfied!

title: Frustrating
text: Don't plan on using quickly!!! Not much for range..said it's around a 1/4 mile...good luck with that. Trying to connect...back  and forth with connect and not connect!! I'm two feet from it!!!!!!! Oh ya the phone holder is worthless if you have a phone case like most of us do

title: Price is Okay - Pictures or video quality is not good as expected
text:
[[VIDEOID:2c2f5b73200ce7d6e443277fa9cd1db9]] Package, design look good and price is fair:
Other than that here what I can say:
1. Delay to respond your command special move forward/backward and left/right. Sometime didn’t do anything
2. No wind restraint, therefore will be easy lose control when it didn’t respond your comment. Can’t bring to the beach.
3. The camera doesn’t good therefore pictures and video quality just like 480p or 720p. It can’t compare with pics from my phone (ex: iphone SE)
4. Follow me, follow path and other functions have delay too, about 4-10s
5. When it showed battery low be aware that it will stop fly immediately +_+

Update:
The customer service contacted me to say sorry and ask me all about the issues --> it makes me feel good how they care for customers. I updated my comment and plus 1* for customer service.

title: Mal video y estabilidad

title: Why all side pan shots jittery
text:
I am looking at everyone’s posts on how stable this is ... I watch there videos and the side rotation shots all look jittery
I am used to gimbal cameras and I don’t know it’s just bad pilot pushing joy stick to hard. Or lack of gimbal that causes this

My main concern is side tracking shots
I watched many videos posted here and no one seams to have a stable side pan shot?????

Has anyone used a orbit mode or can clarify ?

title: Better than you'd expect from a budget drone
text:
If you're used to higher end drones, you're going to notice a few things here
- the streamed view to your smartphone is kind of laggy
- most of the "smart drone" features doesn't really work (e.g. "follow me")
- the back left knob on the controller doesn't actually do anything
- you also need to run through calibration each time you run it
- no collision detection, and isn't suitable for indoor use
- they could use a better translator

That said... its also a fraction of the price of the high end ones. If you want a drone that does 90% of what you need, that comes bundled with all the accessories, that's cheap enough that you don't need to stress about breaking something you can't afford to replace, then you could do a lot worse than this one.

Things that work great:
- Camera works well enough for a someone familiar with Adobe software to make it look nice
- The GPS feature works correctly to keep the drone floating in place
- The image stabilization is good enough to get clear footage
- The Return to Home feature successfully brings it within a couple feet of its starting location
- Looks nice, not cheap - doesn't look like a budget drone
- When folded up, the size is only slightly larger than a PlayStation controller

title: The best!
text: Favorite drone ever! Compact, built well, long battery life, great maneuvers, high quality camera images- everything you could ask for including great prices and the best customer service around!

title: Great Drone.
text:
Just nought this awesome drone from Holy Stone. Even in high winds I was able to maneuver this drone with ease. Great battery life and a great drine if you are a beginner. Love the carrying case, extra battery, and blades.
I am looking forward to my journey as a new pilot drone!

title: Too many flaws.
text: Tried this drone twice and both drones had issues. The first one after charging the batteries for 5 hours each, watching to make sure that I didn't overcharge them, as soon as it took off the battery went from full charge to zero and the control would not respond because of low battery and the drone fell. Pulled the battery and it had melted as well as melted the inside of the drone. Gave Holy Stone another chance and the second one, after compass calibration and GPS lock on with 13 satellites, would continue to fly left on its own. The video feed cuts off around 200 yards also instead of anywhere close to the advertised 500 yards. Spent the extra money for the DJI Mini 2 fly more combo and WOW! The Mini 2 is absolutely grand!

title: High quality for reasonable price
text:
This drone has a solid feel, appears well built. The manual is clear and well illustrated. The Ophelia app is better than others. The drone flys, hovers, and maintains position well. Picture quality is good. I have not gone to a large enough clear area yet to try some of the features like follow me, point of interest, or tap fly. I expect they will work well like the rest of the system.

Good for beginners and adults.

title: Holy Stone made it right...
text:
This was my original review after purchasing this product:

Sadly I purchased this item as a gift. The recipient never told me it didn't work. Now nearly a year later I have no recourse. The drone won't identify the number of GPS points it needs to operate correctly, and so will not fly more than 2 feet without crashing. POS. I found a guy who has set up many drones, and he said it's garbage. So angry!

Holy Stone made it right. I was upset that my awesome gift wasn't so awesome and the warranty time expired by the time I became aware of the problem. So, I wrote that scathing review. I was checking my email about 1 1/2years after the purchased and realized the company was trying to reach me! WHAT?! I was surprised to say the least! I had just given up.

My email from Jana at Holy Stone let me know that if they have sold faulty product, they will do whatever it takes to fix it! When I responded to the email, it was less than a week before we talked through the situation, and I received a new drone.

I took it to my brother, for whom I had originally purchased it. It works perfectly and finally he has the birthday gift I had intended. I'm thrilled! I have never seen a company track someone down to correct a problem. Way to go Holy Stone! You are one of a kind, and I recommend you highly because you made it right!

Thank you!!!

title: Very nice 4k drone with image stabilization for starting out!
text:
You get a very nice adult starter drone for a reasonable price with the Holy Stone HS720e!
Brushless motors gives the drone a quieter flight and folds up nice and compact, Nice option on the drone is the landing lights, makes it easier to track in the day if your trying to locate the drone at a distance.
Controller is pretty straight forward and the manual gives a pretty good description of all of the controls.
This is a well built lightweight drone with 4k and 1080 video recording and the Sony image sensor really improves the stability of your video, (removes the "jello" effect). Small and light weight and easy to travel with in the included case.

title: holystone is great
text: best drone for the money

title: Do not trust the software or remote connection
text: I have had this drone for a few months, it ran great and took great photos and videos. I even had a good follow video of me in a boat. I did the update to the app and firmware update to the unit. The next day I started it up and it took off straight up. Then hard left to oblivion. The GPS shut off in less than 40 feet as it continued off into the city. Never was able to recover it or find it.

title: Still good flying
text: [[VIDEOID:cbf520cf89e5ff4540bf9819f83cb8a7]] It's been many months broke arms and fixed them several times. 1st the time broke the arm... I was desperate because just a few times I enjoyed it. I tried to find out how I fix it... But many reviewers who got the replacement parts comments are very difficult or never find out how to replace it. So I tried to fix it with epoxy and a glue gun... even use super glue. After several times it fixed well and it fly well as normal. There were 2 arms broken as photos. Even one arm can not fold, it doesn't matter flying well. Hope you have a drone like mine... I suggest using the super glue for immediately holding and using the epoxy to fix.

title: Great Product and Customer Support
text:
User friendly, beautiful images, and exceptional customer support. The quality of the camera is amazing. The video is remarkably stable .

The HS720E is the first drone I have ever flown and it is easy, the GPS, auto return, take off and landing feature make it easy to fly. Everything works great.
Their customer service has been very attentive and responsive. Based on this. I would consider purchasing other Holy Stone products.
I highly recommend this drone.

title: Dramatic Quality Control Issues
text:
I'll start out by saying that I was very excited to try this drone out. It's specs are impressive and the price point is right on. The build quality looks top notch and it initially took very impressive video. The drone hovers in place very well and with the aid of GPS is doesn't drift almost at all. It was quite solid.

Then the problems began.

I ordered my drone the last week of November. I didn't even get a chance to start using it until nearly the end of December. I was using the drone to take footage of our home being built. For the first 3 weeks, it returned a solid 9 flights. Didn't have any issues at all, rock solid and great 4K video. Then one day I took the drone out to the same place I had the previous 9 times, went through all the same motions of calibrating and such. Got the drone up in the air and started flying it away from me. About 20 or 30 feet away, it rotated about 180 degrees and would not allow for rotation with the remote. The right/left strife were extremely sluggish and lethargic. I hit Return to Home and it didn't do anything. Just sat and hovered there. The only thing it would do is elevate up and down, albiet very slowly. Since it was over a muddy area I wasn't able to land on the ground and since I couldn't get it to respond to anything else I had it land on my hand. Held the lock button for 3 seconds to force the propellers to turn off and...nothing. Would not turn off. I had to pull the battery out with the rotors spinning. Dangerous. I checked the drone out and couldn't find any issues. I then sent it up again and it did the exact same thing again. Again, I had it land on my hand and took it home to call it a day. A few days later I took it out again and hoped it was a fluke. I got the drone up and started moving it away from me and it TOOK OFF wildly out of control, full speed ahead. I tried to pull up with limited control and it flew into a tree, getting stuck up nearly 40 feet or so in the process. Eventually got the drone down and contacted customer service.

Since I was technically out of my 30 day warranty period by a week or so, customer service initially bucked. However, after a little correspondence, they agreed to send me a one-time replacement drone as a courtesy. I was over the moon, as they also just told me to keep the one I had for parts instead of returning it.

Fast forward a week later and I take the new drone out to our new home being built. Get it up in the air and it flys flawlessly. I'm pretty ecstatic to finally have a working drone again. No issues with the flight and everything appears to be going well.

And then I took it home and popped the SD card into our computer to look at the 4K video. It looked HORRENDOUS. The right half of the video was so blurry it looked like something done on a VHS camcorder. All the way on the far left of the video it was much sharper, although still not as sharp as the last drone was. I thought maybe I had a smudge on the lens or something so cleaned it off and tried it again. Nope. The camera was defective on my replacement drone I was sent. Just to make sure I wasn't being unrealistic, I put the SD card in the old drone and shot footage holding the drone then did the same with the replacement drone I was sent. The difference was completely night and day. My wrecked drone had crystal clear images and the blurry out-of-focus images on the new drone were still just as bad.

So once again, I headed back to customer service and told them the drone I was sent had a defective camera. I was sent through the same generic trouble shooting that involved wiping the lens off and making sure the lighting wasn't too low. I was told this despite having provided them the CLEARLY obvious differences of the 2 drones videos.

Sadly, I was ultimately told that my replacement was a courtesy one-time deal and that they could not help me anymore. I was completely dumbfounded. I mean stupefied. Here is a BRAND NEW drone, and it's trash now. Holy Stone doesn't apparently have an exchange program or even anywhere to have you send in defective drones for such purposes. If they can help you, they just send you another one and tell you to keep the old one for parts. Now, **don't get me wrong here**, as this is very nice of them to offer an additional $300 drone to make it right, but wouldn't it just make more sense to have them FIX the one that's bad? I don't need a new drone...just need them to look at this one. This tells me they aren't in the business of making repairable products...just selling more of it.

So somehow, after all the dust is settled, I'm left to a $300 hole in my wallet and 2 drones that BOTH aren't able to serve their purpose, neither of which was my fault or doing. The first one can't get further than 20 or 30 feet from you without turning 180 degrees and becoming unresponsive, and the other has a camera so bad that I might as well just slap a 2004 cell phone on the drone and record a video with that.

This product SHOULD get 1 out of 5 stars, but their customer service was willing to help me out the first time, although the replacement was also defective...but i'll give them another star for that reason.

This does make we wonder how many of these 5-star reviews actually are for a 5-star product, or just for 5-star service with being sent replacement drones.

Look through yourself. You'll see TONS of reviews mentioning how they were just sent replacement drones.

Probably going to just sell both of these 2 defective drones for parts and purchase a DJI like I was considering the first time around.

Strongly suggest you do the same. Quality control issues are highly irritating with this drone.

title: Great beginner adult drone for video and pictures
text:
Auto takeoff / landing, return home, orbit feature and follow me make this a no brainer. I needed simple drone for aerial video and photo of construction projects. Took 30 minutes to figure out how to use. Watched two videos online and I was talking video in no time.

Only reason for 4 stars is 5 hour battery charging time and awkward charger. Flight time is 20 minutes per charge per battery. Camera and video quality is excellent!

title: Awesome
text: Awesome product.  No problems.  GPS is a mustand it saved me many times.  Recommend for sure

title: amazing
text: it is easy to learn but not for beginers it is a little hard to figure out how to connect and take off but you get the hang of it. it is almost indestructible, i have hit the ceiling,crashed into a 9 meter high tree and let it fall, and hit other things and it still flies perfectly. it is really great for photography. wish the camera were a little better but overall its amazing

Picture and video quality is awesome and the drones features like Follow Me and Return to Home would great. I'm so glad I bought this over the more expensive drones out there.

Initially couldn't get Follow-Me or Waypoints modes to work, but after updating to newer iOS app, they both worked nicely.  Support is responsive and helpful.

title: Wanted to like it...
text: Everything about this drone SHOULD fit what your looking for IF it worked as it said it would. Unfortunately it doesn't. It didnt hover in one place very well, it would drift. The "return to home" feature did not work when losing signal, rather than flying up, it flew left and crashed into a tree. It lost signal in direct line of sight at about 300ft (resulting in said crash). My opinion, if your going to spend the $300 for this, just save a little more and buy the DJI drone you were looking at but decided to try and save some money on your new hobby by purchasing this one. That's exactly what I'm doing now.

title: Customer support has been very good
text: Good flying drone very stable in high winds. I like the heads up display on  the remote. Good drone for young and old alike.

title: It’s a good bang for your buck!
text: I purchased this based on the reviews and the fact that I do it want to spend $1k on a drone. This appeared it would meet my needs. When I received the drone, a battery was malfunctioning right off the bat. I called Holystone at 11:45pm and SOMEONE ANSWERED! Wow! Not only did they answer, they worked quickly to find a suitable solution for my issue. For customer service I give 5 STARS. I have flown the drone multiple times now. It is not the most stable drone on earth and that’s especially noticeable in a breeze/wind, but on a very calm day (when it’s best to fly drones anyways) this little guy is quite impressive. I would not use this drone for professional work, but it’s absolutely perfect for the recreational flyer and quite easy to learn especially if you’ve flown before. Overall, I would recommend this item and Holystone customer service.

title: The best
text: The customer service is out of this world experienced. Holly Stone is by far the best drone company out there, in price, quality and service surpassing the competitors. I recently had issues with my unit and no hassle, I got a replacement part for free. Amazing, really the best. Thank you very much Holly Stone team! Rose and Jhayza

title: Hard to fly
text: I have not been able to get  it off the ground yet!

title: Should have just bought a DJI
text:
Pros: Fairly straightforward and cheaper drone.

Cons: long charging time for batteries, poor response from controls, miserable customer service, extremely restrictive operating environment per Holystone guidelines.
So I bit of explanation needs to be done here. I purchased the drone and it arrived Labor day weekend. Flew perfectly first few times then the problems started. Drone started flying randomly in circles with no controller input. These circles would grow more and more erratic. Sometimes controller inputs would be accepted, many times not. Eventually the drone finally slammed into my truck, damaging the drone and denting my truck door. Called customer support... they asked me to send them a video multiple times of the flight. This video did not exist because I was not recording that flight. After the crash they requested that I do a test flight under what the considered "proper operating conditions". These included being at least 100 meters from ANY tree, building, structure, or vehicle. Customer support insisted that these were the only suggested operating conditions for their drones. I pressed them on this and they further clarified that these are the only conditions that their drones were made to operate in. These are unrealistic conditions for most locations that a drone would be useful or good to have, let alone anywhere that you could realistically find.
So logically one would think that just operating the drone close to the remote (within 100 feet) would work better, not true per customer support. Those same objects somehow interfere with the signal from the remote? Even a tree that emits no radio frequencies that is substantially further away from the drone than the actively connect controller. Again this is the explanation given by customer support.
Finally after multiple calls from support they declared there was nothing more they could do to correct the drone issues and told me to send it back to Amazon for a refund. To sum it all up folks, don't waste your time or money on holystone.

title: Fun while it lasted
text: This was my first higher end drone and it was great, easy to learn the controls, i was doing advanced maneuvers it just a few days. The camera is great. Just dont use it for low light settings, i tried to get pictures of a great sunset but the camera wasnt doing it any justice. But unfortunately after 2 weeks of use i was out flying for fun and one of the motors gave out mid flight and took a 30ft fall to the ground and busted the drone open and i was no longer able to fly. I ended up returning my drone for a refund. Fun while it lasted

title: Holy Stone, the Place To Buy It!
text: Look, there are lots of people selling drones and many are similar. The DEERC D22 I purchased from Holy Stone was not only as advertised it more than I expected. It is easy to use, perfectly balanced, and the camera takes incredible pics.  Holy Stone had the BEST customer service I have every experienced, hands down.  I had a problem with the drone, the issue was my fault---they replaced in 3 days!!!! No kidding.  These guys are on top of it and an absolute pleasure to deal with.  If you want not only a fun and interesting drone to fly but a company that stands behind what they sell, I highly recommend Holy Stone.

title: Precision Control in Very Compact Drone
text: This is my first Holy Stone drone and I'm incredibly impressed by  the way it flies! The low speed setting gives you surgical precision in rotation, and the joysticks operate the drone's movements predictably. For instance, you can move the joysticks just slightly and the drone responds in kind, instead of jolting into action. The high speed setting also feels totally easy to control. The hover is super steady. The controller has just the right amount of buttons, so as not to get confusing. It also holds my phone's rather bulky case fine and at a tilted angle that is comfortable to view. My favorite thing about this drone, aside from being extremely well-made, is how compactly everything fits into the carrying case. Everything you need to fly can be safely tossed into a backpack for hiking, including extra batteries! The manual is actually very thorough and in proper English. I'm super impressed by this company and the value they offer with their products!

title: I brought this for son for Father Day and now I’m really the best Mom!

title: Can't fly it after 9/13/2023
text: Everybody considering purchasing this should be advised that you can't fly this after 9/13/2023 without adding a remote id broadcast module to it.  It's over 255 grams so it will require RemoteID module after that date.

title: Good for the price!
text: The Drone works great. Flies well, and works well, the auto home features are nice. I wish the batteries charged a little faster but for the price, it's good!

The instruction manual is clear, I took my time learning how to fly it first. When I was comfortable handling the machine, I downloaded the Ophelia GO app on my android phone. The pictures are excellent and rival those I have seen from more expensive on Youtube. If you are looking for a drone that provides impressive pictures at an affordable price, this is the one for you.

title: Great drone and a great price!
text: We received our drone in excellent condition. And after reading and re-reading the manual we felt ready to take to the air. The instructions are easy to read and understand. We had a great flight and smooth landing. The pictures and videos it takes are very good. We are well pleased with this drone. It’s our first and has been easy to learn to operate and seems very well made. And we are very pleased with the great video we will be able to take. Looking forward to using our drone a lot!

title: A good quality product, at a reasonable price.

text:
I tried this and there's no self hover at all! You press the move to 5 ft and it just starts moving everywhere. It's nothing like any drone I've ever seen. It took less than 20 seconds to go over 100 yards away without touching the controller in less than 5mph wind!

0/10 I would give 0 stars if I could!

Maybe i got a bunk one? IDK but seriously try another one!

I believe this is the best drone created by Holy Stone, and the Holy Stone Company definitely has my respect. It also has some of the best Customer Service I’ve ever seen. This drone IS over 250 Grams though and will require Registration with the FAA and passing the “Trust” Test to operate. It’s worth it though to operate a drone of this quality though. 👍

title: They Honestly Try
text:
I originally purchased the HS720. After a couple of issues, I upgraded to the H720E. It is well worth it for the electronic image stabilization. The product did develop issues in the return to home process and was promptly issued a replacement This one works flawlessly.
**UPDATE: I have to tip my hat to the customer service department. They sent me a replacement drone immediately. The effort to resolve the issue is rarely seen and for that I must congratulate. I really hope this drone works. The video images were really spectacular. I will return with future updates. The 5 stars are for as they say "A for effort"

text: Great drone.  Very easy and fun to fly (my first drone). Lots of features.  Really like the return to home feature.  Video and camera quality are excellent.  EIS works great.  Will definitely recommend.

title: good
text: I love this little drone. absolutely love it. I wish the video feed would last for longer but it seems to do very well. I am only able to make it about 700 ft though on a clear day on the top of a mountain with nothing blocking the signal. after that it seems like the remote might be losing its connection a little bit.

title: Wonderful little drone. Love the case
text: Wonderful little drone, I travel alot and my Phantom 3SE was getting to bulk to handle, this drone with the included case will fir in my carry-on perfectly, pretty simple to operate and the pictures and video from the SD card are great, only issue I had was my S20 Ultra is to big for the phone holder so I bought a older cheap phone just for the drone off ebay.

title: Well worth the money
text:
This was a great buy. The drone is better than i thought it would be. I thought there was an issue with one of the batteries, come to find out i just needed to flip the USB plug over. I contacted customer service and within 24 hours I received a replay offering to help me with anything that may be wrong.
Highly recommend Holy Stone products.

title: Wanted to love this drone but something is wrong.
text:
I took the new drone on a quick flight on a sunny day nearly 60 degrees. I flew up and around the yard just fine and so after a short time, I landed it. I figured it was slightly windy so I wouldn't take a chance that day. The next day was to be the same kind of day except with no wind. So the next day I started to fly the drone and that's when things went haywire. Now keep in mind that prior to the flight, I did the gyro calibration and the gps calibration and everything checked out fine. I pressed the takeoff button. It went slowly up to 5 ft but then started flying directly at me and since I was in my driveway to give it a good pad to takeoff and land on, it was close to my house. So, I had to quickly make it go up and from there I could not get control. It flew to the edge of the yard, nearly missing some trees and then around front where it crashed into a line of trees at full speed. Needless to say, it is pretty badly damaged.

Holy Stone had been very good with their customer service and I really, really wanted to like this drone. But in the end, there must be something flawed with the drone or the control software. It makes no sense that I do everything correctly and one day it flies just fine but the next it goes haywire. And with 13 satellites (yes, I made sure to note that before the flight), it should not have had these issues. They told me that flying next to the house is not recommended as your phone can try to connect to your home network. My phone did not do that. It was still connected to the drone even after it crashes. I just wanted my money refunded since this was the replacement drone from the first one that did nearly the same exact thing. As far as I can see, this drone model is defective. I guess that's what I get for trusting inferior Chinese made products. And now it seems that I am just past my refund window so I'm out $300. Never again, Amazon.

title: Definitely you need a Third battery!!!
text: Awesome drone! Great stability I feel like a pro after this take of and LANDING!

title: I'm in drone heaven!!!
text: [[VIDEOID:491832f4740e5882355236554a9d56cd]] This drone is an AWESOME drone for beginners as it is VERY durable and forgiving. The range and camera are phenomenal. Absolutely I have no complaints!

title: Good customer support.  Great follow up
text: Quick customer support.  A good learner drone.  Easy to operate.

title: Make sure you connect to GPS. Flys great and stable.
text: Thoroughly enjoyable. Great for beginners.

title: Awesome drone!
text: This product was brought bought for my husband. He loves the handling, video footage, and drone. He said, "it's so easy, a kid can it." The only set back, when you use high speed, it cuts the flight time in half.

title: Cheap product for Expensive price
text:
First flight was great! Second flight two weeks later it will not rotate to turn and drifts into a tree breaking the camera gimble. I own a DJI Phantom 3 and I know how to fly a drone. 20 mins of fun cost me $300.
Cheap junk! Worst part is I have to let my kids know that their birthday present to me is going on the trash!!!! Do NOT waste your money!

title: Outstanding, fun, and reliable drone
text:
I finally got a moment to flight this drone last Sunday. When it took off from the grass, the stability is astonishing, especially it was a windy day. My other drone was blown away while this one stayed nicely. The set up was also very easy. It came with a carry box, the box is tiny and I can put it in almost any backpacks. The camera can be adjusted while flying, and it adjusts smoothly.

The control has its own screen for different meters, battery for the drone and the control, speed meter, condition indicators. It’s a very nice, and fun toy.

title: GREAT DRONE FOR PRICE AND GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
text:
Bought this drone back in December and started flying it around recently in February on some nice days.
One day, during my 3rd flight of the day, my drone simply just flew off and could not be found. (Which if you hook your phone up it will give you a detailed flight path) but sadly I did not have my phone hooked up and could not find the drone.

So I emailed customer service and after answering some of their questions and telling them exactly what happened I was sent a new replacement! The customer service ladies were all amazing to work with and very polite!
My new drone does everything it should with no problems once so ever. This is a fantastic drone for the price if you are looking to for a budget friendly drone to learn on!

title: Best For The Money
text:
The Drone itself is great, but comes with a learning curve.
BUT the best part is the company itself- This is my second drone from Holy Stone, and the customer support is THE BEST.

title: buy dji mini se or mini 2.
text: don’t bother with this.  there is no comparison between dji mini se or mini 2.  Dji se is same money and stable as a rock.  excellent pic quality. 12 mega pix photo.  the 720 is not stable and uses wi fi which cuts out.  dji has its own system for communication to drone.  my mini se goes 3 miles mini 2 goes about 5 miles clear as a bell.  try that with 720.  i had both and wasted my time with the 720 before returning.

title: Sturdy, Fun, Easy to learn, Amazing pictures
text:
[[VIDEOID:4706833e5c133c874ca80c9898b28a14]] This drone is great. I am as much of a beginner as you can be. I have only owned "toy drones" the kind that you can fly inside and last about 5 minutes each battery.
This drone practically flies itself. The directions are clear and easy to understand, all the buttons on the controller are labeled correctly and as diagramed in the directions.
I have gone to a height of 150 feet so far and it was still connected via its own wifi to my phone. I have flown it around a corner and out of sight and still had control, and when i hit the return to hime, the drone raised itself up and then flew to directly overhead! Then one more press and it landed itself.
there is also a sport setting which is more like "playing" because it is very fast and responsive and really feels like im living in the future!!!

Also, support is fast and responsive. I had a question about the extra propellors and was answered same business day, with a follow up the next day.

I am by no means an expert on drones, and cannot speak to this as compared to other drones, but this is pretty badass!!

(also, i managed to crash mine by trying to fly it into and inside my garage, and even though it crashed and flipped upside down, the drone itself still functions perfectly!!!)

title: Very good product
text: Very good product

title: Beginners delight!
text: First off, this is my first drone and first time to EVER fly one.  I read the owners manual.  Spent 30 minutes on  a drone simulator app.  Watched 5 or so videos on it.  Opened box and I was flying!  Gave me incredible confidence immediately.  Sored 380 ft and took amazing pictures, at night.  I don't know the proper terminology,  but if it was a car, I would say it handled like it was on rails lol.  The "follow me" feature worked perfectly.  (Have not tried the other features yet)  I hated to give only 4 stars, but when you wait 5 HOURS for one battery to charge so you can play for 23 minutes,,,,,,,obviously that is a lost star.  So to fulfill my newly found appetite for flying drones, I've ordered 3 more batteries (2 does come with it) and a additional two port charger.  But that just shows how much I think of this drone.  Delivered fast! Awesome hard shell case comes with it too.

title: Superior Customer Service from Holy Stone
text: After less than a month, my drone kamikazeed. You can see the result.  After a brief investigation by Holy Stone, and they were assured that I had followed pre-flight instructions, they are sending me a complete new drone.  Can't beat that kind of service.  And they make great drones.  I have several of their drones, and they all work great.

title: Honesty is the best policy
text: I am a first time drone Flyer… If you read the directions and you watch a lot of YouTube videos on this drone… before you fly....... You will do yourself a huge favor… there is  a ton of information out there and you should get as much information as you can… That said ...I LOVE THIS DRONE....Clear pictures........ stable in a decent breeze…EASY TO FLY.... Just plain fun… use common sense when you fly it ..........that's all you need to know… Try not to hit anything and you'll be just fine... mine flew away through no fault of my own and disappeared… The customer service was more than wonderful… I explained my situation and they are going to send me a new one…… update… They did send me a brand new one… Complete with batteries and controller and drone… Fantastic customer service… I only had had the drone for four days… Got it for my birthday… Thank you to Holy Stone customer service

title: Great every level drone
text: This is an Amazing little unit. If you’re wanting to try a drone out but dont want to spend $1000. This is your answer with almost an hour of flying time, a mild wind resistance and camera to get the job done.

title: Excellent entry level drone
text: This Drone is easy to fly. The set up is easy and there are many supplemental videos on YouTube to get started. The Picture is excellent quality and very stable.

title: Definitely for a Beginner for a child. A little too basic for a beginner adult
text: The Drone was pretty easy to learn to fly. Once the controls were learned and I felt confident to send it away I realized just how basic it was. Very slow moving, slow responses to controls in general. This product is too expensive for what it is. I should have researched more and read reviews before purchasing.

title: Worth the money and fun to fly
text: Nice drone for the price. Easy to fly and the instructions are clear.

title: Feedback as a Beginner - This is the right first purchase
text: I've been looking for a quality drone at an affordable price for a beginner for a few months.  I've read a lot of reviews and finally made the decision to purchase the HS720E by Holy Stone.  The reviews were positive and the features were impressive for the price.  I was able to get familiar with flying quickly and I've been impressed by the drone.  It's easy to fly, the camera quality is good, it's super nice that it comes with two batteries and the case is a nice bonus.  If you are new to flying a drone this is a good option for a first purchase.  I was making videos of my home and neighborhood on day one of using it.  I'm looking forward to gathering more great footage from the Holy Stone in my travels.

title: Good Easy Drone to use
text:
I got this drone to fly with my grandfather about a year ago. Very easy for both of us to fly. We had a lot of fun with it when I was with him. But on it's probably 16th hour if flight, a prop shot of mid flight. The drone plunged to the ground and shattered.

We've had the thing for over a year, and we never checked the props, so it's probably our fault. But it still seems poorly made that after only 16 hours or so it fell to the ground.

title: Great customer support
text: The HS720E is a great little drone for beginners like me, it’s easy to fly and Holy Stone has a great customer support team they are friendly and unlike most other customer support they are very easy to contact.

title: Love it!
text: Love it. One of the best drones that I own. You won’t regret buying it

title: Nice case, spare battery. Nice drone.
text: Beautiful drone! I am very pleased so far. It wasn't hard to set up with large, easy to read instructions. I just received it today, and did a test run, and it handled nicely with very little swaying. Maybe it's because I didn't calibrate the compass before lift-off. Battery life seems good. Suppose to last about 25 minutes. But, the also include an extra battery for a longer flight time. It has alot of features such as RTH, and "Tap to Fly." It also has a "follow me feature." For the price, I think that you would get alot for your money. Mine cost $299.00. It even comes with spare propellers, and a very nice case.

title: Should include SD card
text: For $15 extra dollars you should have just included an SD card instead of having us buy one.

title: come with nice bag
text: i love holly stone products... specially this one because it come with 2 batteries and 2 speed and the video are 4k .. so easy to control and to Connect to the phone

title: nice drone
text: i like the quality and i use it for a hobbie

title: Holy Stone HS720E
text:
[[VIDEOID:48da4591845846d5994cb1e390735f0d]] I have had this for 5 days and flown it twice so far. First thing I will say is take it out of beginners mode..
Camera seems good, still have more to learn / tweak.
All in all it is a great drone for your first 4k

title: fun easy drone for beginnersCalibrate
text:
I really like this drone I think it’s great ! I love the nice case that it comes in . its a complete set up and you don’t need anything else . Although I did buy a landing pad. I don’t know if it’s because of the update but the really bad part about this is the range the drone has. you loose video signal very quickly. I’ve been watching YouTube videos and trying to figure out how to get the maximum range. I heard it flies a little further out blindly. It stops recording the video and broadcasting it on your cell phone but when you view the card on the drone itself it will still capture the distance.
The distance is a little disappointing and a major setback . I’m hoping it gets fixed somehow I heard it worked before an update not sure if thats true. I’m going to contact customer service if they explain to me a way to get for the range and I will update the review. But the drone still is a lot of fun and great for beginners . I fly it practically every other day. I didn’t see online you could buy a Wi-Fi extender and give the drone further range .
It has a great Stabilizing camera and video with the stabilizer it’s very enjoyable watch. easy to operate just slide in the battery unfold the drone Calibrateand and let it launch! there’s really nothing to it. The drone is also incredibly stable in flight even though they don’t advise it I’ve taken it out on some seriously windy days and it stabilizes great.
It also has some cool features like follow me and circle around. The return home works great also.

title: Unruly rogue drone
text: I flew the drone three times.  Flight one was a simple take-off to an altitude of 5 ft AGL followed by simple maneuvers.  Second flight was about 20', again, simple maneuvers.  Third flight I intended to go to approximately 200' and maneuver around the area; the drone took off to the east and I never saw it again.  I contacted the vendor and they offered me 30% and then 35% off my next purchase, I asked for either a new drone or volunteered to return the accessories for a full refund.  They refused.  Don't waste your money on this product, it's defective and they won't stand behind it.

title: Works perfectly as described
text: My first drone I was overwhelmed at first because of the hieght and distance it has that I lost eyesight of it but good thing it has the return home feature and it works getting better at flying a drone love it will recommend oh and camera take clear and steady images.

title: great product for the price
text:
very easy to fly, takes great photos, used for recreational fun and love it
ATTN: Jhayza

title: Great, easy to fly drone!
text: [[VIDEOID:aa276fe8105cb0d6927ba9ea1733ba44]] Been flying it now for a few days and it works tremendously well. Drone and all components are well made and are continuing to hold up, even with some minor bumps on my part! Handling and responsiveness is terrific. The one attached video I took was during some decent wind gusts and even with, the drone was very stable. Image quality, which was my major concern when buying this, is absolutely fantastic. 4K pictures and video are terrific, and you can tell that the electronic image stabilization works very well! Battery life is great also, and having two batteries is perfect for having more run time. Would highly recommend!

title: No thanks
text: The quality of these photos was terrible. When you couple that with the difficulty this drone has to get calibrated, it’s just a major disappointment. So many other options, I returned this and saved $100 for another like-featured drone.

title: my first drone
text: All I can say is thank you for this drone HS

title: Nice drone.
text: Easy to learn.  Camera isn’t too bad either. My first drone and it has made me want to go right back out and fly.

title: Would recommend to anyone
text: Love it my wonderful wife got this for me just because and it works great.  Easy to use and understand

title: Awesomeness
text: Awesome product. No problem with anything

title: Great drone, but not a toy!
text: Love the power behind it, wish it had longer flight time.

title: Easy Startup
text: This drone is great. The packaging is compact and you get everything you need to get up and flying. While the battery was charging I read the manual and familiarized myself with the controls. When the battery was charged I took the drone outside and got started. I followed step by step from Pairing to One Key Takeoff/ Landing. The drone was in the air in less than 10 minutes. I didn't spend a lot on time in front of my house because I live in a forested area and there are too many trees. After loading the pictures and videos on my computer I was a little disappointed. They were OK but not what I expected. Let me give you a tip. Tade the clear film off the camera lens. Second try, nice. I flew the drone in a field near my house this morning at 7 am and the pictures and videos were good as long as the camera wasn't pointed near the sun. At this price, you will not be disappointed with this drone. PS My videos are too big and I can't download them. I will update this when I can make some shorter videos or find out how I can download the longer ones.

title: Perfect drone for a beginner with quality parts as the customer service is just as fantastic by far
text: I use it for Mtb biking and just plain good fun flying

title: Stopped Flying after 3rd flight
text: My drone no longer flies.  This drone took almost two days to charge one battery and flying this this was easy, however the flight time was not as long as advertised.  The last flight I took my drone for it did what it wanted to to.  I could control the height but not the direction so I just sent it into the air as high as it could to not hit anything.  It went away and i lost connections it did come back i was shocked and crash landed sort of and it is no longer able to fly.  I ordered a replacement so I'll give it another shot and update.  $300 is still a lot of money I did not see anywhere near this value for what I got out of this drone so far.

title: Drone
text: Fun to use exploring the area

title: WOW…WOW…WOW…WOW…
text: [[VIDEOID:2a49770ae3f7f1a2601323de003e0f7f]] WOW….WOW….WOW… This is one of the best Drones I’ve had in a long time. Everything is great, price, quality, performance etc… the only thing I did was get more batteries and blades, bought this case here on Amazon, its 2 layers deep. Put everything I needed to go around town and the beach to fly this thing. I got one of those large backup reserve batteries (DBpower) here on Amazon thats in the lower section of the case. Now, with that and 4 batteries i can spend the day at the beach flying this baby.

title: Great drone.
text: This is my first drone. I really like how easy it has been to learn how to fly. The only knock I would say is that the batteries are hard to get into the charger and keep them in the charger but other than that small thing, I love it.

title: Great times. Great pics when connected. Then RTH function failed and drown in water.
text:
UPDATE: A few days after my review I received a message from customer support, apologizing for the drone malfunction and an offer for a new replacement. I received the HS720E within a day or two and couldn't be happier about the customer service. So far so good, RTH function and all. One suggestion for probably all drones, its best to make sure your phone is on full power. Throughout the day my phone is usually on midpower so...I believe the connection and esp the camera commands sync better from distance. Thanks for your assistance Holy Stone!
--------------
Headline says it all. Once you learn to take it off beginner mode me and this drone had good times. Even helped me surf fish in addition to taking great pics; Although the phone and drone connection wasn't consistent from any real distance. Then yesterday, disappointedly, while flying around the Harbor the battery function beeped, the drone went into automatic Return Home mode but it just lowered, and lowered until in landed on surface of water and sunk. That sucked.

title: Satisfied customer 🙂
text:
I got a infective drone. I couldn't get no one from holy stone to understand my drone was not working properly. But they was fast to email me back. But I contacted Amazon and they sent me a new drone and it worked perfectly.

This a drone for beginners and for amateurs. I do recommend this drone to anyone that needs low cost but a good drone for the money. Remember if you are new to the drones this drone must be registered with the FFA. It only cost me $5 for 3 years. Must be register before first flight.

title: Not off to a great start. 1st drone defective
text:
I am an experienced r/c plane and drone user (40+ years). Received this HolyStone HS720E and fully charged both batteries. Did 4 short test flights to a max height of 62 metres with no issue. Battery had 50% power left. Charged battery completely and attempted a higher flight. At 99 metres directly overhead, the transmitter started beeping loudly and rapidly, and the drone literally fell out of the sky.
It was badly damaged but would still boot up and connect to transmitter. While trying to read any telemetry that may have been captured, the transmitter started beeping again as the drone had shut itself down. Battery was at almost complete charge per lights on battery and indicator on transmitter.
I have since read and seen on YouTube that others have had this same experience.
I am VERY fortunate the drone was overhead as I would never have been able to recover it if it was any distance away horizontally.

title: Camera not working and does not connect to the app
text: The camera is not working and it is not connecting to the ophelia go app. I think it is defective. I've tried everything. I will be returning this if it still will not connect

title: Control remote no good
text: Control is very simple no 360 no speed on the drone and is hard to adapt the phone into the remote

title: Fun Drone, nice camera
text: First time ordering a Holy Stone Drone, and first of awesome experience, easy to setup, nice design n look, material is good quality, came with extra battery n parts. Only had a bit of trouble starting the drone off and battery takes to long to charge almost 7-8hrs. Best is to leave it charging overnight.

title: Calabrite, sequence sight problem,four me.
text: Lose control ,in small space areas.but still amazed,from a geek to a geek,worth 10 stars

title: Great for beginners
text: Great little drone for beginners. Its easy to use and will take some abuse.

title: Beginner friendly
text:
Great as a beginner drone. Easy to fly and the follow/trail options are easy to use*. My wife bought it as a gift for me and it's been really fun.

*The follow feaute didn't work on my iPhone for some reason but did work for my wife's Android. Tried troubleshooting but couldn't get it to fix.

title: Having a great time.
text:
I'm a first time drone owner and I believe this is a great machine to start with. I can't imagine needing to go to a more expensive model.
I gave this 4 stars for "Easy to learn" because you must read the instructions, maybe two or three times. Which brings me to the instruction book. The small well bound and slick 124 page book of instruction printed in English, German, Spanish.......the small print runs into the binding which make it very hard to read, however the website is easy to navigate and easy to download a PDF version in my language only.
This machine is very well engineered and of excellent quality. The drone itself is easy to operate however I'm still working on practice with the remote to build muscle memory.
For the difference in cost be sure to buy the E model that give 4K movies whereas the HS720 only give 4K still shots. I haven't ever used the 720 but I'm told the the E model has extra stabilization built in.

title: After a bit of use, I wished I saved my money
text: I’ve been using this drone off and on for a little while now and I’m not extremely happy with the results that I’ve gotten. The video quality does not seem to be 1080p. Most things have a good bit of blur to them. In addition, the picture constantly cuts in and out. Lastly, the range does not seem to go anywhere near what is represented in the description. Unfortunately, I wished I saved some more money up and gotten a better product.

title: Autopilot right for a fixed structure
text:
When I first flew this unit I thought wow how easy. Nice slim look decent picture and video and it handles nicely.
However I had it follow me and that is where thing went wrong. I moved about 5 feet and the drone adjusted by flying to the right 20+feet into a pole. This of course brought the drone to a crashing halt. Crashed so hard that it broke the front arm. I now have a useless drone all because I wanted to try the follow me function for action videos.

title: Great Little Drone
text:
This is a fantastic little drone, well worth the price. It is easy to fly, lots of features, most of which you can only get on higher priced drones. I got it up and running in about 10 minutes and it flies nice and straight, it's fast and the 20 minute fly time is great. If you are looking for a budget drone with lots of features, you couldn't do better than this for the price.

Edit- After having it for 4 days, as I was flying it, it took off, on its own to the left at full speed (an issue mentioned in a lot of youtube comments) and i could do nothing about it, it shut itself off when it hit a building and the battery broke and fell out. I assume it was a suicide attempt. It is a really nice drone, when it works, but be very careful, but one nice thing, Holy Stone does have a warranty so if it happens, they will replace it. After this incident, I decided to go with the DJI Mavic mini

title: Drone uncontrollable
text: Drone flight not stable, is uncontrollable beyond 30 feet despite repeated attempts to recalibrate;  customee service was very helpful,, company fully backed their drone and sent a new drone out immediately. Drone as advertised and more

title: DO NOT BUY!!!  Piece of garbage!
text:
DO NOT BUY!!! Drone flies terribly. After ten minutes it crashes on its own. Do not buy!!! It takes off on its own when your flying. Return to home went down the street and landed.

Save your money and DO NOT BUY this drone!!!
Customer service is horrible. Trust me, you will be sorry if you buy this drone.

DO NOT BUY!!! BEWARE before you buy! DO NOT BUY product is a piece of junk.
