title: Great drone and great price
text: This is my first drone outside of playing with the little cheapos the family kids get for Christmas. I love it. It's really easy to learn. It has a beginners mode that really helps out as it limits how high and how far you can fly it. I feel like I'm getting more than 23 minutes out of my batteries. I'm blown away by the video quality and range on this for the price. One thing I'd be carful of, the instructions say you can fly it inside...I wouldn't suggest an indoor flight for a beginner...luckly the drone survived.

title: Easy to learn, Great photo and video quality
text: I purchased this for the video and photo quality that we'll use on our many hikes.  I found this very easy to learn to operate.  The remote control and app are also easy to learn.  The 720E is also very durable as I found out after crashing it into our Christmas tree and a shrub and wall in the backyard while learning to fly it.  It still flies great.  Finally there is excellent customer support for the 720E.  They respond immediately to any and all questions.  I highly recommend the Holy Stone 720E as an adult beginner drone.

title: Very good drone for the price. Awsome seller.
text:
This is a well constructed drone, easy to fly, very usefull features using the GPS, it hovers easily and steady even with some wind. Not recommend this drone for beginners flying indoors because it does not have propeller guards and does not have obstacle avoidance sistem, good footage can be obtained with its camera, 4K videos are stored in the micro SD card. Good fly time. Landing lights are a very nice feature. Worth the money. Best option in that range of price.

About the seller: Awsome seller, at the beginning I had a problem with the drone so I cantacted seller and received a quick answer and a solution for my problem beyong my expectations. I am very happy with this purchase. I totally recommend buying to this seller, good business.

title: Awesome
text: So im used to the little 30 dollar drones, it was a big risk for me to buy a 300 dollar drone. I've had it for 2 days now and I have to say, I freaking love it. The range is incredible. From my front porch I can fly it alittle over 3/4 mile before I lose fpv. The drone itself goes farther. The 4k camera takes great pictures and video. I flew it yesterday in front of a tornado storm system and got good footage. It seems to be really stable in flight 250 ft up in winds around 20mph. For a beginner I highly recommend. Holystone has impressed me with the hs720e.

title: Great bargain and great post sale service
text: The drone is especially easy to learn and though I had a small hiccup after I received it customer service was above and beyond and took care of the issue immediately. I’m anxious to try out the follow me mode when I take the jeep out this summer off-road! Highly recommend!!

title: Good first drone
text:
Good first drone. Easy to fly and has many features that more expensive drones do not.
Update: The drone started to not hover in place and caused a crash. Holy Stone sent me a brand new drone and this one seems to fly much better. This company has excellent customer service.

title: HS720E Stable videos
text: [[VIDEOID:765d85c7665780a80a2a305a6f9e9b0f]] I've liked the Optical Flow feature in the past and am impressed how stable this is for video even in 4k.

title: Great drone for the money!
text: The drone is great! Easy to fly with the remote and the one touch features make taking off/landing a breeze. The issue I had was with the app. Mainly the FPV connection. It cuts out at a distance which is to be expected but when I brought the drone back into range, the wifi would not reconnect until I landed and went through the pairing process again. Not sure if this was an issue with my phone or the update made to the app. Other than that, the video and picture functions work well. I would definitely recommend this drone for the price.

title: Now this is fun!
text: Now this is fun. Not a professional class drone but, for the money does a lot. Battery takes forever to charge. Find an open field to start playing around with it. Also not recommended that you fly in high winds. Easy set up. Have to register it with FAA but, fairly easy and inexpensive to do. Nice protective case included. Buy more than one battery for sure.

title: Awesome step up from the "toy" drones

It's easy to learn, and features like return to home and GPS positioning provide greater confidence when pushing the drone out to its limits for distance and make it easy to control for some nice photography.

title: Just a fantastic drone.
text: Wow.....simply a fantastic drone. Much higher quality than expected. Came with a very nice case and spare battery. Instructions were simple and clear. I was up and flying in 20 minutes and it's my first drone. Video stabilization is fantastic!

Easy for a beginner to use and learn.
Fun to operate and easy to take care of with the case it comes with.

title: High quality reasonably priced.
text: My second Drone from Holy Stone it’s tremendous even the packaging is attractive. I fly with a person who payed twice the price the Holy Stone 720 stands tall. Stable steady flight, precise controls and fast. The clarity of the camera is outstanding it’s just so very cool looking. I’m 70 years old and at time I need assistance with set up and Holy Stone has been there for me and that’s extremely important. I highly recommend this product and their service and customer support Thank You Holy Stone.

title: "Eis" electronic image stabilization makes video and photo's professional quality
text: This is my first real drone! I did have one of those $30 trial drones, I will call it, that barely functioned, and flew for maybe 8 minutes at a time, if it didn't crash first.  I wanted to step up to a semi professional model that wouldn't break the bank and give me good results for shooting video. I did get my drone part 107 certificate with the idea that I could use the HS 720e for some basic flight footage to help tell stories, and I am pleased to say that the "E" makes the difference.  Without it, video is not stable enough and there is a "jello" effect, which is not usable, in my opinion. I also needed a 4k image which the 720e has. This drone is a great value for the money spent.

title: Fantastic Drone for the price!
text: I bought this to preview properties that are either hard to navigate from the street or for getting a better overall view.  Easy to use out of the box, great tutorials and compact! comes with a tough case and spare parts.  Definitely great for what I paid, decent camera - meets my needs.  :-D

title: The drone  is great, but not the seller.
text: The drone is great. It’s robust, and the small package makes it easy to transport. I had a replacement sent to me, as the first one was used A LOT. This is a seller issue, and have nothing to do with the drone itself.

title: 1st Drone
text:
This is the first drone that I have ever purchased. After watching a few videos on YouTube and reading the manual I found it really easy to use.
The pictures and videos that I've taken from this drone are incredible. For the 1st few month's I had no problem with the drone but after a while I started to have a few problems getting it to cut off.
There were a few instances when I landed it in high grass & it flipped, it tried to shut it off per the instructions manual but the propellers just wouldn't stop spinning.
The only way I could get the propellers to stop was by pulling the battery out. I reached out to Holystones customer service and they were very helpful.
I was giving a few tips to try after those failed I was told to send my drone in. With in no time they sent me a replacement.
I was really shocked at how quick the responded and how soon I received a replacement, the customer service is incredible.

title: Camera is biggest improvement over the HS720
text:
[[VIDEOID:ee66941e9d3a0bdc87f4706a0d1844a6]] I liked my HS720 a lot and was looking to get a second drone and found their new HS720E model. They biggest improvement over the HS720 model is the quality of the camera (camera angle adjustments are way smoother and the image stabilization works awesome). The difference in price for the HS720E is worth it. Below is my original review of the HS720 (which still applies to the HS720E).

This drone has exceeded my expectations. I was originally looking at the Mavic Mini and then ran across this model by Holy Stone. After further research and actually contacting Holy Stone I gave the HS720 a try. Sure glad I did. I spent less on the HS720 and got features the Mavic Mini did not have. I highly recommend this model as it has a no risk trial period and is packed with nice features for the price point. The battery charge time may be a bit longer than some desire, however it is at a price point where you can afford additional batteries and get some nice features that a Mavic Mini does not have. BTW, the Mavic mini does not have a 4K camera and the HS720 takes awesome video and photos.

title: Nice drone, not for beginners, Ophelia App is Horrible
text:
Since I'm not writing a review on the Ophelia GO app, I will only let its poor quality reflect a little bit on this review. However, since the app is crucial for operating the drone to its fullest, I think it's important to mention it here.

The drone
The HS720E is a pretty good drone, basically at the upper end of the budget drone market. You can easily find much better drones for about $50-100 more. But for the price, it's pretty good value. Plus, when you factor in getting two batteries and the case, controller, etc, it seems like a good deal.

That said, I do not recommend this for beginners. I know this for sure, since I've got two daughters, 7 and 10, and they are beginners. They can't fly this thing, not without my close supervision. They can, however, fly the HS210 and the DeeRC D20. Those two are beginner drones. What does that mean? Well, it means if they loose control and fly it into a house or car, it won't cause that much damage. The HS720E, on the other hand, weighs in at more than 500g with the battery. This means if you loose control, this could cause some serious problems. That along with the slight lack of responsiveness (eg, there is some latency when changing directions, speeds, etc and this takes getting used to) makes this a drone that requires some better eye hand coordination and sharper reflexes.

You can fly this drone without the mobile app and it's quite fun. In fact, I recommend this, in order to get the hang of it and get a feel for how it flies. Then, after you are comfortable with flying, then try the mobile app. You can more fully enjoy the video and photos after you are comfortable with the drone and its controls.

The camera
The video and photos are pretty nice. I really like getting way up there and taking aerial shots and collecting cool video. This part of the drone is pretty nice. Can't complain, good quality. The only minor issue is that the camera control is not that smooth. If you activate a change in rotation is seems to move in increments rather than smoothly changing direction. This gives a step-wise feel to things.

On to the app
IMO, the app is pretty bad. Or the connection between the app and the controller and the drone is pretty bad. I'm running a nice modern mobile device, with Android 10, so I'm pretty sure it's fine. I've flown this drone about a half dozen times, and I have experience three MAJOR problems that cause me some concern:

1. The follow me and orbit me functions don't work consistently. I had to keep trying over and over to get them to kinda work. And one time, the follow me function malfunctioned and the drone took off across a field without my control. The drone went down about 100 yards away but I thought it was going to fly off and get lost. The Wi-Fi and GPS were strong throughout this process and the emergency shut-off didn't work.

2. The app continuously looses Wi-Fi despite having clear line of sight and only being no more than 100 yards out. I've been flying this in a large park field, so it's possible that surrounding area homes' Wi-Fi are interfering. But then again, I'd imagine HS should have considered this and built in precautions...

3. The app defaults to beginner mode over zealously. It seems like every time the drone is unlocked the app resets to beginner mode, despite me changing it and saving the setting. Often, out of the blue, the drone will just stop responding (at about 20 yards out), and I look to the settings and the beginner mode is on again! Why!? I understand this is a safety precaution, but it's actually more dangerous when the app or devices changes without the user knowing it. One time this happened to me, and I almost lost control of the drone.

I'm hoping that the app update fixes some of this. I'll keep troubleshooting and hopefully my HS720E experience improves. If I run into too much more trouble, I may have to bite the bullet and try another brand (eg, like DJI).

title: Nice drone package
text: This was a gift for my adult son.  He loves it!  He had no problems or issues with getting the drone to fly.  The video quality is good too.  All in all, it’s well built and flies great.  The only issue was getting his iPhone XR to fit onto the remote.  It fit but just barely.  If you have a large phone, it may not.

title: Fantastic drone.  Great value for the money.
text: The drone is an incredible experience.  Easy to use, quick to learn, and surprisingly powerful.  Battery life is great, and the camera quality is excellent.

title: First time drone flyer
text:
First time drone flyer.

I am 43 yrs old and decided to get into drone flying to help document my adventures and help me explore some areas I just cant get to. I explore the mojave desert and wanted to be able to look over hills and fly up to mines to help me decide if it was worth the hike.

I was a little nervous about flying a drone for the first time because I knew nothing about them. I knew getting a "cheap kids toy" wasnt going to teach me much so I decided to try this one. If you want to learn to fly drones spend the money to buy this one before you spend the money on an advanced model. If you dont want to learn and advance to better drones...just buy the cheap toys they sell. If you are an experienced drone flyer who knows alot about drones, this drone is probably not for you. It is far from a professional drone.

I wanted a few things from my first drone. I wanted to fly high and far. I wanted to fly so far that I couldnt see the drone in eye sight and still be able to fly and come home without problems.

This drone has proved itself in that area. However I must tell you this...I got this drone to about 2500 ft away and the signal started to cut in and out even though there were no obstructions between me and the drone. Not a big deal since I am using this drone to learn. Also, when the drone was not "insight" of the controler I lost control. Whuch means going around hills in little canyons and such didnt work well.

Also, this drone will fly decent in light wind but the higher you go, the further you go...if the wind picks up you may have a problem.

I found this out in the desert where the wind can pick up instantly. I had a hard time bringing the drone home once the wind started blowing. It struggled and even blew backwards a few times but eventually I got it home.

I am happy I got this drone, It is very well built and a great drone to practice with. First time drone flyers, I encourage you to get it. It was a good purchase for me. If you really want to get into drone flying and dont have experience already, I suggest you buy this drone before you drop 2k on a professional model. This is a good drone to practice with and isnt one of those cheap toys you can get to fly around your house to chase your pets. You will get alot of satification out of this drone expecially when you fly high and far from where you are. Its fun.

Consider this drone the prerequset class before you take the advanced class. I recommend it.

One thing that doesnt impress me is the length of the batteries and how long it takes to charge them. They dont last long...especially if you are recording. Once the battery on the drone gets to 50% the drone is limited on hight and distance. Just something to think about. If you take this drone out to the middle of nowhere...like I do. Remember, to choose your flight time wisely because once the batteries are dead...your done. And 50% means you are limited on your flight too. There is no quick charge to these batteries either.

I am giving this drone 5 stars because for what I wanted, It is doing. I recommend buying this drone if you are new to drone flying like I am.

title: Great product!
text:
My first time to own a drone.

Pros:
- Easy to learn for a beginner like me.
- High capacity storage for photos and videos.
- Great price
- Takes great pictures and videos

Cons:
- Charging of battery takes too long.
- The charger is not convinient to use.
- There is no plug included.
- The casing should have an extra compartment for a few more batteries, at least 4 more.

title: Definitely recommend this to anyone
text: Very great product and easy to fly when you figure it out.. but mines got messed up... something went wrong with the controller, it wouldn't go left or right wouldn't even land.. but luckily the customer service is so dope and quick to respond, so they're hooking me up with a new one. Thanks HS

title: Very easy to fly and Awesome camera!
text: Easy to fly, decent battery life and nice carrying case! It's near impossible to lose this drone due to the return home function that will automatically return home if you lose signal. Both 4k and 1080 video recordings look great with the built in image stabilization. Overall great product at a fair price.

title: Few tips and things I've noticed
text:
I'll try and keep this short and to the point.
-it can take a minor beating and still fly. I've flown it a few times, and had a few accidents (because of a stupid beginner mode that limits your controls) and it's still going strong with the original blades
- take it out of beginner mode (found in the settings of the app you have to download)
- Seems to work a lot better with iphone than android. I have my wife's old iphone 11 that I use now, because my android (Google Pixel 4a 5g) either with connect to the app/drone at all, or when it does...the video feed on my phone is choppy...causing me to crash or not risk flying it at all.
- it's fun to fly, a great beginner drone...the 4K video is ok, but nothing compared to my buddies DJI (you get what you pay for)

title: Responsive with Excellent Camera
text: Great service from Holy Stone.  This is an excellent drone that is priced very competitively.  It's quick to learn the controls and amazingly responsive, even in some pretty stiff breezes.  It hovers in-place effectively and with the Return to Home function is satisfyingly accurate.  The fact there are two batteries giving about 45 minutes of flight time is a real plus.  Nice case is included.

title: Fun to fly, great value
text: This is an easy, fun to fly drone. With everything that is included in the kit, this product has great value for the price which makes it a nice choice for anybody getting into flying drones.

title: Sharing is Caring
text: My wife finally let me buy one, I picked out this Holy Drone and was ready to start a new hobby, I was excited, I finally got one! Then comes the boy (son). I haven't seen the dang drone since I bought it and opened it up. I asked him about it and he say's it his now? Maybe I should order another one? Thanks for drone i think?

title: Great for the price with Excellent Customer Service.
text:
I had issues connecting my first one and returned to Amazon. Unsolicited HolyStone reached out to me to apologize and for a replacement unit. This one worked flawlessly. Controls & App features are very good. Drone is responsive and seems very well made and for the price I highly recommend.

I would give the drone itself 4 solid stars and the only thing really holding it back from the more expensive brands would be access to more camera setting controls in the app & motorized gimbal stabilization over electronic.

I do think the charge time of batteries needs improving.

I have no reservations recommending this drone for the price and give it 4 stars by itself and 1 additional star for the Excellent customer service which was better than I have received from large companies (cough GoPro).

title: Money well spent!
text: Very nice premium drone, stable hover, easy control, smooth video, great price compared with other 4K cinematic drones.

title: Nice little drone, Nicer costumer service!
text: It's a very well-made drone, good material, high-quality video. Use a micro SD card if you want better quality. I would say spend some time training with it before using it in risky places. I learned it the hard way! had to contact their customer service and they're really supportive, understanding,​ and nice people. Strongly recommended product!

title: Couldn't have asked for a better beginner drone
text: This is my first ever drone. I am hooked on flying these. The first this that I can say about this drone is that it very tough. Since I am new to flying drones, I am not a very good pilot yet. With that said I have crashed this drone many of times and it continues to flying like new. Thank goodness! As I continue to fly this drone as a beginner, I would definitely buy this drone again. I really enjoy the ease of learning to fly this drone. With the two speeds, I can maneuver it as I need be a better pilot. I especially like the picture quality. As for the video quality, I live near the ocean where I can watch dolphins swim by at a safe distance. Comes with a great carrying case as well.

title: Usually works as promised.
text:
The instructions are good, and the internet has a few videos that you can use to learn as well.
I flew this over a large open field for the second flight. It had all the satellites and was flying well when suddenly it started flying away and I could not get it to return. I ran after it a long way, pressing return to home and after a long chase it finally responded. That experience makes me worry that I could lose this easily.
I bought this for a birthday present and was promised prompt delivery, but it showed up two weeks late. Amazon returned the money and said I could keep it, but later they charged my credit card again.

title: Really great! Easy to use.
text: Great video, great pics. Its very sturdy and the help line was amazing! Didn't have to wait on the phone, walked me through what needed to be done in just minutes. Off it went. They absolutely knew exactly what they were doing. Super easy to use and for the price its great.  Plus the extra battery is great! GPS, press the home button and its back. Love it!!

title: Best drone

title: Great drone for beginners.

title: Really great drone especially for a beginner
text: I received this as a Christmas present.  It is really easy to setup & operate.  The photo & video quality is excellent.  As someone who had never had a drone before I found the documentation that came with it very detailed & helpful.  I am really excited to have fun with this!

title: Holy Stone HS720E, great drone for a first timer!
text:
I bought the Holy Stone HS720E mainly because of the good reviews, and the fact that I wanted a drone with good features and that would be easy and safe to learn on.
The return to home feature is great if you are a first timer, if you get in a little trouble just hit the return to home button and it will bring the drone back to you and land it for you, works great!
Good camera, not too hard to fly and I am a newbie. Follow me feature, circle me all seem to work well.
I am really looking forward to getting some more flying time and fun in!
All in all this is a great drone for the money!

title: Good Product
text: Overall, I am very happy with the product.  I did quite a bit of research for a budget drone with good camera quality and narrowed it down to they Holystone HS720E.  Product arrived as promised and it was nicely packaged. It was exactly as described.  It's a robust little drone that feels well made and durable.  It does hane quite a few options to learn about for a new drone person and it does quite a lot.  It handles really well and is quite responsive.  I flew it this weekend it some relatively strong winds (13-15mph).  It held it's own and was able to hover in place and even being bounced around in the wind, it shot great quality video that was not shaky at all.  The video quality is exceptional and stable.  Very impressed with that!!  The GPS functions worked flawlessly along with the return to home feature, set the drone down within a foot of where it started from, in the wind.  My only complaint is how long it takes to charge the batteries.  It takes 5-6 hours per battery and  only charges one at time.  I bought an extra battery to have more flying time and glad I did.  In all fairness, I was aware of the lengthy charge time before I purchased it but didn't realize how much fun I was going to have flying it around.  This is the only reason I am not giving this product  5 stars.  I have not had to call customer service on any thing so I can't review their responsiveness.  I am very happy and would recommend this product.

title: Quick note on calibration and usage that might be helpful.
text:
I've seen some notes about people having problem with vertical calibration, I got stuck too until I re-read diagram- you have to spin it on vertical axis, like a top, not like a steering wheel. Once I figured that out, I got it calibrated. Some other notes:
- I had problem when I ended an auto mode (e.g, Follow Me or Circle), I could no longer manually control the drone. Switching to SPORT mode resolved that issue.
- Circle only circles around the point when you start the mode, if you move, it doesn't continue to circle around the transmitter. Kinda wish it could do that.
- Follow me would keep turning the camera as you moved side to side, that's nice.
- Worked well in a strong breeze.
- Overall, pretty easy to use. Use in a BIG OPEN FIELD at first until you get used to it.

text:
would not have purchased this item if I'd known that there were issues with the app which affects the control ability of the drone. title: Was good… for a little while
text:
UPDATE****

I reached out to holy stone and they replaced the unit with a brand new one. Hopefully this one won’t have the same issues. Good customer service experience.

I bought this drone in September of 2021. I bought it to get drone footage for a YouTube Channel I have for hunting videos. My counterpart on the Chanel runs a DJI. I bought this drone with high hopes it would preform well. The good: easy to operate, came with a lot of accessories, cool functions like orbit and follow me. The bad: camera not near as good as any dji, gimbal not as smooth either. This past weekend I was hovering it at about 80 ft… suddenly with no prompt from me or my remote, it decided to go haywire and flip upside down and crash straight into the ground. I had no control whatsoever. I was out in the woods with no interference. Drone destroyed. I’ve emailed the company… I know it’s been 13 months… but I’ve never even crashed this thing. I’ll be replacing with the DJI. If your gonna spend $300 get the DJI mini se

title: WORLD CLASS CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!
text:
First the bad... after many many reviews I read and all the YouTube videos...I decided to purchase the 720E for the EIS (electric image stabilize) I did not want to spend all that cash for a drone with a gimbal...being a first time drone buyer..... I received the drone the next day and was super excited to open....when I opened the Amazon box to get to the drone box itself...I noticed one of the round seals the shows the box has not been opened was only stuck to the box on one side as if it had been opened......I Did not have a good feeling to open the nice little case that had the drone and accessories in it..... upon opening up the case I noticed the plastic protecter for the control LCD was not straight and looked like it had been removed .....I removed it .....and there was a small scratch on the LCD..... bummer!!!....next I removed the drone from the case .... careful not to let the battery fall out because of the little piece of black foam that keeps the battery from going all the way into the drone.....but to my surprise...the battery was all the way in the drone and no black foam any where in the case other than on the extra battery......I powered on the drone and it was almost fully charged?.....my conclusion was ....the box had been opened.....the battery had been charged.....the drone had been flown!!!!! Wait what???? Surely not...I just purchased a used drone????....but it was true.. I forgot to mention the drone was dirty.....ok enough of that.... Good news.... I called up Holy Stone no answer.... I clicked on live chat.... and customer service responded.... I proceeded to tell her that I received the drone in the condition that I mentioned above....they ask for a few pictures of the drone and controller.... and without hesitation.... she told me she would send me another drone to replace it with... without sending the other one back.... WHAT!!!!!! Did I read this right?? Are you saying there are still companies out there that actually still do this??? WOW I received an email stating they had processed the order and I will receive the new drone in 3-6 days.... well today is the 4th day and according to the tracking # I will receive before 9pm today 9/24/20... super excited to get home from work and open this bad boy up.....I wrote this review not because of the new drone that I’m getting... I wrote it because of Holy Stones customer service....there are not very many companies left in this world with this type of service..... I wanted to let you all know what you would be dealing with if you ever had to get in touch with them.... they are world class!!!! PS I will update this review when I have received and fly my brand new drone.....I think I’m going to be really impressed!!!!

…………update………….
Sorry forgot to update my post… received the brand new drone and it is a great little drone for the beginner…. I have since moved on to the DJI Mavic air 2 ……and there is no comparison’s…DJI is in a class of its own…. But I would still recommend the Holy Stone 720e for beginners…. As it is a great little drone!!

title: Poor customer service, and not a reliable product
text:
Basically a decent starter drone. Video and still shots not very good, but not horrible.

The biggest problem is Holy stone not standing behind their malfunctioning product.

I learned how to fly, got pretty good. Then for no reason on day it went out of control and crashed. I picked it up, restarted the take-off procedure. It took off, hovered about six feet and started to fly right for my face. I raised it up, and it flew up and away out of sight. Never to be found. After the 90 day warranty, so no help from holy stone except a discount on a new one and a 30% refund offered.

It never was crashed before this, or got wet. It totally malfunctioned with no reason. There was nothing around to cause any interference (farm field). It is supposed to return to its take-off spot on low battery. It is also supposed to return to home if it loses connection with the remote. It did none of these. It clearly failed, and holy stone was adamantly against sending me replacement. There was no way I was going to spend more money with them on another for them not to stand behind.

title: Good drone, good price, amazing customer service
text:
Positives:
+ Incredibly easy to use; no problems for beginners to start flying immediately
+ Intuitive App with very good functionality
+ Excellent response from Customer Service when I ran into trouble
+ Takes great pictures and videos

Negatives:
- I had a problem with the microSD slot - this does not seem to be a chronic problem with their drones
- I wasted a lot of money on cheaper drones before finding this one!

My wife bought me this drone for Father’s Day 2021. I have a brief history with buying cheaper drones, and every time I tried one of those cheaper drones I would spend hours trying to trim them out just to get them to hover in a reliable way. When I unpacked the HS 720E, I followed the instructions for charging, familiarized myself with the Ophelia GO app, and watched the quick start video on YouTube. When my batteries were charged I started the drone, linked the controller, oriented the drone compass, and pressed the auto take-off button. The drone launched and hovered at about 1 meter (3 feet) immediately. I linked the app to the Drone’s WiFi, and was able to see through the drone camera without any problems. My first test flight was simple and easy, and my first video loaded to my phone in 720p with ease.

That’s a pretty normal good review for a drone like this, right? In spite of what happened next, the story gets better. After a few weeks of testing the drone, I started using the microSD slot to record in higher definition. While the videos were very good, when I tried to reinsert the card in the drone, the card would not lock in place. It was disappointing, but I contacted Holy Stone immediately via email (usa@holystone.com). Within a business day they responded. I sent them the information they requested, and within 2 business days they approved my warranty claim and sent a new drone, no questions asked. That’s amazing customer service. It deserves 5 stars.

Out of curiosity, I have scanned a few 1-star reviews. Lots of people concerned about what appear to be used drones and a lack of control of the drone itself. As someone who has had a different experience, I wanted to add a few additional comments:
1. If you have any concerns about your drone out of the box, take pictures and contact Holy Stone immediately via e-mail. Include a screen capture of your Amazon shipment confirmation to demonstrate date of purchase. I cannot imagine anything they are not willing to make right in the first 30 days.
2. Regarding drone control, this cannot be stressed enough: get familiar with the Ophelia GO app before you send the drone out on a long distance fly. Even if you consider yourself a professional drone pilot with a decade of experience, the drone's base settings are controlled from Ophelia GO. Flying from the controller only when you don't know what the settings are will lead you to multiple failures, some of them probably fatal for the drone.
3. Because so much functionality is contained in the Ophelia GO app, don't assume you can fly the drone straight out of the box with only the controller. Your new drone comes set with "beginner" settings that limit its distance and behavior (flight ceiling, circle radius, etc.). That will frustrate you if you don't reset them. If you do reset them and send the drone on a long explore, you're likely to find that you don't really know the drone's limits and you may fly it outside of battery range (it's easy to lose track of 20 minutes of enjoyable flying). Get familiar with the app and how to set up your drone before flying it in an intermediate or advanced way.

Other notes for new users:
* While you can use the drone with no issues without the Ophelia GO app, what you gain by using the app is a "next level" experience of drone flight. Familiarize yourself with all the settings, including the "beginner" setting which prevent the drone from flying away from you while you are learning how to use it. This drone is smart enough to fly back to you when its batteries are low, but you don't want to accidentally lose it because you sent it 300m away and can't see it anymore.
* learn how to fly this drone in a wide open area - no trees, buildings, light poles, etc. This drone does NOT have any obstacle-avoidance features.
* This drone is heavy enough to require FAA registration, but it's only $5 for recreational use, and that's good for 3 years. See the FAA web site for more details.

text: [[VIDEOID:f3e6fdeca711f6d3d1c3b5ff53f81aeb]] The Holy Stone HS720E exceeded my expectations. The Ophelia Go smartphone app provides many features including Follow Me, Point of Interest (Orbit), and Tap Fly (follows a GPS course). I got the nerve to fly it above the 20m palm trees and was able to precisely navigate around the property. This thing is fun!

The Electronic Image Stabilization - is a disappointment. If the drone is not moving it is ok, but like in orbit mode image is NOT stable.
Flight time is about 22 mins per battery, and very stable in windy conditions.
The return to home is pretty good about a 10% change land on the spot, but usually with in about 5 feet, worst was about 10ft.

title: Worth every penny
text: Easy to learn and fly. Love it, camera is awesome

title: Good but unlucky
text: I will tell you, started off just hovering 5 meters doing small circles, doing great very excited, my phone is saying a in app update was needed, next thing I know it the drone had a mind of its own, I tried the landing function, nothing, tried the emergency shut down, nothing, unfortunately it took a b line for the only out building in the 12 Acers I was flying in. still unclear or unsure what had happened, hoping the can give me some advice, would love to try it again. I don’t believe it was user error. 3 stars only because of the malfunction, other wise it would be 5

title: So happy I bought this HS720E!!
text: I bought the Holy Stone HS110D (beginners) drone and fell in love with the brand. I enjoyed flying it so much that I had to buy their latest and greatest. The HS720E! This drone has the best camera recording footage I’ve seen in a unit of this price range. The drone is easy to fly and a total flight of 46mins (23mins per battery) is one of the best features. I love that you can adjust the camera tilt anywhere within the 90*. Definitely recommend this company for any of their drones. I’ll be buying their next latest and greatest when it comes out.

title: Great deal for outdoors lovers
text: This is a superb drone at a great price.  Many more features than others than cost much more.

title: Easy to use right out of the box
text: This drone is so easy to use. I am a novice and from picking up out of the box, reading through the manual, charging and installing batteries, to the first take off till now, I love it. I already started recommending to people asking me about it. Small, compact, with everything including carrying case, it has it all. Great starter drone with a great camera and video. Definitely recommend.

title: Ease of use, surprising speed and tight control make for very fun experience!
text: This product surpassed my expectations!  Everything from set-up to flight and return for the landing was easy. Using the app added even more control and the ability to view the camera during the flight.  And this baby is FAST. I was quickly going flat out and making bank turns and having FUN.  It is very easy to control and use without being mired in details.  The "return" feature worked perfectly when I lost sight of the drone in the distance.  Push the button and the little guy came right back to "home".  Battery life has been constant at 20 mins flight time per battery as advertised.  Just "return to home" and swap in another battery and off you go again. Hi Res camera takes excellent video.  Love it!

title: Big money features for small money price!
text: What else can I say, as a beginner drone user I wasn’t prepared to spend “mavic money” to potentially break or even possibly loose a drone, but also wanted many of the features that $1000+ drones come with out of the box (follow me, return home, poi etc) and this little guy delivers! Being a gps enabled drone allows it to navigate in a sense, on its own. You can set waypoints for it to navigate to, and then with a push of a button return to you without having to actually “fly” it yourself. The 4K camera with electronic stabilization is amazing especially when you’re learning and aren’t smooth on the controls.  Flight time is roughly 20 min per battery, although your mileage may vary.

title: Good Drone
text: Good worth of money

title: Exceptional Drone, Outstanding Customer Service
text:
Five stars are not enough for this drone and the customer service that stands behind it.

I bought my drone back in May 2022, and immediately learned to fly it. It’s easy to fly, very quiet and overall very worth its price.

As for holy stones Customer Service, it’s just as excellent. When I bumped into some minor flight issues with my drone, I wrote them to get advice on what to do. The next thing I know I have a brand-new, out-of-the-box drone, in my hands. That kind of customer service is hard to find.

While there are drones available that may do more, they cost quite a bit of money. This drone will do everything you need for recreational flying, and then some.

If I ever upgrade, and that’s a big if, I’m definitely going to get another holy stone.

title: Easy to use
text: The instructions for use were very easy to understand. The controls and drone itself were easy to use and control the flight of the drone. This is a great drone for a beginner.

title: This drone is a dream. (Update) 9/14 (9/16) update
text: [[VIDEOID:7f37eaa51cee815e38a37bc5f8bb456c]] Love this little drone.  I have had toy drones and played with them.  But I wanted to step up my game as far as using the drone for photos and videos.  This is so easy if you take it slow and practice low to the ground for a while.  They compressed this video for the review.  And iPhone is only as good as connection.  But with SD card it is truly 4K.  Thanks holy stone.  Update My new hs 720e. Was flying normal after Configuring the compass and acquiring 14 GPS satellites.  Was operating normal.  Then iPhone connection was lost and return to home button on remote did nothing.  Drone kept flying away and I had no control.  Drone left no location on app.  I loved this drone and had it for a little over a week.  Something went wrong with it.  It is lost.  I had just bought two extra batteries send email and message to Holy Stone.  See if they can figure it out.  09/14 customer service was great on investing issue.  Stated I did everything right and stand behind their products.  Ace from holy stone kept me informed on investigations and afterwards they are sending a replacement.  I will update review when replacement arrives.  Seems this company knows how to keep customers, I will always buy a drone from them.  Received my drone today.  Holy stone rocks.  Love this company

title: Great Starter Drone
text: Great starter drone for beginners. East to operate and fly.

title: It’s junk. Extremely dangerous caught on fire
text:
New update: after we had this product replaced we started to use it again. After a little while of use it started on fire. We informed the company of this and even sent them photos. They completely ignored us. So for the safety of other we HIGHLY advised everyone to avoid purchasing this drone. It was a waste of money and shown to be extremely dangerous. Thankfully we smelled plastic burning or it could have burned our house down. Avoid at all possibility. Gave it back it’s 1 star review.
Update: after writing this review I received a email from the company expressing their concerns regarding my distaste over the care I had received and they went above and beyond with replacing the product. This drone for the cost is good quality of filming and a great one to use for beginners. The parts for the drone are reasonably priced so as a beginner you don’t have to worry to much for replacing blades and what not if you do crash the little guy. I noticed some complaints on here regarding the video quality, but for the cost I find the video to be pretty good. After receiving good customer service we have even recommended this to family
Old review: We have had this product since Oct of last year. At first it was great but then when we recently tried to use it outside the direction frozen and wouldn’t let us move it and it rammed right into a small branch and fell. When it fell the arm of one of the blades snapped in half. After calling the company for help all they would do was send us where we could get the part to fix it. Once we got it we got ready to put it on. What a mess! Everything is solder together so we not only had to buy the part we had to buy extra things just to put it together. And that not easy either. Pretty much is junk now. Will never buy from them again and recommend many not to buy from them either. Just junk

title: HolyStone Customer support are second to none.
text: When I first purchased my Holystone 720E, my drone would not respond to my commands, my drone would sway side to side then it came crashing down. My drone was completely destroyed. I reached out to Holystone via email explaining what happened and what could they do. I had several back and forth emails, needless to say, they replace my drone with a BRAND NEW ONE. I am extremely grateful for Zare, Fiona and few other customer support. You guys are rockstars. Thank you so much!

title: Lots of features for the price point
text: This is my first drone.  My wife bought it for me as a birthday gift.  I’m very excited to master it.  It seems to have lots of good features and is good for a beginner.

Really make sure you read the instructions before your first flight or you WILL run into some possible serious issues that will shorten the life of your drone. The camera can also come loose from the gears if you have a hard landing however I was able to fix that and haven’t had issues since.

title: Amazing customer service and quality drone
text: I purchased a drone first time, and the first few times I test flew it (two) it was perfect. No problems. Same day, when I went to fly it a third time it went erratic. Incident with it going ballistic on it's own then crashing. I contacted HS and Amazon about incident since it was not even a week old that I had purchased and received it.  They followed up with giving me an entirely new replacement drone. The new one I've flown a few times, no issues at all.

title: Easy to fly and the app that comes with it works wonderfully!
text: [[VIDEOID:3a101b8368ec48b0272d4d141598e057]] We love our drone.  It’s durable and has it’s own caring case.  The construction was well thought out and it’s really a bargain for the price.  I met a guy once who spent $1000 on his drone and the quality of the videos he got weren’t  even close to this one.  If you read the instructions before you fly the first time, you will save yourself some mishaps during the learning phase.  I love that we can bring it to us and tell it to land and it does it.  We are not as good at this point at that.  In the beginning, I flew it into a couple trees but it survived very well.  Got extra blades with it but haven’t had to use them.  My best advice is that you read the instructions before you fly it the first time.  It will help you avoid the trees.  We’ve been out with it 3 times using two batteries each time and have learned how to fly it pretty well.  We’re both around 70 years old and Technology is not always our friend.  We couldn’t have asked for a better beginner’s drone. Good luck!  You will love this one.

title: Fantastic little Drone
text: Don't hesitate to buy this drone because it is not a popular name brand or you think the low price equates to a less than quality product. You'd miss out on the best little camera drone I've ever used, couple that with the price and its flat out the best package you can get. Quality built product that fly's great and has a very good quality camera on it. Comes with a great carrying case and recommend you get the extra battery cause you are going to fly this a lot. The only minor criticism I'd give is about the mount on the controller for your phone, it is flimsy and does not hold your phone well, esp. if its a larger size phone with a case on it. But it works so like I said its minor.

title: Easy to use, beginner friendly
text: I love this drone definitely beginner friendly, Very fun to fly! My first outside drone and took right off, remote control is simple to use Abe easy to set up.

title: Great flying drone
text:
This is my first gps drone so I am not an expert. I started with a $50 drone and was able to make mistakes with that one before moving up. The drone feels great, and looks great. The controller feels good and the controls are well placed. My only complaint is the phone holder doesn't work with any decent case, maybe a thin case would work. The camera is smooth but grainy. I'm sure operator error. I have only flown it twice but RTH works well and within a few feet. Instructions are clear and there are plenty of how to videos online. Charging time is a little slow, and it does not allow for over 400' climb from start altitude. That's fine because that's the FAA limit. My concern is that it won't account for terrain in mountainous regions like I am in, I will try and update if I find that answer. Overall I am impressed and will update as I get more flight time.

Edit.

After researching I found the 4k camera is only 1MP so the photo and video quality are very limited. The app is easy enough to use, the video transmission range is right on parr with advertisement at about 1600'. The fact it limits altitude is annoying when you live in mountainous terrain and want to fly up the mountain side though your are far less than 400' above the ground on the mountain you have reached that from takeoff location. I love everything but the camera and that's a huge reason for purchase. I did have a run in with customer service they were helpful as possible and they followed through answering my questions and replying to my emails. The drone flies great with good control. Battery life is good, charge time is slow though. I did apply and receive the free battery incentive which is a plus. The carring case is very nice but doesn't account for spare batteries and the charger. I would pay considerably more for this drone with a better camera. They are working their way up but that's the only drawback. This is an amazing entry level drone, if holy stone worked on their range(battery + video) camera quality, and some features in the app this would be a competitor with DJI at least on paper. It flies great. It feels great. The camera isn't horrible. And it looks great. Great drone. This is my honest opinion.
Side note Yahoo wouldn't send to their email only Gmail would.

title: Satisfied customer
text: This product has all the features you would look for in your first drone which in this case it’s my first one. Looks great and easy to use that’s what made me choose this product over some of the others plus the price is right. I called customer service at Holy Stone and they were more than helpful. If you were looking to buy a drone especially for the first time and you don’t wanna break the bank I highly recommend this product

title: Great first drone with all the bells and whistles.
text: This drone is a great beginning drone.  The camera takes great photos and videos.  The drone is heavy enough to be very stable with medium winds.  GPS makes sure your drone will return back to you.

title: First Go Around
text: Excited to start learning about drones and the regulations that govern them.  This HS720e is fairly easy to fly (about 6 flights so far.) Looking for a local club of hobbyists so I can explore this even further.

title: UPDATE ! please read all.
text: Reviews looked great, videos too. I  have 2 RC planes so easy to fly, Clear summer day, no wind had in beginner mode at approximately 8 feet high about 15-20 feet in front of me just hovering but it took off uncontrollably every time, always to it's left and crashed every time until arm broke off. Total flight time: 20-25 minutes. Returned. UPDATE! Holystone customer service contacted me and wanted me to try another one, same item. I received in days, and went through all setup again and so far it has performed flawlessly. Mind you that I have been a little reluctant to fly anywhere I wouldn't be able to see it or retrieve it, so large open areas other than the initial confines of my yard. the pictures and video to my phone are impressive but the SD card I had on hand didn't work so well. I am confident enough in it now that I could justify buying a suitable SD card. customer service has contacted me several times, took me awhile to update. So, Yes customer service was quick & I recommend.

title: Bloating batteries
text:
I love the product overall. The only issue I have is that my Samsung Note S10+ does not fit well in the phone cradle. The antenna gets on the way. I have to mount it ( as seen in my attached photo) this way which is quite unstable. I hope the manufacturer could redesign the cradle in a way that it will give more clearance to hold larger phones. Very good product and I will highly recommend it to others.

After time, the batteries are starting to bloat and I am afraid these may explode considering I have not been using my drone often. It is harder and harder to fit them in the battery receptacle. (See photo of bloated batteries).

title: Fantastic drone and support from Holy Stone
text:
What a great drone without breaking the bank. Flies very well, the app works great too! Following the instructions that came with the drone, I've had a great time flying this unit.
I did have a minor issue that I thought couldn't be solved, but Holy Stone was quick to respond with my issue and rapidly helped me get the issue taken care of. I cannot recommend them any more!

title: Great drone, read on for a very honest review.
text: It looks great. takes off well and returns. but I got it for the 4k camera functions. Full honesty time. I got the drone and the camera must not have been properly set up in the factory during initial assembly or something, some molex connector was not properly seated in the mobo. I contacted customer service which was a little annoying. They didnt read my notes and would ask me to try and do things that I had already detailed that I had done. Several time in a row. Then I was asked to record myself on video going through the same steps again. This is where I was fed up with things. They later explained that the video was not for proof that I wasnt trying to cheat them or something but so that it could be reviewed and used for training because the kind of problem I was having they had not encounted before. They did set me up with an entirly new drone, which was to be a gift for my father in the first place. The drone itself is amazing. It flys great the camera which is a 4k camera by Sony is amazing, the image stabalizing feature works great. when you hit the button for it to return it comes straight back and lands with in inches of where it took off from. I havent seen the other features tested my self like the follow me option. The App for the phone I have seen used and have used it myself a little in testing and it works great as well. it works naturally with the remote, the design and function was well thought out. I would consider getting another drone from Holy stone and keeping it for myself if this is the kind of function I can expect from their products. Id go five star but I was really annoyed with the back and forth on of the customer service part of things with the first drone. The second one is amazing though. The drone itself is five stars for the price range all day long. My experiance with the company went past the drone itself though and they dont need to ask me to do the same thing over and over when I already told them I did it all and detailed how and what I did before they asked me to the first time. Drone is awesome though.

title: I was not impressed!!!
text: I really wanted to like this product and seeing it was my first drone I didn't have high expectations. My biggest issue with this drone was the loss of signal between the remote/phone and the drone, it's impossible to maintain a good signal unless you are within a 100' of the drone. I wasn't expecting it to fly a mile but I was expecting at least 500'. I did put my phone into airplane mode with only wifi switched on to make sure of as good of a signal at possible. I sent this item back and paid the extra for the DJI Mini 2 which is awesome so far.

title: Customer Support
text: I received this HS720e drone as a Christmas present from my wife. During the second flight  I realized that the camera control was not working. I contacted customer support and spoke with Kris. I explained the problem and I was advised to send a short video of the drone including the controller showing that the camera was not working. I submitted the video and a day or two later I received an email  from Dennis, another representative. He stated that he was responding for Kris and had reviewed the video. He also stated that he had requested a one-time exception to their main office and it was approved and I would receive a new drone. I was then asked to provide my mailing address. I feel that the customer support representatives at Holy Stone went well above my expectations. No hassles, no sweat, just professional and friendly service. The HS720e is not their top of their line drone but that is the one I wanted and enjoy it immensely. Without hesitation, when it's time to upgrade or buy another drone,  it will be from Holy Stone. Thank You for your friendly representatives and prompt solution to my problem. The HS720e is easy to operate and flies beautifully. I would highly recommend Holy Stone to anyone who is interest in buying a drone.

title: Great drone, easy to lesrn
text: My daughter got me this drone for Christmas and it was a dream to learn. I have an RC airplane that I still haven’t mastered but this drone was easy. I read through the manual and on my first try I crashed into the house! This drone is surprisingly sturdy! A couple of scratches but all is good. On my second try I was able to fly around the house, video my son in law in his garage and basically have a great flight. Since then I have had it out into the park, flown over the property we own and pretty much had a good time flying. This drone is fantastic. It was easy to learn, takes great pictures and videos. The follow me function is outstanding, the fact that it will fly back to the spot it took off from if you lose control is truly a life saver. Admittedly I have crashed it a few times and other than a couple of scratches the drone is undamaged. It is surprisingly tough and I would definitely recommend this drone to anyone who is looking to get a great drone with incredible features that takes awesome videos! It can also stand up to some really bad crashes. You can’t go wrong with this drone!

title: It a decent drone, very good for the price
text:
The was my first drone. While I ultimately returned it, I think it is a good product I would recommend it for the right person/budget.

The good: I was happy with the photo/video experience for the price point. This was the core separator feature that made my select the 720E. I did not want to go too deep in -- but wanted to be able to get quality photo/video. Overall, was happy with the photo/video experience for the money spent.

Flight: I had a mix experiences. Immediately, I had issues with the drone failing to respond to simple rotate-L/R commands. That part was consistently in consistent at first -- meanwhile up and down worked 100% of the time with forward and back in the 85% range. Eventually I linked with support. They tried --- some of their suggestion were zero-gainers... like try w/o using the phone. I was convinced it was an issue with the gyro. The manual did not mention how calibrate (I found that step in a video and in other HS manuals).

Once I figured out gyro-calibration, the controller responded as expected. BUT, during my LAST flight I notice turbulent video. It was awful, and when I attempted to re-do gyro calibration, it failed... Thus, convinced that particular drone had an issue. I could have opted for a replacement -- but I chose to go a different direction for a number of reasons.

(1) The controller felt like a $5 toy. I have a $1200 phone that barely fits if I uncase.
(2) Control issues above. Maybe I just had a defect, which happens. I found the remediation challenging. There seemed like limited support, covering only the far east time zone. Dialog felt robotic and a bit off-point. I wasn't sure I wanted to have to deal with that long-term.
(3) Minor nit, but ... Great there was a manual, but not so great it missed gyro-cal and web had wrong manual.
(4) Battery/Charging. Slow recharge seems common with drone-battery tech, but the HS process is extra slow and the connector solution awkward to use. For the size - the battery flight time is shorter than I care for.
(5) Gimbal. I knew there was one when I purchased, so it is not a knock. And the 720E captured to my satisfaction... when I was not resolving issues. BUT, since it was returning it, the window opened throw in a few more dollars, and get something with a 3-axis gimbal to improve on photo-video shooting. The 720E did fine, I just was OK with more.

Other Items of Note
- The HS App. Functional speaking, works well enough... wireless connected fine, and I the features worked OK. The UI it takes some getting used to. The indicators are hard to see (in the edge of my Note) and there is no font-size settings.
- Battery Experience. The battery charge rate is dumbed down. I have not metered, but 5 hours to charge a battery that yields 20 minutes of FT is clearly erroring on safe (good), but wow. You need an army of batteries for extended use. USB-C interface is better, OK. but current gets dumbed down to less than 2A (maybe 0.5) rates. I gather there are reasons (fire hazard?).
- FAA - Unlike the DJI app, HS can be lifted off w/o requesting permission in restricted air-space. The drone does go over the 250g mark, so should be registered.

Overall
I got the drone to have some fun with my son outside! We had fun and it takes good pics/vid with stabilized capturing - 4 stars, but he is not as interested, and it has became more MY drone. I love the case. While I returned the 720E to step-up the photo/video with a DJI Mini 2 -- I do believe the 720E is a great value, and I do recommend it. Had I not had issues prompting a return or replacement, I would have not considered a up-scaled replacement.

title: Really enjoying my new HS720E 4K EIS Drone
text: The HS720E 4K EIS Drone from Holy Stone has been a lot of fun to fly and learn the basics of drone flight. After some initial set up and careful reading of the instructions, I found the actual flight to be smooth and intuitive. The controls from the remote are sensitive and responsive. New views!

title: 720E now carries out "Follow Me" function - Revised again

title: Great drone for the price

The videos are very stable and clear because of the image stabilization.  I would recommend this to any beginner or intermediate pilot.

title: You’re going to love it!
text:
Absolutely amazing! I received this as a Christmas gift from my boys and I’m in love!!!! I have NEVER a owned a drone , and within 1-2 test flights I’m at great ease with it! I live amongst majestic mountains , rivers , swamps with wildlife and I can’t wait to keep exploring!
edit: We had technical difficulties and Holy Stone was very communicative and after realising it wasn't operator error they sent us a replacement after receiving our original back (shipping paid by us)
That kind of customer service warrants a five stars

title: This is a very good drone, great price and has all the advanced features to fly without fear.
text: This is a great drone the price, very stable, and easy to fly. I take great pictures and videos of our RV travels and recently flew it on a calm, beautiful day, taking the most amazing and clear videos possible.

title: Fun and Easy to Fly
text: With one button you can take off and land, so in just a few minutes you'll be up and flying, but read the manual first to understand all of the controls and features, because there are many things to try. I bought this mostly for fun, but I am also looking at real estate, and am able to use the drone to look at houses, views, and neighborhoods.

title: Very impressed with how this handles.
text: I have had other drones and helicopters but none handled as well is this one did.  After reading other reviews I decided on this one and I am glad I did.  It stays in position really well and handles winds pretty good.  I like the video quality it produces as well.  I have not had a lot of opportunity to fly it yet because of bad snowy weather but I'm looking forward to it.  You can tell it's definitely designed well and should last a long time.  I definitely would recommend the 720E as apposed to the 720 because of the image stabilization,  It's worth the extra money.  Over all I look forward to many flights when the weather improves.

title: Signal sucks
text: First time flying, would not stay connected. Kept losing signal and flew into a tree. Broke- very disappointing after spending $300+ On this.

title: Easy to learn how to fly
text: I’m now retired and my wife got this drone for me for Christmas. It is now my favorite “hobby”!! I take it to different locations I frequent and get a “Birds Eye view” of them. My grandkids love to watch me fly it. By far, the best Christmas present in a long time!!!

title: HS720E Drone By Holy Stone.  Very nice drone.
text:
Updated review.
HS720E Drone By Holy Stone.
Very nice drone.

If you’re a beginner or just looking for another drone for your collection, I would definitely recommend the HS720E drone.

The price.
The price is definitely one of the best price you’re going to find for a drone of this quality.
This drone is packed with lots of features some of the more expensive drones do not have.

Customer service.
Wow!!! is all I can say, this company is very serious about making sure that their customers are happy with their purchase.
I had a problem with my first purchase and customer service reached out to me and took care of it immediately.

Great drone, great company.

title: Wanted to love this drone, but came up short
text:
When I say it came up short, I mean that literally. The range on this drone, in virtually any environment, even a big open park is at best 500 feet. And that’s really pushing the limit of its capabilities. In my neighborhood, where there’s houses, it’s cut in half. 250 feet at max, even directly vertical.

This really bummed me out because it seems well made for the price otherwise. I like the design, I like the controller, even like the app. The return to home function works well, which is super important. The camera isn’t 3 axis gimbled so if you’re new to droning it might be a learning curve to get the shots you want, but I think it takes quality pictures and videos in 4K as long as you have an sd card onboard.

Long story short, everything works well enough for what it is, but the severely limited distance on the WiFi just takes the drone out of the good category. I sadly really can’t recommend buying it because of that. Just save up the extra money and get a DJI mini 2. It’s worth it.

UPDATE 3/7/21

Holy Stone reached out about this review and offered to send a new drone out. Didn’t even ask me to send the old one back. New drone came and it has twice the range of the first one. Guessing there was a problem with the WiFi on the first on. Whatever it was Holy Stone made it right and now have a drone that does pretty close to what it advertises.

title: 👌producto en buen estado
text: 👌producto en buen estado

title: First drone has a learning curve
text: I really do like the quality of the drone, the interface to the iPhone is a bit more complicated than it may have to be for a beginner. the drone has beginner and advanced modes and those are not CLEARLY called out, resulting in one near problem. Beginner, practice startining it up, shutting it down until you can do that with adrenaline pumping.

title: Dangerous Garbage!!! AVOID!!!
text: This thing is unpredictable and flat out DANGEROUS! On it's third flight it just decided to land, completely uncommanded , with a fully charged battery. As it just decided to "land" it hit the side of our car then flew into a bush now completely upside down with all 4 props flailing away at full speed like an out of control weed whacker. The only way to stop it was to pull the battery out. After checking it out, making sure the software was updated, battery fully charged, full signal from the GPS, replaced the props we tried again. Still in tripod mode moving very slowly it seemed ok. Then it began to rotate in different directions at random and input from the remote had no effect. It would rotate slowly then stop and the remote would work again. My husband, growing concerned, decided to land and pressed the land button...and nothing happened. He tried again and nothing happened. He then tried to land manually and about 5 feet off the ground it instantly went to full power, put it's nose down and flew off down the street at full speed. The remote had no control at all. Pressing and holding the "lock" button for "emergency shutdown" did absolutely nothing! It flew at full speed until it clipped a garbage can, slapped a tree, hit a bush, and now WITH ALL 4 ARMS FOLDED IN AND UPSIDE DOWN it's still at full power and flopping and spinning around!! Again, the only way to shut it down was to pull the battery out! This thing has serious software issues and needs to be avoided! The blades on this thing are MORE than capable of causing severe lacerations and it'll go out of control for no reason at all. Most drones, if they become inverted, will shut down for safety BUT NOT THIS ONE! DO NOT BUY!!!!! EXTREMELY DANGEROUS!!!!!!

title: Software is sh$!
text: The apps don’t run with the drone at all it will disable regular controls to turn the drone and send it out of control the only way to control the drone is the remote and you have to visually see where it’s going. Good luck with that. I sent it home and it went past me into a tree and then dropped and broke the rotor arm off.

title: Fun but be careful first time out of the box
text:
First off let me say I have only had this out one day to fly and I broke the phone holder on the controller. Their is vague directions in the manual and only a picture of the process but you have to pull up on the spring and pull towards you. In doing this I pulled up too hard on the tab connecting the spring and broke the plastic tab. I was able to still fly the drone by using some rubberband. Now I am currently sending emails to Holy Stone to see if they will replace this controller.

Now as for the first flight of the drone it was so much fun! It was easy to learn and I like the easy take off and landing and with one button push it will come right back on it's own to were you start. The video and pictures seem top quality and the drone as well. It has a well made travel case as well.

I am looking forward to getting the controller fixed and using it some more!

title: Good drone at a great price
text: Overall the HS720E is a great-flying drone. The camera is NOT production quality, however the controls closely mimic that of a much more expensive brand. I did have a control issue which ended damaging two of the arms, however customer service was very helpful and resolved the issue quickly

title: Defective drone!!
text: Did not every get to use it. Charged the battery fully while charging I ready the instructions Manuel. I could not get the drone to work at all batters where fully charged and spent my whole Sunday off work trying to figure out what I’m doing wrong. At the end of the day I wasn’t doing any thing wrong just a defective drone. Things happen for a reason so I decided not to reorder and my down the road I’ll try again. That’s why I gave it a 2 star.

title: My First Drone
text: Like others i spent way too much time researching the "perfect" drone.  after lots of review and several Youtube videos, Im glad i settled on the HS720E.  although the set up can be confusing at first, once you get through the start up a few times it will become second nature.  Video quality is great, very stable flight, and i cant wait to get better at flying, and more confident.

title: Drone goes out of control on second flight
text: I was hoping that it was an anomaly, but what others mentioned happened to me as well. First flight went fine. Drone was under control and everything. Second time out, drone decided it had enough and just took off. Luckily i was able to kill it before it did any damage, but something is very wrong with this drone. Probably should look elsewhere unless you only want to fly it once.

title: Drone is awesome!!!
text: Camera 📷 is nice👍🏾👌🏾great Xmas gift🎅🏽🎁

title: Great product
text: Great product. Got one for my birthday. Fun to fly. Left rear motor went out and customer service was great. Replaced the drone with no hassle. Would highly recommend this product and company for all ages and and skill levels.

title: Good Drone
text:
Beginning was very good. When I take it to mountain, GPS is slow, and it lost control of the GPS; therefore, drone crash into the ground, very disappointed. Picture are okay not sure is 4K or not.
Update: After the company sent me a new one, and I tested again, the GPS is good now, the picture is 4K if you have micro SD card in the drone. Picture is not 4K if you take the picture directly from the phone. So, I decided to give this a 5 stars review for the company is whole heartedly taken care of its customer.

title: Great Drone, easy to fly
text: Just received the Holy Stone drone, got it set up quick and was flying in no time.  Its very easy to assemble and the directions were easy to follow.  I recommend watching the YouTube videos that many others have made since the compass calibration part was a little confusing when reading the manual.  The movies and pictures are great quality.  I've had some cheaper drones in the past that were difficult to fly and to get back home.  The features of this drone make it so easy, just push 1 button and the drove comes back to you.  Push the land button and it gracefully drops to the ground.  I can't wait to get more experience flying this and making beautiful videos.

title: Great beginner drone but take Ophelia Go out of the beginner mode
text:
My first drone was a Snaptain S5C, which I got for Christmas. I can't even call that a beginner drone, it was just a toy, easily blown around and difficult to control. But it got me interested in a better one. So HS720E is actually my beginner drone, a REAL beginner drone - one that is pretty stable, can go a descent distance, can take a pretty good video, and it does come back when it goes out of range or low battery.
The one major recommendation I can make here is to turn the beginner mode off in the Ophelia Go settings. Initially it was on, and before I figured out this little step, the drone experienced a number of steering problems when it gets to about 50 ft out from you. Turning it off fixed everything. Totally happy now with this drone.

title: Nice drone
text: Very nice for the price takes 4K pics and videos. Great for beginners

title: Hobby Drone at its Best and Awesome Customer Service
text: I bought this drone so that I can film myself on the different hikes and activities I am doing with my kids. I always wanted the ability to have someone film us while we are doing our little adventures. The Holy Stone HS720E was really easy to use (I am a beginner) and I liked the beginner mode so that I could really learn how to fly it before taking it up to higher and longer distances. After using the drone for two weeks my WiFi signal wasn't working anymore from the drone, which was really upsetting but Holy Stone customer support was right away reassuring me and telling me what to try and if this wouldn't work to send them a video and they would replace it right away. I am now waiting for my new Drone but overall what a great Drone and experience.

title: Great Drone
text: Got this drone for a Christmas gift and am glad I did! Comes in a very nice and sturdy case. Really like that everything is so compact would be easy to travel with. Very easy to set up and calibrate. Flys really good and hovers in place even with moderate breeze. Camera is nice, love that you can point it 90 degrees straight down, and the eis let's you take great pictures and video. App works well, have not tried all functions yet but I am sure they will work well. Battery life is as stated. Charging is a little long but that is to be expected. All in all a great drone!
