The drone is quite powerful and was able to hold its own in high winds coming off of the Mississippi river.  I would definitely recommend this.

title: Great quality and features for price, limited range,
text:
[[VIDEOID:4d0b902d425c98ad081f502ae4045b4b]] Updated after 6 months: If you’re looking for a nice, affordable beginner drone for an adult or teen, look no further. Customer service is responsive. I had a drone fall out of the sky, and they replaced it immediately. I didn’t even have to send the broken one back. If you’re a more advanced pilot or former R/C pilot like me, you’ll want to go up a price range or two for a more capable drone. This is loads of fun though for almost any skill level.

Pros:

Good value for money
Relatively solid construction
Good wind resistance
Difficult to lose...the RTH feature works
Good quality camera, especially when used with memory card
Easy to fly
Free third battery available after purchase
Combo with card and 4th battery available from Amazon
Included case
Lots of fun
If you suffer a mechanical failure or it flies away, they will replace it
Responsive customer service

Cons:

Range of video transmission is not more than 1200 feet in my experience. Usually not more than 600 ft distance (regardless of altitude).
Range of drone itself varies, but usually no more than 1500 feet.
Instructions are extensive but not always clear, especially with setup.
Drone is in beginner mode at first, but this isn’t clear. Use the app setup to change the default ranges.
If you have a problem they will send you the same questionnaire no matter what happened. It’s in relatively broken English.
The battery charge time is pretty long. It charges at 5v in sequence, so two batteries on the charger could take 12 hours.

title: Works well
text: Take good videos and pictures. Easy to use.

title: Revised review - Great customer service!
text:
New revised review! Our original drone flew off on its own after only 2 months and I had posted a review to reflect our negative experience. However, when we contacted customer service they sent us a new one a few months after we submitted our review. Our new drone has been great with no major issues. We appreciate the great customer service and I would recommend this drone to others looking for a very good entry level drone.

We had our holystone drone for only 2 months. After having researched other drones this seemed to be a great option for us. Unfortunately we used the drone for the last time yesterday as it took off immediately after take off and flew extremely fast in the opposite direction leaving us no control of the drone. Sadly, it was never retrieved and we were left with nothing for our hard earned money spent. This was absolutely not user error as many people witnessed what happened. The drone was calibrated and controlled as it had been several times before. Why would this happen? Now I am hearing other stories of people that have had this same incident occur. Very disappointing!!!!

title: This Drone is amazing!
text:
Ready to fly out of the box. It basically flies by itself. The manual is basic, but watch a few videos on you tube and ur ready to go. Very stable, Remote and WIFI range very good. I flew it in 15 mph winds with no problems. The Drone is full proof. Once airborne, plot a course and it flies it. IF it goes out of Remote Range (approx 3000 feet) it will automatically return until it gets a signal again. If the battery is dying, it will return to within 98 feet, until the battery is almost drained, then it will land by itself. Of course flying manually is fun too. It hovers all on its own. Fly it away, if u get confused, just let go of the controls and the drone will hover where it is. Get ur bearings, then start flying again. Still confused, hit the "Return to Home Button" (RTH) and it will come home. The only thing is, it does not have obstacle clearance, but you can pre set the RTH altitude that the drone will climb or descend to prior to it leaving its current location and then returning home. Great Drone!! Love it!
UPDATE: I have flown this drone half a dozen times. Still loving it, but I learned a few things after emailing the company..
1) IF u start the video via the app on your phone and the drone goes out of the drones Wifi range, BUT still in remote range, the video will stop recording. (This was verified by the company) To get around this, use ur remote to start the video even when using the app.
2) Max wind is 18mph
3) You can not plot a course out of Wifi range...example, the drone is hovering over me, I plot a course using the app to a point 3 miles away. I was hoping the drone will fly toward it at first, but return when it is out of range, BUT the app will not allow u to plot a course so far away.
4) The picture/video are amazing....HOWEVER I flew the drone at night and the pictures/video are horrible!! Very disappointing.
5) Calibrate the drones compass/gyros on EVERY new location you go to. Do this before the first flight of the day. This will assure it will fly stable and return to home.
Now that I have flow this a few times, I do wish it had more range. 3,700 feet distance is just not enough. The Wifi connection is less then that and I wish that too was further. BUT overall I am very pleased. Very easy to fly, very stable and many many features for such a reasonable price.!!

title: Doesn't work anymore
text:
2023 Update :

I should have updated this review a year ago. Last year, the drone had intermittent issues with speed. It would go into limp mode and move very slowly. This happens within a few minutes of taking off. Also, we were losing video connection within 250' of unobstructed distance. I'm not sure what's going on, but all our efforts to recalibrate, restart, and use fully charged batteries have not resolved the issues. This thing has become an ugly paperweight.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Original review:

We had an issue when we flew this drone for the first time. For some reason, the manual did not mention (or did not place it where it's easy to find) the Beginner Mode, which is the default setting when purchased new. In Beginner Mode, you can only fly 50' vertical and 50' horizontal from where the drone takes off. I did not know that and thought that the drone was defective. Then, 10 minutes into flight, I was able to go 110' away and the drone took off in some random direction, uncommanded, and crashed.

After watching a few YouTube videos, I later learned of the Beginner Mode setting and switched it off that mode. We've never had any problems since.

So, I suspect the folks who are rating the product as 1 star are reporting as such due to random uncommanded flight. I believe there is a glitch in the software that momentarily allows the drone to fly past its 50' limit in Beginner Mode, but when it senses that it's outside those limits, it goes haywire. Another setting that may have triggered the glitch may have been the speed setting. I had set the drone to advanced speed setting (button on the controller) while unknowingly be in the Beginner Mode setting (setting through the phone app). This could have been a bad combination.

My advice is immediately get off the Beginner Mode. And, if you're in the beginner mode, do not select the high speed setting.

title: Good beginner drone
text: My first real drone and it's very easy to operate.  After charging overnight everything worked great.  The first day was windy and I had a little trouble keeping it pointed where I wanted.  But pictures and video are great.  I hope to try out the GPS modes soon.  I have 35 acres of land in Colorado mountains and this will be a great way to view and map out the entire property.

title: Too long to charge battery!
text: I returned this item because it took several hours to recharge the battery.

title: Solid first drone at a great price
text:
Update: The drone preforms well but could not save to micro SD cards. Tried different models and classes and they all corrupted the card. Customer service responded but did not help resolve the problem. Returned to Amazon.

This my first ever drone. I did my research and this seemed to check all the boxes at the right price. I let the batteries charge and hooked up my phone and controller, and I was in the air in no time. There is enough features to keep it up to date and competitive for a while. The carrying case is a nice add on and the two batteries have enough fly time for my use.

title: For 260 it's good, but has some issues.
text:
First one took off uncontrolled and crashed. Then I learned to use a different app, and the quad was replaced by amazon. Second one has been great, and I've really enjoyed flying it. Video range for me is about 200m, it's fast and has decent run time. The big downside is like 5-10 hrs to charge each pack. If you want to fly, you gotta charge the day before, and you don't get to fly again the same day due to charge times.

It's a great size. It's hard to shoot videos with because the camera moves around with the frame. But the camera is ok, and with editing you'll get something useful out of it.

It's fast, holds position well, and returns to home when asked.

title: Great drone for the price
text: It’s a great drone for beginners. Easy to fly and very stable indoors and outdoors. Very good purchase for the price.

title: Nice 4K drone
text:
This drone is nice. It takes 4K 29.63fps videos and 4K pictures. It has all sorts of functions: headless mode, RTH (return to home), point of interest, and tap to fly (like other expensive drones). But it's cheaper than other drones.
It has position control so that the drone stays put even when it's windy outside.
It is a nice drone for the price.

title: Great drone.

title: Yes

title: Costs $$ should cost $$$$
text:
What can I say about the hs720e?

Pros:
The camera with the eis is smooth and solid as a rock
It's as easy to learn as the other hs products
The battery life is AMAZING! Approx 20-25 min per battery
the fpv is nearly lag free
The lighting can be seen from quite far away
It is a really quiet. The basket ball game I recorded during the maiden forgot the drone was there, even though I was only about 30-40 feet above them.
The controller is very comfortable in the hand, and the lcd telemetry screen is bright and easy to see even in direct sunlight.

Cons
The app that is used isn't the best since the last update
The controller takes 2AA batteries, where the other two hs unites are rechargable.
The battery charger will only charge 1 battery at a time, however it is a smart charger, and when it's done charging the batteries, it turns off.

All in all this unit is VERY much with the price, and honestly based on the features and quality, should cost much more then it does.

title: Easy to learn

title: Great drone with great features, easy to learn
text:
As a beginner to flying drones, this drone is quite good and comes with many interesting features. The follow-me mode, as well as the orbit mode, work quite well.

My favorite feature is the fact that this drone is able to land itself when the battery gets low. When it's low on battery, it flies back to where you took off and slowly lands.

The controller and case the drone come with are of high quality. The drone comes with 2 batteries, which is nice because you get about 20 minutes of flight and recording.

With the use of the phone app, you are able to get a live feed via wifi of what the camera is seeing. The app can be a bit confusing, but the instructions that come in the box do clarify a lot of functionality.

The drone is surprisingly stable in the air and fast to ascend. The camera quality is pretty decent for the price as well.

I would recommend this drone for beginners as it's easy to learn and lots of fun!

title: CUSTOMER SERVICE
text:
Let me start by saying I had the HS 720 which flew great but the camera was horrible(sh I was excited to see the 720E and HS said they fixed the camera shake.I ordered and received the drone no problem but, of all things, the camera did not work correctly. it would not move up or down. I sent the drone back and did not intend to re order. I had completely forgotten about it when I received an email from Holy stone expressing their disappointment at my dis satisfaction. HOLY STONE offered to make it right and guess what? they did!!!
There are not too many companies that would go through the lengths that HS did to ensure my satifaction. Big thanks to Shirley @ Holy Stone This is a great drone very economical replacement for DJI iof you are not looking to spent much money and still get a quality well built Drone the go with Holy Stone. HS Customer service is 2nd to none!!!

title: Love It..... well, kinda
text:
UPDATE: After more stick time with the 720E I am not so much a fan. I live in Portland, Oregon and there are very few winter days I can fly. When it’s dry but very cloudy, the drone has difficulty finding satellites. So, GPS flying is out of the question. When it’s a clear day I get about 8 satellites and can use GPS…. well, kinda. We also have lots of very tall trees and I will lose GPS frequently. Not good. But GPS flying is a bit better in an open athletic field; but kinda boring. Also, the 720E tends to have a mind of its own, and frequently drifts as much as 10 feet even when there is no wind. I think this is due to GPS issues. Also, return to home is not accurate (again, GPS). It is also slow to respond to stick movements, which is kinda scary. But not sure why this is. Yes, I am in Fast Mode. Beginner mode is almost useless. My brother lives in a high desert location. No trees, no heavy clouds; big sky country. He get 12 or more satellites and his HS720 flies great. Hmmm. I bought a DJI Mini 3 and had one learning flight with it. It has good GPS (8-10 satellites) and is very stable and responsive to the sticks. The DJI Fly app is in a different league than the Ophelia Go app. The DJI It was more than double the price of the HS720E. As they say, you get what you pay for.

UPDATE: I bought an HS720 for my grandson and it is unable to connect the Ophelia Go app to the drone. Spent several hours on the phone with Holy Stone support but was not able to resolve the problem. The HS720E works fine, but the HS720 does not. Very disappointed. Now I am gun shy about buying another Holy Stone.

This is my first drone, and I did a lot of research before deciding to buy the HS720E. Final decision was based on price, camera, GPS and related features, and online YouTube reviews. Plus, a friend of mine who has been flying drones for years gave the HS720E two thumbs up. The HS720E looks and feels sturdy and well made. The battery fits well, and the arms swing into place easily. I really like the small screen on the remote and the folding handles. I used an old cell phone with a 6.1” screen and it fit nicely into the phone holder at the top of the remote and stays in place. Be sure to fold down the foot pad at bottom of phone holder or the phone will not mount properly. Downloading the Ophelia Go App was also easy as was pairing the remote and the phone to the HS720E. Setup was easy and straight forward, but there is no detailed information how to use the App and it is different than what I found online. As a first-time flyer, I found the HS720E to be stable and reasonably responsive. The Take Off and Return to Home function worked extremely well. But it takes some practice getting used to the joy sticks. All in all, my first flight experience went reasonably well. I did have a few low level crashes but there was absolutely no damage. I do have one complaint, the two port battery charger apparently charges one battery at a time. It would be nice if Holy Stone included a two port battery charger that charged both batteries at the same time. But they can be purchased on Amazon for $13-$15. Otherwise, as a first time drone owner, I am very impressed with this drone!

title: Do Not Buy this drone. It's junk and has too many issues.
text:
1. The software app does not work well.
2. Once it gets about 10 ft away from you it will not turn anymore.
3. Sometimes it just does what it wants.
4. My last stab at trying to make it work it just flipped over and chewed up all the propellers blades.
I'm done with this thing.

title: Great Drone
text:
Qualifyer: My first drone. I attempted to fly RC Helicopter back in the 80's and found it extremely difficult. This drone is beyond easy to fly. I had a good prep by watching all the YouTube videos, particularly the Ophelia Go introduction. I suggest anybody not already familiar to do so.

I purchased this model for the enhanced photo/video abilities compared to the previous 720 model. If operated in the slow mode (1) and with the sun overhead or behind the picture video appears very smooth with good color rendition. I'm sure there are better but at this price point this has more than exceeded my expectations and unless you are a Pro you likely would be as pleased with yours. I will also mention how stable this is in the wind, imperative for the video effort.

I labeled my drone with my registration # as well as marked my batteries.

The build quality seems very good and certainly not built as a toy. I'm impressed that Holy Stone put together a full package of the extra battery, case, and spare props. This is a full kit that anyone would easily contemplate purchasing with any other drone.

Customer Service....I needed some simple clarification and reached out to Holy Stone with a reply within the hour and follow up responses in a prompt manner. Hat's off for that!

The best way to sum it up is I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to a beginner or anyone who enjoys the photo opportunities drones offer, even if they've never flown a drone.

Fly safe folks!

title: AFTER 5 FLIGHTS Drone is uncontrollable.
text: After the 5th Flight the I can’t control the drone.  Even if calibrated it acts crazy once it takes off. It keeps going side ways forcing me to land it.

title: Updated Review, 720E is great now!
text:
[[VIDEOID:d2db09acc72b149c238162c3e85e32f4]] Updated Three day Review

11/25/20 Update: The 720E FPV mode is awesome! 720E FPV has minimum lag (within reasonable distance) and takes your drone flying to the next level. What is even better is putting VR googles on my kids while I fly the drone around. Totally fun! Highly recommend trying the 720E with some VR googles, but you MUST have an observer so you don't walk into traffic or crash drone into tree :).

Three day review:
Foremost, Amazon/Holy Stone honored my replacement and my new 720E performs great. The below reviews are over a course of 6 days at various locations and covers the operations of two 720E drones:

Day 1 - Took the replacement 720E back to the semi-open field in the country about 40 miles away from my home in Class G airspace where my first 720E went rouge. I launched in the exact location and took it up to 100 feet and out to 200 feet and it worked great. It did not fly southwest on its own like the first 720E.

Day 2 - Took the replacement 720E by the mountains and lake in Class G airspace about 3 miles from my home about 6 mph winds. Absolutely amazing performance and it held great in the wind! Took it up to 380 feet and was able to get some amazing footage of the lake, ocean, mountains and city. I lowered it to 100 feet and took it to a max distance of 774 feet and when the signal became intermittent, I got a warning, and a few seconds later the return to home function kicked in. When the drone got within 50 feet of me, I was able to override the return to home and go back flying.

The return to home function is a must have and it works good on this drone. It gets within 6 feet of its launch point (for me, it always lands to the rear right of it initial launch point for some reason). The first 720E after day 2 of flying did not return to home accurately, it would land in a completely different location.

On both 720E's: Battery life is great. Follow me function works, but a little jittery. Orbit mode works but it is hard to understand how the drone picks its center. Waypoint mode works great. The replacement 720E stops climbing at 380 feet, but the first 720E went pass 400 feet.

Day 3 - Did a flight in my neighborhood with the replacement 720E and everything was great. Took the replacement 720E up to 380 feet no issues. Took it up to 383 feet distance at 102 feet height until transmission became intermittent, I was able to work through and bring it back without using the return to home. Everything worked solid. The first 720E on day 3, while at a park, caught another rouge signal and would fly on its own towards people and when i pressed the RTH it would go a different direction than the starting point and the emergency stop did not work. On both drones, the emergency stop takes too long to work. However, at this point I can say my first 720E was defective.

Overall Holy Stone did a great job on the 720E drone and you will not be disappointed. I am giving 4 stars because I had to deal with the hassle of a replacement and the replacement appeared to be a used or factory refurbished model as it had various settings set and there are smears/tiny scratches around lens and optical flow sensor; their instruction manual needs to be more thorough and in proper English (including their website); and the transmitter does not display distance and height in feet only in Meters.

My first 720E had a few problems: On day 2 it caught a rouge signal and began flying away on its own. On day 3 of flying, while hovering at 12 feet in sport mode and it did an immediate reverse, almost struck a few people, and crashed into a truck, flipped upside down, and the propellers were still going. The emergency stop DID NOT work/stop the propellers. Turning off the remote did not stop the propellers. I had to physically and dangerously pick up the 720E. I pressed the power button on the drone and it did respond, I had to remove the battery for the drone to shut down.

After I reset everything and tried another flight with my first 720E, it crashed on its own. The propellers did stop spinning upon the crash, but when I picked up the 720E, the propellers activated on its own almost causing me injury, even after I hit the power button. I tried the emergency stop and the drone did not respond. I contacted Amazon and they sent me a replacement.

title: Awesome Flyer, HORRENDOUS Camera
text:
[[VIDEOID:3772781873cdc8b0ef6b24a4d6cbaa79]] This was my first drone as a gift and I was extremely excited about it. It's great to fly, does a lot of what you would like in a drone. Circle you, follow you, point to point, etc and flies pretty darn smooth! So this is good for someone who is new to drones but has the ability to learn new complicated things. There are 8 axis of motion here to learn, for some may be challenging, but if you go slow and practice it becomes very easy to maneuver.

So the problem I have is the camera, take a look at the video. I sent up the drone with a budget 4k Action Cam I got off Amazon (Victure 4k). So the drone footage is on the left, the budget cam on the right. The budget cam is so much clearer and crisper than the Holy Stone camera. If you just want basic footage and pictures, then it's not a problem, but if you want to make some good videos and edit them, this will leave you unsatisfied. I think the video speaks for itself. The footage was shot with the default parameters on the Drone, same as the budget cam. The photos also give you an idea, they are from the Drone, one is of a distance shot and the other more close range. For the price, Holy Stone could have added a better camera if a budget action cam can do much better. The technology is there, why skimp on it? Yes, the drone had a great SD card inserted, A3, Class 10, V30, etc. etc.

title: At the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean
text: I initially got this drone to go on a sailing trip in Antigua. I practice for several weeks to make sure that I had a good hang of what I needed to do to be able to retrieve and initially was surprised at how straightforward it was. But once we got into antiga, I launched the drone. After changing into a fresh battery in about 3 seconds into flight, it completely died in mid-air and fell into the Atlantic. So disappointing. No rhyme. No reason on a full battery for this thing to drop out of the sky like that. Total waste of money and waste of memories for a once-in-a-lifetime trip. Buy a DJI drone instead.

title: Failed
text: Auto return did not work and crashed and burned

title: Possibly the BEST beginner Drone on the Market
text:
The Holy Stone HS720E 4K EIS Drone is amazing.

After researching allot of Drones under $300 it was very difficult to find another Drone that offered all the features of the HS 720E at this price point and the HS 720E has more features than Drones costing twice as much. The EIS Camera is excellent and with all the recording options available 4K, 1080p, frame speeds, and high bit rate capture, the HS 720E may just be the BEST Drone available in this price range.

This is my 1st Drone and with the great instructions, the ease of flying this Drone makes it the perfect choice for anyone who wants to learn the fun and excitement of Drones without breaking the bank! Not sure you can find a better value for the money than the HS 720E?

I was able to land the HS720E in my hand within a hour of my 1st flight time. I know that's not recommended but this Drone is so stable, sensitive, and easy to position it wasn't even really a challenge. I like that. The return to home feature is excellent and this Drone lands on the landing pad almost all the time.

Picture and video quality is exceptional and rivals that of drones costing 2x the price.
There's so many features included in the HS 720E that it would take me quite a while to list them all so check out Captain Drone's review of the HS 720E on Utube and you'll be glad you did.

The Holy Stone 720E is so much fun to fly and capture pics and video with, that I now have another life long hobby that provides hours of enjoyment. The "Fun Factor" with the HS 720E is off the charts.
I've used the "Follow Me" function in many various outdoor activities, Hunting, Fishing, Motorcycle riding, Camping, Hiking, etc., that it's made the "Don't Leave Home Without It" list!! ;->
Great Value for Price and HS's customer service is as good as it gets.

What more can you ask for in a high quality, well built, feature loaded Drone that's under $300 and that includes an extra battery for a total of 46 minutes of flight time! WOW!!

title: Surprised at the ease of use and stability
text: [[VIDEOID:b5e1c92c875e51d2406be1c39af32a4d]] Stable video. This was video from my first flight. I got a number of videos from a single battery. Was able to easily land it on the picnic table it took off of. Better than I expected

title: Great hobby drone
text: My drone fley away on it's own, but customer service was able to resolve the issue. Very good customer service. Something to consider as you spend a lot of money

title: Exactly what I was looking for!
text: I am new to flying drones and wanted something that I could easily learn and take good pictures/videos.  I was not let down.  Setup and initial flight were a breeze.  The video quality surpassed my expectations for a beginner's drone.  I have taken several nature videos and also checked my 2nd story gutters without having to get the ladder out!  I am happy with the purchase.

title: Very stable drone.
text: This drone is high quality. Photos and video are outstanding. The drone is very stable during flight with no jerking and very easy to control. Customer service is also spot on......Awesome company

title: One of my favorite purchases.
text: I've only owned big box store style drones. After watching many YouTube videos on this one I decided to bite the bullet. For 300 bucks this is by far one of the best drones in that price range. It easily compets with DJI at nearly half the price. I'd suggest this drone to anyone

title: Best features for the money - Easy to control - High Value Drone
text: This UAS is feature rich for the money that they ask for it - would buy again.  I will not hesitate to look to Holy Stone for other products in the future.

title: Be mindful that any flight can be your last
text: Nice and sleek. But mid flight the I lost connection and the drone dropped from the sky into my yard....broken, with the propellers broken. 2 legs detached and the battery dislodged from the drone.

title: Easy to fly
text: Easy to fly, easy to operate. I upgraded from my phantom 3 standard those goes out of range 100yds out.

title: Fail
text: Controls are a little too loose and splashy, meaning when you point it in a specific direction it doesn't exactly aim toward the target, but rather meanders between the positions.  And it doesn't move forward or reverse very well, which I luckily found out on a test drive before taking it out into the field and having to abandon it.  Also, there is no Remote ID, thanks for mentioning that in the details. The shopping continues.

title: Great picture quality and easy operation
text:
This is a great upgrade to the smaller Holy Stone drone I previously had. The stabilized video is far better than I expected for such a value priced drone. It flies easily in moderate wind although the video quality suffers as would happen with most drones. It is easy to fly with single button takeoff and landing, GPS enabled, and has headless mode.

What I don't like is the battery takes forever to charge. If you only have one battery I suggest getting another as it lasts about 20 minutes but takes 5 hours to recharge. I also don't like that there is no visual aid to tell you when to stop spinning it when its calibrating. The smaller HS drone I had stopped the marker lights blinker when each axis was set. Not horrible but could be improved.

To summarize this is a great drone at a great value point. The biggest issue is the painfully slow charging. It flies great and is easy due to the GPS function. The video stabilization works better than a lot of more expensive drones. I would recommend to anyone.

title: Good drone for beginners
text: I wouldn’t take this far. If you loose control it’s gone but the flight pattern feature is good. I would put an apple air tag on it so it never gets lost 👍🏽

title: Bad choice in Low priced drones
text: All parts as advertised shipped as contained very first flight out of the box after following instructions precisely the drone took off on its own and flu erratically and crashing

title: Outstanding drone for the money!
text: This drone is great and the camera takes amazing pictures and video.  I am extremely impressed with its ability to return to where it took off from within 12 to 24 inches.

title: Don’t waste your time
text:
Update: I decided to give it a second try. I deleted the app and started everything over. The app worked this time. I was able to connect and fly. First flight I got above the tree level and all the sudden no controls worked. The drone ended up drifting towards the trees. Hit them and fell to the ground. The drone is now broken. Will be getting a refund and not getting another.

I got this based on the great reviews. Very disappointed. I read the manual multiple times before I even turned on the unit. Once ready I turned the unit on and followed the manual step by step. I was able to connect to the WiFi from the drone. I was not able to connect and see video through the app. I unlocked the motor and pushed the take off button. It did what it was supposed to do. The real problem is that I had minimal control of the unit. I could move the right joystick all over the place with the drone barely making a movement. It eventually just took off fast by itself and hit the trees. I packed it up and called it a day. Most likely will be returning it.

title: Great drone and easy to learn
text: Great product and I would definitely buy again.  Just remember to download the correct Ophelia GO app (there is another GPS app with the same now).  Pretty simple set up and review process.  Registered my drone with the FAA and took the product out this afternoon.  I could not be happier.  Thanks, Holy Stone, for a great product.  If I could make any suggestion it would be to have some form of ND filters for the camera, but I am quite pleased with the product.  Thank you.

title: Short lived but great beginner's purchase
text: Used to learn and for this, it was perfect! But, within 2 months it was mastered. Need 3 axis cam, with sensors and longer range connection.

title: First time drone operator
text: I have never flown a drone except the cheap ones my kids have. I am still learning the controls but so far it has been relatively easy. I recorded some videos and took a couple of pictures with ease. My wife wishes we had this for our trip to the mountains where it was hard for us to get a good shot of us near the waterfalls. My only issue is that my phone was not fitting in the slot very well.

title: Great customer service
text: I bought the HS720E from Amazon and it arrived within two days. I was very impressed with the packaging and how well built it was. After reading the instruction manual I fired up the drone as instructed and it all looked good except there were no satellite displayed. Finally I called Holly Stone Support and got a live person right away. Once they agreed that something was wrong with the GPS they sent a replacement right away. The new drone flies beautifully. It was easy to learn and get flying.

title: Very pleased
text: It is a really nice drone for beginners, easy to fly, very clear image camera, very stable picture. With very nice image zooming, easy to land. I am very pleased with this drone it's a very good quality product at an affordable price.

title: easy to fly
text: it is a great drone

title: Intermittent navigation problem
text:
This is my first drone. I found it very easy to use. The instruction manual does a great job at walking your through getting started. Pay attention to the image for calibrating the drone. there is a specific way it needs to be rotated. Once I figured that out I was up and running.

PROBLEM: It has a significant navigation issue that presents itself regularly. 4 flights out of 10 or 40% of the time, 30 seconds after take off the drone stops responding and flies off on its own.

**update** I have given up. The drone no longer responds to commands other than up and down. It acts as if it has a mind of its own. This is my second unit and they both developed this problem rather quickly only having 5 or 6 successful flights. Don't waste your money

title: Great First Drone for Adult
text: I have been looking for a good drone for a while now. I had wanted a DJI Mavic Pro, but didn't want to spend $$$$ either. I found the HS720E on YouTube and was really impressed. After a couple hours of videos and other online reviews I decided this is the Drone for me. It arrived carefully packaged for shipping. The included drone carry bag is incredible, very nice looking and not expected. After some video training and FAA registration requirements I was ready to get airborn. The HS720E did not disapoint and I quickly got comfortable with the controls. Take your time, watch videos and please print our a Pre-Flight Check List and complete each and eveytime you fly. Also get a good Micro SD Card to save youre videos and pictures. My videos and pictures have all came out looking amazing! Go Out and have fun with this awesome Drone!

title: Beautiful
text: I love this drone. It responds quickly and stable

title: This is an excellent dronhad a minor problem and the customer service people from Holy Stone wer
Three strikes and you're out
text:
I bought this drone as an entry point to the hobby. When it works it works ok. The 4k image is blurry and the colors are pretty washed out, but I wasn't expecting amazing images from a $300 device. When things go wrong, however, they go really wrong.

Strike 1: This spring I took it out to get some shots around the beach, taking off from a front yard. After reaching about 10 feet in the air with minimal wind it decided it wanted to go on its own adventure, taking off horizontally with no direction input from the controller. Luckily I was able to control the altitude of the drone and brought it crashing into a bush to keep it from going into the neighbor's property.

Strike 2: In the summer I had it up high to get some fun firework shots from a distance. Everything was working fine until I received a notification that my battery was getting low. About 5 seconds after that instead of doing it's safe emergency landing maneuvers the drone instead shut off its motors at 100 feet and came crashing down to the ground. The fall luckily only popped one of the plastic gears for the gimbal loose, but I had to tear pretty deep into the unit to pop it back into place.

Strike 3: After performing a full safety and flight check I brought this drone over to my parent's home to show them some cool bird's eye views of their house. As soon as I got it up to about 50 feet with little to no wind it once again decided to take itself on a grand journey away from open space and into a stand of trees about 200 feet away. This time not even the emergency shutoff worked. I had no control over the drone but it was still connected to the controller. The drone eventually lodged itself about 50-60 feet up in a stand of trees overlooking stickerbushes about 4 feet deep. At this point I just had to call it a loss and walk away.

Unfortunately with the issues I came across I cannot recommend this drone due to the high potential hazard to health and safety.

title: Love it
text: [[VIDEOID:940373ac2a87a71cec6a1ef1bbabde2b]] Tina Chiasson

title: Easy to fly, stable & takes good clear video.
text: Takes good clear video, easy to fly. This is the second drone purchase. The pastor recomended this one and i got mine and we tried it and he decided he had to have one. He gave me the $ and i ordered it and he has it with him on vacation and having a blast with it. He has had drones in the past but they weren't as good as they are now and says finally, i got one i can fly.

title: Good for beginners
text: I've never owned a drone before but have flown plenty of remote helicopters and this is not that much different. It takes a little bit to get used to maneuvering it as it has a slight delay, but overall its fun to have! the Camera is good and takes really detailed pictures and the video is smooth and crisp. I did have a run-in with a tree branch and broke one of the arms of the drone but was able to repair the plastic arm with some Gorilla glue. Otherwise i'd recommend this for all beginners.

title: Would recommend and purchase again
text: This drone is a awesome flys great good shipping too

title: Recommend this drone!
text: The drone is awesome and works great. The service they provide is incredible. They helped me a lot to solve a problem with my remote control. This is the best drone I have ever had. Recommend mostly!

title: Great drone for the money!!
text: [[VIDEOID:421841e973f63eb6bdcd549fc46405f8]] I was going to spend a lot more money on one of the bigger well know brands. I glad I didn't. I've only had two flights with this so far and I haven't pushed the limits yet. So far I've only gone about 200 feet in distance and about 180 in height. I love everything about this. The case it comes with is really nice. The drobe itself flys great. I watched a bunch of youtube videos on how to fly this and I haven't had any issues. I woudl really reccomend this as your first drone. I've actually been keeping this my car so that when I drive past a park or a field I have it ready.  On thing I would suggest is to get a memory card and a landing pad. I got both here on amazon. The landing pad will help you to not ruin the blades on landing. You want to make sure your blades are higher than any tall grass.

title: It's nice but...
text: This is a good drone for beginners. You get adequate bang for your buck. However over a period of time the batteries start to loose charge faster and faster and you will also start to loose flight control over your drone. Not sure why this occurs and Tech support is of no help.

title: Very responsive company
text: Did a lot of research on drones for our son and landed on the HS720E.  Read the manual, charged things up and got out into a large field nearby.  After 10m or so, this on our second flight, the drone began drifting and not responding to the remote.  Return home and other controls weren't responsive and unfortunately the HS720E flew into a tree at the edge of the field and then crashed to the ground.  We were frustrated, my son heartbroken.  HS to the rescue!  One email to their support team resulted in an immediate offer of replacement with constructive reminders on the use of the drone, location etc....but no blame at all.  We received a replacement drone quickly and were right back at it.

title: Amazing drone!
text: This is my first drone.  I watched a lot of reviews and decided on the HS720e to be the one! I am pleased and amazed at how well this works. I wouldn’t consider this a toy drone but a high quality precision made flying and photo/video taking machine. I look forward to flying it when ever I get a chance! The quality is great especially for the price. Very easy step by step instructions and suggestions for getting the best experience. I would definitely buy the HS720e again and when I want another drone Holy Stone will be my choice. Thank you!

title: Loses Wi-Fi after 300 ft so
text: [[VIDEOID:57b1662e63f3c1e0ab44e35d459e3dc5]] All around a great drone great camera very easy to use

title: Love it!
text: Easy to fly for a beginner. Return to home feature is a lifesaver. Takes great pictures/videos.

title: Loaded with tons of Great technology.
text: This drone is very user friendly and has been very easy to learn. This is an excellent drone to start learning to fly with.

title: A+ On ingenuity Design Build quality
text: Great purchase, Amazing for the $!

title: Customer service is the best. Drones are the best. Hands down a great experience on both ends.
text:
[[VIDEOID:884a45f8c80e2582446c4a5050a186ba]] So this is my first drone over the 100$ mark. I'm absolutely pleased. My buddy who has a dji maverick was pissed because mine had a lot of the same features. I've been taking house photos for my wife for what she puts on the market. 👍👍🏿🤙🏿🤟🏿👍

So my drone had a malfunction. I contacted holystone and within a day they had already had a replacement shipped out. I received it today and I'm still absolutely impressed and to make it better, they let me keep the old one for spare parts. This is by far the best customer service I've ever had in my life.

Holystone has really exceeded all my expectations and I'm so grateful I went with this drone company. Please don't waste your money and just give there products a try. I recommend the hs 720e. Thanks again holystone.

title: Great price, quality built and very fun.
text: By far my favorite drone. I have the HS700D and also love that one but the foldable HS720E steps up the game. This drone definitely delivers, with all the features of a gps drone, great picture and video quality and most of all electronic image stabilization... Very nice for beginners and experienced pilots... highly recomend.

title: Cleared for Takeoff!!
text: I liked the video quality, steady flying ability, easy to learn! I also love the compact case. This drone can go anywhere.

title: Great budget drone
text: Great video quality with image stabilization.  Has two speeds; low (tripod mode for cinema style video and for maneuvering closely around objects.

title: This drone was easy to fly.
text: Learning this drone proved very easy. I had a question about unlocking the motors once it landed and I called customer service. They returned my call that evening. They are on Pacific time. Great value for the price. The printing in the manual is a little small but it does make it easy to understand.

title: Not safe to fly
text: Despite all the good reviews I must be one of the unlucky ones. I've seen YouTubers mention this drone sometimes has a mind of it's own. For my purchase, this would be an understatement. I've not recorded 1 second of footage because no matter how many times I calibrate, find a day with little to no wind, open space, the drone will not hover even tolerably still. From launch it will just slowly tilt and hover away, and by the time I get a chance to test the object is out of frame. Every time I set the follow me mode the drone turns completely out of frame from me locking on to what seems only a direction. It will attempt to follow me but not with the camera. As I've heard before the RTH feature can go berserk. My last straw was when I tried to take off with no response and no other features working then, out of nowhere the drone launches up and tilts fast right into me, cutting my hand and leg up. I will say the image stabilization does look good via the app but pointless if I can't even fly safely. Returning today.

title: Great customer service!!!!
text: Great drone!!!! Very fun to fly, Great video quality.....Great customer service, I had a stability issue a few months after I purchased it and the Amazon return policy was past, called them up and I have to say that the People at Holly Stone are awesome!!! They went above and beyond helping me trouble shoot the issue. After trying a couple different things with no success, they replaced the drone for me. Holly Stone really stands behind there product!

title: Excellent drone!
text: This is a great drone especially for beginners. Super easy to take off and land and the return to home function is fantastic.

title: It flys but ..
text: Doesn't do what it says with stabilization while flying, quality is low on camera. Returned.

title: Maybe Faulty drone.
text:
Update:
After contacting customer service, they made it right.I know have a functional drone. It happens to the very best, it was a faulty one. Now I am very happy with this drone.

For starters, I’ve handled many drones, this pretty much is a beginner drone...

I attempted to pilot this drone 3 times. All three times this drone did not respond well.

The first attempt, using auto take-off the drone went performed a U from take off mark and came crashing down top first. Pretty humiliating in front of my son.

I turned both the drone and control on and off, re-calibrated, good signal, 12 sats. 1/3 battery down.

2nd attempt, I decided to manually lift off, drone went up, only up. Would not rotate, or move to any direction. It went up and down only. I started to worry about drones behavior, so I pressed RTH, the drone started to come straight down at a steady pace from about 50ft...then about 15 feet from the grownd, the drone just free-fell and the controller started beeping...needless to say the drone crashed to the grass. It was out of juice. Literally 2/3 of remaining battery drained in less than 60 seconds mid air.

Third attempt, I plugged in the 2nd battery, and went through the calibration process, 12 sats, clear for takeoff...I attempted the auto take off and the drown literally did another U and came crashing too first again missing the grass and hit the concrete. The propellers were still spinning, the 3-sec lock bottom wasn’t turning it off. Eventually a few seconds later the battery seemed to have drained, the controller stated beeping.

That was the end of it....because now the charging hub was weird. Both batteries plugged in hub first then in outlet...the green lights I and II would blink rapidly. The next day....still blinking rapidly.

Unplugged the batteries, while the hub still in outlet, plugged batteries back now the green lights I and II blinking slowly....the next day...same slow blinking. Plugged them in the drone, and there was less then 1/3 in each battery couldn’t even finish calibrating :(

I’m not new to drones, as I said I have operated plenty, including this particular HS720e. There MUST be something wrong with this drone, and batteries.

There are plenty of positive reviews, and I’m sure they are all true and sincere, I wished this review would have been one of the same....but it is not.

I have not reached out to customer support yet.

title: Very nice camera drone for a reasonable price.
text:
This is my 1st drone and I did a lot of research before I bought it. I watched video reviews of many other drones and read almost all reviews. What I wanted was a foldable stable drone that could handle a light breezy day under $300. The smaller drones that do not require FAA registration can't manage much wind. There is a newer version (HS720G) with 2 axis gimbals which may be better but it was not available when I was searching in 2020. Then I lost my drone and needed a replacement so bought another HS720E.
I like how these drones can be stably controlled by GPS and nudged around with the controller to frame the camera views. It is a good starter drone for my needs.
TIP: I had some trouble connecting to the drone but Tech Support guided me to disable my phone connection to my home WiFi and disable Phone data which was interfering. Then it connected fine and flew as expected.
Another consideration with many drones is the FAA requirements for Remote ID by Sept 2023. This drone does not have that feature and I hope Holy Stone or someone will make some option to upgrade these drones soon.

title: Novice mode only allows the drone to go so high and so far away; which is awesome indeed!
text: This is a great high end beginner's drone. The tripod mode is designed to provide you with better control while learning the movements in slow flight. The optic flow sensor on the bottom also allows for more stable hovering when flying indoors..

title: Nice drone and features
text: The Holy Stone HS720e worked perfectly right out of the box. The drones construction was very good and looks like it would have cost twice as much. Once airborne, the drones 4k camera resolution was very good and sony image stabilization kept excessive movement and vibration nonexistent. Don't forget to purchase a 128G memory card for the drone. The app for the cell phone works well, but could use more clarity. Had to download the operators manual from the Holy Stone website and watch a few UTube videos to answer a few questions. I have only flown the HS720e a few times, but am looking forward to using it frequently for recreational flying. Oh by the way, this drone is large enough (495 grams) that it requires FAA recreational drone registration.

title: Worth your buck!
text: Worth your buck! The clarity is amazing, the size is just right, comes in a very practical case  and it is easy to control.

title: I am impressed of the HS720E
text: I got the HS720E 2 weeks ago and I am impressed.  It was a last minute buy but I saw the review from others and it just came out.  It was on sale, a nice 4k at 30fps camera and 1080 at 60fps, it was a foldable drone, and has the software feature that my expensive drone has for a very low price!  I fly the HS720E a dozen times now.  Since its so cheap, I am NOT afraid to fly it very high and long distance!  My friend and I already use the 4k video for his music video and he is ALSO impressed from the shots!  It has the EIS and the drone is relatively quite.

title: Great product and great customer service.
text: Great product and great customer service. I have this drone for a couple months ago and I am pleased by the quality of it, unfortunately I crashed it 2 days ago, so I decided to give them a call to check if there's a warranty, fortunately there was and they sent me a replacement right away, it only to a day to receive it. For now on this guys have a loyalty customer.

title: Solid and very stable
text:
I am impressed with the build quality and operation of this drone. It is very stable in flight and has lots of automated features that make it easy for a beginner to fly and yet provides a very stable platform for the experienced pilot to perform intricate maneuvers.
It is a winner all around. The only drawback is that the WiFi from the drone only works well with either Samsung S7 and above or Apple iphone 6S and above. it does not connect to Motorola android phones.

title: The controller feels great on your hands
text: [[VIDEOID:88bea796f6e770f65f1372592d27247]] This is an awesome drone, the camera is great, i can see fine details even when it is far away, I had it more than a block away and i still get video feed on my phone. It flies smooth and quiet. I am not sure it it is an isolated issue but my drone tends to drift while hovering.

title: No very satisfied
text: Quality is not so good!!!

title: Tremendous!!
text: I’ve had the 720E for about a month. Have been amazed at the quality and stability of this unit. For $300 I can’t say a bad thing about the picture quality or ease of use. I would definitely recommend this unit. I wouldn’t waste my time with a cheap unit. Save up til you have the money for this one.

title: Great drone- very easy to fly
text: [[VIDEOID:267cc0d92d517df06c85faaad713ff3c]] This is a very nice drone. Easy to fly, and great camera!  I'm a beginner,  only been flying for about 3 months now. I don't have any trouble flying this. If you are thinking about getting yourself a drone, I would recommend this one!

title: Amateur taking flight with collision avoidance
text: This is my very first drone. I have read and watched many reviews on many different drones. The Holy Stone 730 4k landed high on my wish list. The flight is smooth. The camera takes beautiful photos. I haven't had a chance to record any flight's yet. Again, I'm a amateur. The only thing I wish was this little well built machine had was a crash avoidance. If this awesome drone had obstacle detection and collision avoidance sensors it would be more user friendly for amateurs/beginners like myself. I have crashed my drone on two different occasions, without any serious physical damage such as dents. Thanks to Holy Stone for a great drone. Thanks again.

title: I like this Drone
text: [[VIDEOID:fc4ead11854466dbd60087068ae0d6fe]] I've had this drone since Dec 18th. Have flown it 4 times and each time I'm getting better at it. It's my first drone and I think I did pretty good with it. It does exactly what it say it will do. Studying the instructions certainly help with issues you may have.  The video and picture came out pretty good for a beginner. I'd recommend this drone.

title: Glad I bought it!
text: This drone is very responsive. You can tell a good drone by the way it hovers and this drone is right on!

title: Buy a DJI
text: I went through all of the necessary steps preflight. The drone flew as it should once. The next two flights were disasters. The GPS stopped working and it behaved completely erratically. Don't waste your money and buy a DJI.

title: I wanted to love it
text:
This was my second attempt with a Holy Stone drone, but had to return this one too. The first one came damaged, and although Holy Stone customer service was excellent, prompt and responsive, they couldn’t help me because apparently, Amazon is >NOT< an authorized seller, so beware for warranty service.
The second drone came in what seemed perfect physical condition, but it was so unstable even in a light breeze, it was unsafe to me and itself. It would suddenly veer to the side. I was able to regain control, but after several incidents, I’m pretty sure it was a connection/software issue. The final straw was when I took the drone up on a fully charged batter when it suddenly gave a low battery warning and went into landing mode. That would have been fine except it shot off towards the wood line and the controller was completely unresponsive. I chased it into the woods and seemed to get intermittent control and ended up being able to land it, although I could feel it fighting me the entire time.
It really is a very nice drone. It’s very well built and has features only found on much more expensive drones. The unstable flight and sudden dead battery warning was the nail in the coffin for this drone. Losing all control is very dangerous and at the end of the day, I had to return this drone and go with a popular and much more expensive brand.

title: CAME BROKEN!!!!
text: I'm so MAD, this is how it came right out of The box, it's The first drone I buy and I needed it for this weekend and came BROKEN!!!

title: Great Drone
text: Super easy to use. Takes great pictures & videos. Highly recommend this drone!

title: Awesome for all levels
text:
This is my first drone so nothing to compare it to but I am so happy with this purchase. Exactly what I wanted. My neighbors all have been amazed at the video and photo quality and how steady it is. I tested the follow me feature and that was pretty cool , it worked great. Highly recommended!
I started off on the beginners level to learn it then for the 2nd battery I ventured out. It has alot of advanced features.

title: Great Drone not just for a beginner
text: [[VIDEOID:2b89b5a0694bda90bfbcb18495e8eeee]] This drone was a real surprise, not only does it take great video and pictures, its very easy to control and fun to fly, has some really cool feature, follow me and circle around, setting way point is easy, and linking to your phone using there app was easy and simple to use,  has really good flight time with the two batteries we got just over 35 minutes, Great first drone and worth the money

title: Does not shoot 4k
text: I tried multiple class 10 SD cards, plugged it into the computer, reformated and everything in between. Grainy pixelated video is what i got.

title: Very nice drone
text: Nice Drone, works great, lots of features for the money.

title: Great value, great drone, easy to learn, the way to start.
text: This drone is a great product for a great price. Holy Stone packs a lot of options in this drone which enables people to get into the hobby.  The app is easy to use, comes with 2 batteries, 4K video looks great, and drone flies very well. I recommend this drone to everyone looking to get into the hobby.

title: Easy to use
text: So far so good! Just got the drone and tested it out. Easy to fly and I’ve never used a drone before.

title: very good product for the price
text: I didn't give this "5's" but I am very pleased.  5's are reserved for something exceptional.  I'm pleased with the product and amazon

title: Easy to fly drone for beginners
text:
This is my first drone weighing over 0.5lbs...my others were cheap lightweight toys. The video is good and pictures come out great- I installed a 128GB TF card in the drone as the drone video/pictures are better than what is streamed to your phone through the app. I haven't tried all of the features out yet, follow me, way point, etc yet as still trying to hone my flying skills first. I have crashed it a few times from about 12 feet high but the drone still flies great.
One note I have is that other reviews stated the drone would 'runaway' with out them being able to gain control back. I experience something like that after a couple of crashes but discovered it was due to the propeller screws coming loose. Once I tightened them back up and performed the magnetic calibration again, the drone flew good as new again. May not be what happened to the others, but that's what worked for me.
I recommend this drone as it makes flying a whole lot more fun than with the lightweight toy drones...a lot easier to control.

title: excellent 90 day warranty
text: I had a purchased a drone from holy stone HS720e 4K ESI, I had  been flying my drone several times, and took out to fly it and notice that the camera wasn't working I call HS customer service, I explained to them my problem, they told me no problem all I needed to do is take a video of what was going on with my drone. The next day they sent me out new drone. That's great customer service!

title: Not responsive to controls, changes direction without user input. Don’t waste your time or money.
text:
My wife got me this drone as a gift, and I was pretty impressed with it as far as construction goes. Everything felt solid, packaging was good as well. Reading through the instruction manual and going through the first time calibration process, there were some things that were a bit confusing due to poor wording, and two steps that were different from what the instruction manual described.

The real issue, and what caused me to return this drone, is upon initial startup and entering hover mode, the drone started to strafe to the left. I brought it right and when I let go it traveled another 2 feet before coming to a stop. Mind you this is all low speed movement. Once I got it steadied out I began a descent so I could shut down and troubleshoot. During the descent the drone started creeping to the left again and then quickly shot down and right and impacted the ground. From there the rotors failed to shut off for a good 30 seconds after I powered them down.

I’m a bit shocked that despite the high reviews, this quadcopter performed so poorly. A DJI is a much better choice. I really wanted to like this drone, but I won’t be giving this brand another shot, whether it was a one off issue or not.

title: Great value
text: This was my first drone purchase.  I bought to document the build process of my home.  It works fantastic for what I need. About 20 mins of battery life in each battery and it come back home perfectly when I'm finished.  I would reccomend this over the more expensive option for people who are like me. Records videos and pictures directly to my phone for easy sharing.

title: Excellent drone, very easy to use!
text: Bought drone for my 12yr old son. It was very easy learn and use. Excellent pictures and videos. Looking forward to warmer weather where he can really give it a good long run.

title: Affordable drone with some nice features.
text: This drone is very easy to use, and is high quality. My experience is very limited, but this drone is very easy to control and has some nice features for this price point. The return home feature works very well and it takes nice pictures and videos! The only feature that has not worked for me so far is 'Follow Me' mode. From the comments of others it appears that this may be an App glitch that hopefully will be addressed in the near future. Everything else works great.

title: UPDATE:  Great drone -- easy to fly -- super quality videos
text:
I received this, my first drone as a Christmas gift. It was chosen after extensive research -- best drones under $300. I have experience flying radio controlled planes but haven't flown in over 10 years. Flying the HS720E was very easy. It is quite stable in windy conditions and the videos look great.

I am looking forward to trying all the mapping options. Return home and auto takeoff and landing work well. I had no problems installing and using the App, which has been updated since I first wrote this review. Most of the changes that I noticed were the results of customer suggestions! Holy Stone Customer Service is topnotch. Whether you choose to call them or use email, they respond immediately and do everything that is possible and reasonable to address your question or concern. I've attached two photos taken with my HS-720e! If you are thinking about getting into the drone flying hobby, buying a Holy Stone Drone is the way to go!

title: Great value for your money.
text:
Whether you are a new entrant into the drone flying scene or an avid enthusiast searching for a better drone experience, the HS720 promises to offer you the time you are hoping for.

It is easy to operate and comes with several exciting features that you won’t even find in higher priced quadcopters.

The best part is that you won’t have to break the bank when acquiring this remarkable consumer drone.

title: It’s not just hype
text: I was a little worried this wouldn’t meet my expectations but boy was I wrong. This is by far the best drone I own. I have wanted to try a photo drone for a while but couldn’t see spending the money for another brand and after researching for a couple weeks, it was and easy choice and one I do not regret. I have already recommended this model to several friends and have plane to purchase another.

title: Flies well. Great response. Reliable
text: Excellent build. Great responsive drone for the price range.

title: Good drone terrible app.
text: App works for crap. Pictures worked once and have not been able to use again.

title: Easy and fun to use.
text: The HS720E was higher quality than what I was expecting.  Everything about it went smoothly and the instructions were easy to understand.  Very pleased, lots of features.  I actually bought two.

title: Great Product
text: Easy to learn for a beginner, great photos for what I needed it for!

title: delivered damaged
text: delivered used, the screws are stripped, the camera does not have to cover, damaged

title: I must have gotten a bad one.
text:
I have an older HS700 that I've been fairly happy with so I stuck with Holy Stone for my next drone, the HS720E. The calibration procedure is similar to the HS700 and it only took about 5 minutes from unboxing until it was ready for flight.

That's when the problems started. I could see and connect to the drone's WIFI but the Ophelia app would show "Not connected" and there would be no video. No matter what I tried it was the same, "Not connected". I even tried a different phone.

After reading some forums it seems this is common. Most send the drone back but others suggested using the "M RC Pro" app instead. I installed that app and viola, the drone connected and I could see video! So, time for the first flight.

I started from a wide-open field and touched the one-button takeoff. It sprung about 6 feet up and hovered, but was listing slightly to the left. I had to keep moving it back. I brought it up to about 50 feet and the listing got worse. There was no wind so I don't know why it wasn't stable.

I moved it up another 20 feet and forward about 100 feet and things went haywire. The listing was so bad that I had to move the joystick to the complete opposite direction to keep it still. It stopped obeying my commands and would move randomly. I hit the panic button, return to home, but the drone had no idea where it or I was. I had 17 GPS references and a strong signal! It wound up flying out of radio range and accelerating into the ground.

I dusted off the HS700 and flew it around without problems. I don't understand why the HS720E behaved the way it did. I should have known I had a defective unit when it wouldn't connect to Ophelia.

title: Loving it!!!
text: Have I have to say that for the price I am really in love with this drone. It is super easy to set up and use. Comes in box all together and ready to fly after you do the set up of calibration. Make sure you fly in a open field to start off because this thing will go, haha. The camera is great as well. I would tell every one to start with this one if I could. Cam links to phone by WiFi is easy. I order it on this pass Sunday morning and got it deliver the same day in the afternoon. What better then that? Thanks guys and keep up the good work! The only thing I wish it had was Blade Guards

title: Customer service is amazing, so don’t worry !
text: [[VIDEOID:4a19d3c6503959accf965e1094657aa1]] Batteries take a little while to charge but other then that the drone is top notch… has a good weight to it and doesn’t feel flimsy. It doesn’t seem very loud and it’s super easy to connect and fly. Customer service is hands down the best over ever dealt with .

title: Awesome Drone!
text: Totally blown away by this drone. It feels very high quality, it is easy to fly, and the video is beautiful and cinematic. It is absolutely amazing, especially for the price.

title: Range
text:
The Range offered on these is close to 1000 feet and on every one of the flights I took once I reached 350 feet at a height of 90 ft, I would loose connection with the Drone and I would press the return button and it would return without showing re-connection status!
On its last flight, the drone came back and tried to hover over to where it was supposed to land and then apparently lost calibration and took off towards the wooded area on pics and the last photo was of where it landed in the bushes at approximately 321 Feet from take off site.
I would suggest the drone have an emergency beacon or signal or bell to alert as to where it is in case its lost in thick woods like mine did!

title: Good for learning
text: Good drone for intermediate/beginner to practice before you thinking of dive in to the more expensive drones. Pretty easy setup. My only problem is the wifi connection with the drone itself. Been told to go somewhere that has little to no interference. Honestly, if you’re a regular person that live in a city or a suburb, that’ll be impossible! As far as flying the drone, quite easy. Very stable. Hovering nicely. If you ever get it to connect to your phone, all the functions worked.

title: Great product for the money. You won’t be disappointed.
text:
This was my first drone purchase and something I’ve been wanting to purchase for some time. Having looked at a number of options I settled on the HS720E and was not disappointed when It came.

Very easy set up and instructions on setting up. I love the Ophelia Go app and very easy to use.

Wasn’t sure what to expect for the pictures and videos but was pleasantly surprised on the very good quality of both. The EIS worked as described. Even with a steady breeze the videos came out perfect.

Looking forward to using all the feature (Follow Me, POI and Headless) as time goes on.

Extremely happy with the purchase.

title: This is junk straight out of the box.
text: On half the flights this drone loses connection with the transmitter and becomes uncontrollable which ,of course causes it to crash. In my case, the crash broke one of the arms. Garbage.
